Hold a dumbbell with a neutral grip.\\", "Lift your legs and chest off the ground simultaneously and hold for a 1 count at the top.\\", "Relax your lower back and lower your legs and chest back to the floor.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Superman Hold
instructions: ["Lie face down on a mat.\\", "Hold dumbbells out in front\\", "Lift arms and legs simultaneously, squeezing lower back.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Cross Body Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width stance holding one dumbbell. Push your butt back while leaving your knees MOSTLY extended.\\", "Reach toward the opposing leg. You should feel a stretch in your hamstrings. When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward to complete the rep.\\", "Do not push your hips all the way forward. This will hyperextend your spine. Just go to a normal standing position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Box Squat
instructions: ["Stand in front of a box or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart with a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Lower your body into a squat position, sitting back onto the box and pausing for a moment before standing back up.\\", "Push through your heels to return to the standing position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Staggered Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Set up a bar at mid way up your quad. Place the working leg against the bar.\\", "Place one foot behind. You should only be on your toes on that back foot. Your front foot should be planted flat the entire time.\\", "Bend your back knee and push your hips back. Look for a stretch in your front hamstring.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward again until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Place a barbell at about midway up your thigh. Press your quads into the barbell.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knees mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Half Kneeling Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Place one knee on a bench and hold a dumbbell.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knee mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Half Kneeling Goblet Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Place one knee on a bench and hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knee mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Good Mornings
instructions: ["Stand with your feet a little past shoulder width apart with a slight bend at your knee. Place your hands behind the back of your head.\\", "Keeping your back straight, rotate your hips to bring your shoulders down towards the floor. Stop when your chest is parallel with the floor.\\"]

title: Supermans
instructions: ["Lie face down on the floor with your arms fully extended in front of you.\\", "Simultaneously raise your arms, legs and chest off of the floor and hold the position.\\", "Slowly lower your arms, legs and chest back to the starting position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Single Legged Romanian Deadlifts
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent and raise one leg.\\", "Without changing the bend in your knee, bend at your hips, and lower your torso until it's almost parallel to the floor.\\", "Tense your glutes and then bring yourself back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Staggered Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Set up a bar at mid way up your quad. Place the working leg against the bar.\\", "Place one foot behind. You should only be on your toes on that back foot. Your front foot should be planted flat the entire time.\\", "Bend your back knee and push your hips back. Look for a stretch in your front hamstring.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward again until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Place a barbell at about midway up your thigh. Press your quads into the barbell.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knees mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Reverse Hyperextension
instructions: ["Lie face down on a stability ball, hands on the floor, legs extended straight.\\", "Engage glutes and lower back, raising legs until aligned with your torso.\\", "Slowly lower legs back down without touching the ground, maintaining core engagement. Repeat.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Stability Ball Hyperextension
instructions: ["Lie face-down on a stability ball, hips centered, feet anchored, hands behind your head.\\", "Engage your core, lift your upper body until aligned with legs, keeping your neck neutral.\\", "Lower your torso slowly back to the starting position, maintaining control and steady breathing.\\"]

title: Half Kneeling Hip Hinge
instructions: ["Place one knee on a bench.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knee mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Machine 45 Degree Back Extension
instructions: ["Position your thighs on the padding and hook your feet on the platform supports.\\", "Keeping your back straight, slowly bend at your waist until your legs and back are at a 45\u00b0 angle.\\", "Slowly raise your body to the starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Back Extension
instructions: ["Sit on the machine and place your upper back on the rolling pad.\\", "Extend your hips and lower back. Make sure not to hyperextend your spine.\\"]

title: Machine Reverse Hyperextension
instructions: ["Lay on the pad and grab the handles.\\", "Slip your legs into the belt loop.\\", "Push your legs back until they are horizontal with the ground.\\", "Lower back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Single Leg Deadlift
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball while standing on one leg.\\", "Hinge forward on one leg, extending other leg behind.\\", "Return to starting position. Repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: ["Stand with your feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart holding the kettlebell between your legs, with your knees slightly bent.\\", "Keeping your back straight, swing the kettlebell upwards until the kettlebell is level with your chest and carefully lower.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Leg Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart, lifting one foot off the floor behind you. Hold the kettlebell in the same arm as the lifted leg.\\", "Bend forward at the hips bringing the kettlebell to the floor while you extend your lifted leg behind you, keeping your back straight - holding out your arm to the side for balance.\\", "Return to the upright position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Staggered Deadlift (Single)
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart, shifting one foot behind you. Hold the kettlebell in both hands in front of your thighs.\\", "Bend forward at the hips bringing the kettlebell to the floor while you slightly bend your knees and keep your back straight.\\", "Return to the upright position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Goblet Good Morning
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart holding the kettlebell with both hands in front of your chest.\\", "Bend forward at the hips keeping your back and knees straight and the kettlebell close to your chest.\\", "Return to standing position and thrust your pelvis forward.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Superman
instructions: ["Begin by lying face down on the floor with a kettlebell in each hand, arms extended.\\", "Lift your chest and legs off the ground simultaneously while squeezing your glutes and raising the kettlebells.\\", "Lower your body and kettlebells back to the floor, then repeat for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Superman Hold
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, kettlebell in one hand, arm fully extended, and hinge at hips.\\", "Lift opposite leg straight behind you, forming a straight line from head to heel.\\", "Hold for 15-30 seconds, switch sides, and repeat for a balanced kettlebell superman hold.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Alternating Swing
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, kettlebell between legs.\\", "Hinge at hips, swing kettlebell between legs.\\", "Swing kettlebell up, switch hands at the top, and repeat in a fluid motion.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Conventional Deadlift (Double)
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart.\\", "Bend at hips and knees to lift kettlebells.\\", "Stand tall, then lower.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Swing (Double)
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, kettlebells outside legs\\", "Hinge at hips, swing kettlebells forward, then back.\\", "Thrust hips to swing kettlebells upward, keeping arms straight.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Full Swing
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, kettlebell between legs.\\", "Hinge at hips, grip kettlebell, and swing it overhead.\\", "Extend hips and knees, lock out arms at the top.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding kettlebells in front.\\", "Hinge at hips, keeping back straight, and lower kettlebells towards ground.\\", "Return to start position, squeezing glutes at the top.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Swing
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, kettlebell between legs, grip with one hand, hinge at hips.\\", "Swing kettlebell forcefully forward, using hip thrust, arm straight.\\", "Swing kettlebell back between legs, repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Staggered Deadlift
instructions: ["Begin with feet hip-width apart, one foot forward, kettlebell between feet.\\", "Hinge at hips, grip kettlebell, and stand tall.\\", "Lower kettlebell with control, then repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Staggered Swing
instructions: ["Lower kettlebell with control, then repeat.\\", "Explosively thrust hips forward, swing kettlebell to chest height.\\", "Repeat for desired reps, keeping core engaged and maintaining a staggered stance for balance.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Sumo Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with feet wide apart, toes pointing slightly outward, and kettlebell on the floor between your feet.\\", "Bend at hips and knees, keeping back straight, and grip the kettlebell handle.\\", "Lift the kettlebell by extending hips and knees, stand up straight, and return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Swing To Upright Row
instructions: ["Start with a kettlebell between your legs, hinge at hips, swing it upward.\\", "Lift kettlebell to chest level, elbows high, engaging shoulders.\\", "Lower kettlebell back down, maintaining control. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Suitcase Deadlift
instructions: ["Begin by standing with your feet hip-width apart and holding a kettlebell at one side of your body, with your palms facing your thighs.\\", "Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, bend at the hips and knees to lower the kettlebell down towards the ground.\\", "As the kettlebell reaches the ground, use your legs and glutes to push through your heels and extend your hips and knees to raise your body back to the starting position.\\", "Repeat the movement for the desired number of reps, then switch sides and repeat the exercise with the kettlebell on the opposite side of your body.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Box Squat
instructions: ["Stand in front of a box or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart with a kettlebell in a goblet position.\\", "Lower your body into a squat position, sitting back onto the box and pausing for a moment before standing back up.\\", "Push through your heels to return to the standing position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Staggered Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Set up a bar at mid way up your quad. Place the working leg against the bar.\\", "Place one foot behind. You should only be on your toes on that back foot. Your front foot should be planted flat the entire time.\\", "Bend your back knee and push your hips back. Look for a stretch in your front hamstring.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward again until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Place a barbell at about midway up your thigh. Press your quads into the barbell.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knees mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Half Kneeling Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Place one knee on a bench and hold a kettlebell.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knee mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Half Kneeling Goblet Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Place one knee on a bench and hold a kettlebell in a goblet position.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knee mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Lower back Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Lay flat against the ground with your knees at an angle and your feet flat against the floor.\\", "Grab your legs just below the knees, and pull your legs towards your chest.\\", "Pause at the apex of the stretch, then return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Lower back Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Lay on your back with your arms at either side.\\", "Raise your knees so that they are pointing straight towards the ceiling. Keeping your legs pressed together, rotate your hips to either side.\\", "Repeat this motion as necessary.\\"]

title: Lower back Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Lay flat on the floor with your arms at either side.\\", "With one leg, hook one foot under the joint of your other leg.\\", "Rotate your hips so that your knees are pointing sideways, keeping your hooked leg flat against the floor.\\", "Pause at the apex of the stretch and repeat with your other leg.\\"]

title: Lower back Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with the tops of your feet pointed and flat on the ground. Move your arms out in front of you in the diving position, placing your palms flat against the ground.\\", "With your arms fully extended, rest your buttocks on the heels of your feet, you can crawl your hands forward to extend the stretch if need be.\\", "Hold the extended position for a few seconds, and return to starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Goblet Squat
instructions: ["Start with a straight bar or easy bar attachment .\\", "Get your elbows directly underneath the bar, squat straight up and then walk back a few steps.\\", "Break at your knees and hips to initiate the squat. Make sure you maintain a flat back.\\", "Squat all the way back to a standing position.\\"]

title: Cable Bar Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Start with a straight bar or ez bar attachment set to the bottom of the machine. Squat the weight up into a standing position and walk a few steps back\\", "Push your butt back to initiate the movement and then push your butt forward until you're back in a standing position.\\", "To protect yourself from injury, always maintain a flat back on any exercise.\\"]

title: Cable Single Leg Deadlift
instructions: ["Start with a straight bar or easy bar attachment. Squat the weight up into a standing position and walk a few steps back.\\", "Push your butt back to initiate the movement while lifting one of your legs.\\r\\ Then push your butt forward until you're back in a standing position.\\", "Compete your given amount of reps, then switch to opposite leg.\\", "To protect yourself from injury, always maintain a flat back.\\"]

title: Cable Pull Through
instructions: ["This exercise works best with a rope attachment but can be done with anything. The attachment should be set to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Face away from the cable machine, straddle the cable itself, and grab the attachment.\\r\\ Walk a few steps away.\\", "Break at the hips while maintaining a flat back and mostly extended knees.\\", "Push hips forward until you are back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Cable Standing Straight Leg Glute Kickback
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. The cable should be set to the bottom of the crossover machine.\\", "Push your ankle straight back, extending at the hip. Hold for a one count when you feel a contraction in your glutes.\\", "Then flex at the hips until you are back into your original position.\\"]

title: Cable Zercher Squat
instructions: ["Start with a straight bar or easy bar attachment .\\", "Place the bar in your elbows, squat straight up and then walk back a few steps.\\", "Break at your knees and hips to initiate the squat. Make sure you maintain a flat back.\\", "Squat all the way back to a standing position.\\"]

title: Cable Incline Bench Straight Leg Kickback
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. Put the bench at incline level. The cable should be set to shoulder height.\\", "Push your ankle straight back, extending at the hip. Hold for a one count when you feel a contraction in your glutes.\\", "Then flex at the hips until you are back into your original position.\\"]

title: Cable Bench Straight Leg Kickback
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. The cable should be set to hip height.\\", "Push your ankle straight back, extending at the hip. Hold for a one count when you feel a contraction in your glutes.\\", "Then flex at the hips until you are back into your original position.\\"]

title: Cable Standing Mid Kickback
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. The cable should be set halfway up the crossover machine.\\", "Start with a bent knee position. Push your ankle straight back, extending at the hip. Hold for a one count when you feel a contraction in your glutes.\\", "Then flex at the hips until you are back into your original position.\\"]

title: Cable Standing Straight Leg Mid Kickback
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. The cable should be set to halfway up the crossover machine.\\", "Push your ankle straight back, extending at the hip. Hold for a one count when you feel a contraction in your glutes.\\", "Then flex at the hips until you are back into your original position.\\"]

title: Cable Zercher Good Morning
instructions: ["Begin by standing with your feet about hip-width apart and holding the bar in the crook of your elbows, with your palms facing towards your body.\\", "Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, bend at the hips and lower your torso forward until it is nearly parallel to the ground.\\", "Push through your heels to extend your hips and raise your body back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Bar Staggered Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Start with a straight bar attachment set to the bottom of the machine. Squat the weight up into a standing position and walk a few steps back.\\", "Stand with a staggered stance. Push your butt back to initiate the movement and then push your butt forward until you're back in a standing position.\\", "To protect yourself from injury, always maintain a flat back on any exercise.\\"]

title: Cable Elevated Deadlift
instructions: ["Start with handles set to the bottom of the machine. Grab a box, stand on top of the box, squat the weight up into a standing position.\\", "Push your butt back to initiate the movement and then push your butt forward until you're back in a standing position.\\", "To protect yourself from injury, always maintain a flat back on any exercise.\\"]

title: Band Good Morning
instructions: ["Anchor the band at hip level. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Push your hips back while keeping your back flat until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.\\"]

title: Band Pullthrough
instructions: ["Anchor the band to the lowest point possible. Straddle the band and then grab with both hands.\\", "Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Push your butt back until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings. Then extend the hips back into the starting position.\\"]

title: Band Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand on your band with both feet.\\", "Hinge forward at the hips while keeping a flat back.\\", "Hinge until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "Push your hips back forward until you are in a standing position.\\"]

title: Plate Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, the plate in front of the feet, and the knees slightly bent.\\", "Bend the hips and knees to grip the plate with palms facing the body.\\", "Keeping the back straight, stand up while lifting the plate off the ground.\\", "Return the plate back to the starting position by bending the hips and knees, keeping control of the plate.\\"]

title: Plate Single Leg Pinch Grip Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and facing forwards. Grip the sides of a weight plate with your palms facing down.\\", "Balance on one foot, as you raise the weight keep your arms and back straight, while you bring your  other foot back towards the ground\\", "Keep four raised leg straight and in alignment with your back as you lower the plate back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Good Morning Anterior
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, the plate held in front of you, and the knees slightly bent.\\", "Bend forward at the hips, keeping the back straight, until the torso is parallel to the floor.\\", "Push through the hips to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Good Morning
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, the plate held behind the neck and the knees slightly bent.\\", "Bend forward at the hips, keeping the back straight, until the torso is parallel to the floor.\\", "Push through the hips to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Single Leg Deadlift
instructions: ["Engage your core and straighten your legs to lift the plate off the ground.\\", "Stand on one leg, keeping the other leg off the ground, while holding the plate in front of your body.\\", "Keep your back straight and maintain a neutral head position while looking straight ahead.\\", "Lower the plate back down to the ground while keeping your balance on one leg.\\"]

title: Plate Pinch Grip Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand facing the plate with your feet shoulder-width apart and the plate positioned between your feet.\\", "Bend down and grasp the plate from the top edges with both hands, making sure your thumbs and fingers are evenly spaced.\\", "Keep your back straight, chest up and core engaged, and stand up with the plate, keeping it close to your body.\\", "Lower the plate back down to the ground, keeping control and maintaining good posture.\\"]

title: Plate Staggered Deadlift
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a weight plate.\\", "Place one foot slightly behind the other, with the heel of your back foot elevated.\\", "From this starting position, bend at the hips and knees to lower the plate towards the ground, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.\\", "Once the plate is below your knees, drive through your heels to stand back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Staggered Pinch Grip Deadlift
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding two plates with a pinch grip.\\", "Place one foot slightly behind the other, with the heel of your back foot elevated.\\", "From this starting position, bend at the hips and knees to lower the plates towards the ground, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.\\"]

title: Plate Superman
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground on your stomach with your arms extended overhead. Hold a plate with a neutral grip.\\", "Lift your legs and chest off the ground simultaneously and hold for a 1 count at the top.\\", "Relax your lower back and lower your legs and chest back to the floor.\\"]

title: Plate Superman Hold
instructions: ["Hold a plate in both hands.\\", "Pull your arms and legs off the ground while and hold that position.\\"]

title: Plate Staggered Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Set up a bar at mid way up your quad. Place the working leg against the bar.\\", "Place one foot behind. You should only be on your toes on that back foot. Your front foot should be planted flat the entire time.\\", "Bend your back knee and push your hips back. Look for a stretch in your front hamstring.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward again until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Plate Waiters Bow
instructions: ["Place a barbell at about midway up your thigh. Press your quads into the barbell. Hold a plate up to your chest.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knees mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: TRX Ab Rollout
instructions: ["Grasp the TRX handles with both hands, keeping your arms extended and your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Keep your abs engaged, roll forward onto your toes, and extend your arms in front of you.\\", "Slowly lower your body down to the ground, keeping your arms straight and your abs engaged.\\", "When your head gets between your arms, pause for a moment and then use your abs to pull your body back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Happy Baby
instructions: ["Lie down on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.\\", "Lift your feet off the floor and bring your knees towards your chest.\\", "Reach inside your knees and hold onto the outside edges of your feet.\\", "Gently pull your knees towards your armpits and rock side to side for a few breaths.\\"]

title: Sphinx Pose
instructions: ["Start by lying down on your stomach on a yoga mat or a comfortable surface.\\", "Place your elbows underneath your shoulders, keeping your forearms parallel to each other.\\", "Press your palms and forearms firmly into the ground to lift your chest up, while keeping your hips and legs relaxed.\\", "Make sure your shoulders are relaxed and away from your ears. Gently roll your shoulder blades down and back to open up your chest.\\", "Lengthen your spine by lifting the crown of your head towards the ceiling, while keeping your chin tucked in slightly.\\"]

title: Cobra Pose
instructions: ["Start prone, hands under shoulders.\\", "Inhale, lift chest, arch back.\\", "Elongate neck, gaze up. Breathe, hold. Release, exhale.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Single Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sit on Bosu, lean back, one foot on the floor.\\", "Drive hips upward, squeezing glutes, one leg extended.\\", "Lower hips back down and switch legs.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Superman
instructions: ["Lie face down on Bosu, arms extended.\\", "Lift arms, chest, and legs off the Bosu.\\", "Hold for a moment, then lower back down.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Take an overhand grip.\\", "Keep your knees mostly extended and hinge forward at the hips.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Single Leg Deadlift
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball while standing on one leg.\\", "Hinge forward on one leg, extending other leg behind.\\", "Return to starting position. Repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Staggered Deadlift
instructions: ["Place one foot firmly on the ground and one foot behind the other. Bend the knee on your back leg.\\", "Hinge forward until you feel a stretch in your front leg.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Sumo Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Stance width can vary with a sumo DL. Some prefer toes near the plates. Others prefer a more narrow stance to get more drive off the floor.\\", "Make sure your arms are inside your legs. The bar should be just over your mid-foot. Flatten your back and unrack the bar\\", "Leave your knees mostly extended and flex and extend your hips.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Staggered Deadlift
instructions: ["Place one foot behind. You should only be on your toes on that back foot. Your front foot should be planted flat the entire time.\\", "Bend your back knee and push your hips back. Look for a stretch in your front hamstring.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward again until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Romanian Deadlift
instructions: ["Take a shoulder width, double overhand or mixed grip.\\", "Push your hips back while leaving your knees mostly extended. Look for a stretch in your hamstrings.\\", "When you feel the stretch, push your hips forward until you're back in a standing position.\\"]

title: Alternating Swipe Around
instructions: ["Lie on your front, arms above head. Squeeze glutes to protect lower back\\", "Raise your chest and arms off the ground. Adduct (bring your arms by your hips) in an alternating fashion.\\", "You can touch down and repeat the whole movement, or remain off the ground and just perform the \\\\"]

title: Swipe Around
instructions: ["Lie on your front, arms above head. Squeeze glutes to protect lower back\\", "Raise your chest and arms off the ground. Adduct (bring your arms by your hips)\\", "You can touch down and repeat the whole movement, or remain off the ground and just perform the \\\\"]

title: Skydiver
instructions: ["Lie on your front with your arms by your side, palms facing down.\\", "Tense your back muscles to raise both ends of your body off the ground.\\", "Keep your core engaged as you will be supporting your weight on your belly.\\"]

title: Box Supported Single Leg Deadlift
instructions: ["Place a box behind you and one foot on it. Keep your chest up and the back straight\\", "Tilt at the hips to perform a deadlift. Use the box for balance and support\\", "Make sure you straighten your back leg when performing the deadlift.\\", "As you get comfortable with the movement, try to lift the leg off the box when you reach the end range of the deadlift.\\"]

title: QL Mobilisation Floor Foam Roller
instructions: ["Lie on the floor keeping your knees bent and the feet on the floor.\\", "Place a massage ball under your lower back and move around till the ball presses into a tight/sore spot.\\", "If you use a foam roller you would have to be seated and leaning back into the roller.\\"]

title: Prayer Stretch 2 Roller
instructions: ["Sit on your heels and reach out your arms on a box or foam roller while pressing the chest towards the ground.\\"]

title: Prayer Stretch 1
instructions: ["Sit on your heels and reach out your arms on the floor while pressing the chest towards the ground.\\"]

title: Deadlift Bounces Stretch
instructions: ["Stand up straight with a good form.\\", "Send your hips back and start tilting the upper body.\\", "Maintain a straight back as you aim for your toes.\\", "Your range depends on your hamstring flexibility.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand up straight with a good form.\\", "Send your hips back and start tilting the upper body.\\", "Maintain a straight back as you aim for your toes.\\", "Lower the bar to the floor by bending your knees and keeping your back straight.\\"]

title: Lumbar Rotation 5
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your knees bent and the feet flat on the ground.\\", "Drop your knees towards one side and add a kick at the end of range.\\", "To increase the intensity of the stretch you can reach up with your arms.\\"]

title: Lumbar Rotation 3
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your knees bent and the feet flat on the ground.\\", "Drop your knees towards one side then place your ankle on the opposite knee.\\", "To increase the intensity of the stretch you can reach up with your arms.\\"]

title: Lumbar Rotation 4
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your knees bent and the feet flat on the ground.\\", "Cross your legs. Drop your knees towards one side before moving towards the other.\\", "To increase the intensity of the stretch you can reach up with your arms.\\"]

title: Lumbar Rotation 2
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your knees bent and the feet flat on the ground.\\", "Drop your knees towards one side before moving towards the other.\\", "To increase the intensity of the stretch you can reach up with your arms.\\"]

title: Lumbar Rotation 1
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your knees bent and the feet flat on the ground.\\", "Keep your knees and ankles together. Drop both knees towards the same side.\\", "Stay in this position and breathe deep and slow.\\", "To increase the intensity of the stretch you can reach up with your arms.\\"]

title: Cobra Stretch 2
instructions: ["Lay on your front placing your palms under your shoulders\\", "Keep the elbows bent and close to your body\\", "Lift your upper body off the ground supporting your weight on your palms\\", "Keep the hips on the ground\\"]

title: Cobra Stretch 1
instructions: ["Lay on your front placing your palms under your shoulders\\", "Keep the elbows bent and close to your body\\", "Lift your upper body off the ground supporting your weight on your forearms\\", "Keep the hips on the ground\\"]

title: Floor Knee Pull Bilateral
instructions: ["Lie on your back with bent knees.\\", "Hug your knees and pull them towards your chest.\\", "Feel your lower back come off the ground.\\", "You can add a you can add an abduction to target the hips as well.\\"]

title: Lumbar Extensor Mobilisation Supine Bent Knees Peanut Tool
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your feet on a bench. Place a peanut tool under your lower back.\\", "Adjust pressure by pressing your heels into the bench. Roll back and forth or side to side\\", "Maintain a neutral lower back (do not tilt the pelvis).\\"]

title: Lower Back Extensions 4
instructions: ["Lie on your front and bring your arms in the \\\\", "Squeeze your glutes and tilt your hips backwards (flattens the front of your hips against the ground).\\", "Raise your chest off the ground and lower it without resting on the ground before the next rep.\\"]

title: Lower Back Extensions 3
instructions: ["Lie on your front and bring your arms into the \\\\", "Squeeze your glutes and tilt your hips backwards (flattens the front of your hips against the ground).\\", "Raise your chest off the ground and lower it without resting on the ground before the next rep.\\"]

title: Lower Back Extensions 2
instructions: ["Lie on your front leaning your forehead on the back of your palms.\\", "Squeeze your glutes and tilt your hips backwards (flattens the front of your hips against the ground).\\", "Raise your chest off the ground and lower it without resting on the ground before the next rep\\"]

title: Partner Lower Back Extensions
instructions: ["Lie on your front leaning your forehead on the back of your palms.\\", "Ask someone to hold your ankles or secure them under a supportive structure.\\", "Squeeze your glutes and tilt your hips backwards (flattens the front of your hips against the ground).\\", "Raise your chest off the ground and lower it without resting on the ground before the next rep.\\"]

title: Knee Pull And Lumbar Rotation
instructions: ["Lie on your back and flatten you lower back against the ground\\", "Pull one knee towards your chest and then across your body till it forces your lower back into a rotated position.\\"]

title: I Into W
instructions: ["Lie on your front with your arms extended and above your head.\\", "Point the thumbs up. Try to raise your arms off the ground keeping them straight.\\", "Bend your elbows to the side and form the letter \\\\", "position but do not rest on the ground\\"]

title: Inchworm
instructions: ["Stand tall, hinge at hips, and reach hands to the floor.\\", "Walk hands forward into a plank position.\\", "Walk feet towards hands and repeat the motion.\\"]

title: Barbell Front Squat Olympic
instructions: ["Measure your hands by the markings on the bar to make sure you're even. Then throw your elbows underneath the bar.\\", "The bar should be set so high on your shoulders it digs into your neck a bit. Make sure to push your elbows up to the ceiling for the entire rep. To make sure you don't get too pitched forward.\\", "Use the squat stance you would use for a back or goblet squat. Push your hips back to initiate the squat. Break at the knees until you hit parallel depth.\\", "Squat back up to a standing position.\\"]

title: Barbell Situp
instructions: ["Hold the bar with a slightly wider than shoulder width grip. Push the bar up toward the ceiling and maintain that elbow extension.\\", "Flex your abs and sit-up. Aim to get your torso vertical while maintaining the barbell overhead.\\"]

title: Barbell Hooklying Bench Press
instructions: ["Start in a bench press position with your feet planted on the bench and knees bent.\\", "Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, positioning your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.\\", "Lift the barbell off the rack and lower it to your chest, keeping your elbows close to your sides.\\", "Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.\\"]

title: Barbell Larsen Bench Press
instructions: ["Start in a bench press position with your legs elevated. Try to keep your knees with a slight bend in them.\\", "Unrack the bar then initiate the rep.\\", "Bring the bar to your torso and tap your ribcage before pressing back to the ceiling.\\"]

title: Landmine Hollow Hold
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your legs extended towards the landmine attachment and your arms overhead, holding the landmine barbell with both hands while engaging your core muscles by pressing your lower back into the ground and drawing your belly button in towards your spine.\\", "Lift your legs off the ground, keeping them together and straight, and simultaneously raise your upper body off the ground, reaching the landmine barbell away from your face.\\", "Hold this position for the desired duration, then carefully lower the barbell to the ground.\\"]

title: Landmine Sit Up
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground and hold the end of the bar with your arms extended.\\", "Raise your back off the ground until you are sitting at a 90 degree angle.\\", "Then lower slowly back to the floor.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Situp
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with your spine neutral. Extend you arms so your fists are pointed at the ceiling.\\", "Sit-up by flexing your abs. Continue to reach for the ceiling for the entire rep.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Russian Twist
instructions: ["Sit on the floor and flex your knees and hips to a 90 degree angle.\\", "Your feet should be hovering off the ground. (If that's too hard start with heels on the floor)\\", "Rotate your upper spine to engage your obliques.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Plank Pullthrough
instructions: ["Get into a plank position. Either from your knees or toes.\\", "Start with the DB by your right hand. Reach with your left and pull the dumbbell to your left arm. Then repeat with the right.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Half Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Take a half kneeling position. Start with the dumbbell by your knee on the side of the kneeling leg.\\", "Rotate at the upper spine, holding the dumbbell away from your body with nearly extended elbows.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Hollow Hold
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with a dumbbell overhead.\\", "Pull your upper back and legs off the ground. Make a banana shape with your body.\\", "The dumbbell should be held in your hands and your ears should be between your biceps.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Renegade Row
instructions: ["Start by getting into a plank position with a dumbbell in each hand. Your feet should be shoulder-width apart and your hands should be placed on the dumbbells, with your palms facing each other.\\", "From this starting position, row one dumbbell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and your core engaged.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position, and repeat on the other side.\\", "Make sure to keep your body straight and your hips level throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Crunch
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet flat on the floor and your knees bent.\\", "Hold a dumbbell over your clavicle.\\", "Engage your core muscles and lift your torso off the floor until your shoulders are a few inches off the ground.\\", "Lower yourself back down to the starting position, but avoid resting completely on the floor between reps.\\"]

title: Plank IYTW
instructions: ["Start in a plank position. Hold one dumbbell.\\", "Raise the dumbbell straight out in front of you (I), at a 45 degree angle (Y), out to the side (T), and then bend at the elbow while raising (W).\\", "Going through IYTW counts as one rep.\\", "Make sure to keep your hips stable. If you're unable to, try performing this exercise from the knees.\\"]

title: Pushup to Renegade Row
instructions: ["Start in a high plank position with a pair of dumbbells positioned under your shoulders. Your hands should grip the dumbbells, palms facing each other.\\", "Keep your core engaged and your back straight as you row one dumbbell up towards your hip, keeping your elbow close to your body.\\", "Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Suitcase Crunch
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with a dumbbell. Point the soles of your shoes at the ceiling as well as the dumbbell.\\", "Reach for your feet with the dumbbell before bringing your spine back to the floor.\\"]

title: Crunches
instructions: ["Lay flat on your back with your knees bent and your feet flat on the ground, about a foot from your lower back.\\", "Place your fingertips on your temples with your palms facing out.\\", "Draw your belly into the base of your spine to engage the muscles, then raise your head and shoulders off the floor. Return to starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Laying Leg Raises
instructions: ["Lay on your back with your arms palms down on either side.\\", "Keep your legs together and as straight as possible.\\", "Slowly raise your legs to a 90\u00b0 angle, pause at this position, or as high as you can reach your legs, and then slowly lower your legs back down.\\", "Duration of these movements should be slow so that you do not utilize momentum, enabling you to get the most out of the exercise.\\"]

title: Forearm Plank
instructions: ["Place forearms on the ground with your elbows bent at a 90\u00b0 angle aligned beneath your shoulders, with your arms parallel at shoulder-width.\\", "Your feet should be together, with only your toes touching the floor.\\", "Lift your belly off the floor and form a straight line from your heels to the crown of your head and hold.\\"]

title: Hanging Knee Raises
instructions: ["Grab the bar and hang, your body still and your legs straight.\\", "Slowly draw your knees up to your chest\\", "Once you have raised your knees as high as possible, lower your legs and repeat. Duration of these movements should be slow so that you do not utilize momentum, enabling you to get the most out of the exercise.\\", "Duration of these movements should be slow so that you do not utilize momentum, enabling you to get the most out of the exercise.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Russian Twist
instructions: ["Hover your heels just off the ground.\\", "Stick your chest out and maintain a flat back. Make all the movement happen at your mid and upper spine.\\", "Point your chest to the left, then rotate at the spine until your chest is pointed right.\\"]

title: Long Lever Plank
instructions: ["Start in a hand plank position and walk your hands further out until your ears are between your biceps.\\", "Hold in this position for the allotted amount of time.\\", "Make sure you keep a flat back for the whole set.\\"]

title: Hand Plank
instructions: ["Start in a kneeling position with your hands planted on the ground.\\", "Pick your knees up off the ground. Hold in this position with a flat back.\\"]

title: Hollow Hold
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with your arms extended over head.\\", "Pick your upper back and your legs off the ground. Your body should be in a banana shape.\\", "Hold in this position.\\"]

title: Mountain Climber
instructions: ["To perform a bodyweight mountain climber, start in a plank position with your hands placed directly under your shoulders.\\", "Bring your right knee towards your chest, keeping your foot close to your hand. Quickly switch legs, bringing your left knee towards your chest.\\", "Continue this movement, alternating legs, at a quick pace for a set amount of time or repetitions.\\"]

title: Burpee
instructions: ["Start standing with your feet hip-width apart. Lower your body into a squat position, placing your hands on the ground in front of you.\\", "Quickly jump your feet back into a plank position, keeping your body in a straight line from your head to your toes.\\", "Perform a push-up, keeping your core tight and your elbows close to your body.\\", "Jump your feet back towards your hands, and then jump up into the air, reaching your arms overhead.\\", "Land softly and immediately lower your body back into the squat position to repeat the movement.\\"]

title: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: ["Bend knees, hands behind head.\\", "Twist torso, touch elbow to opposite knee. Repeat.\\"]

title: Bird Dog
instructions: ["Start on hands and knees.\\", "Extend right arm and left leg.\\", "Hold for a few seconds, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Dead Bug
instructions: ["Lie on your back, arms extended upward, legs raised with knees bent.\\", "Lower opposite arm and leg to floor, keeping back pressed against ground.\\", "Alternate sides, maintain core engagement, and repeat for desired reps or time.\\"]

title: Long Lever Forearm Plank
instructions: ["Start in a hand plank position and walk your elbows further out until your ears are between your biceps.\\", "Hold in this position for the allotted amount of time.\\", "Make sure you keep a flat back for the whole set.\\"]

title: Situp
instructions: ["Lie flat, knees bent.\\"]

title: Reverse Crunch
instructions: ["Sit in a v position.\\", "Pull legs and torso together.\\", "Extend back into the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Knee Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start from a kneeling plank position.\\", "Go to one elbow then the other. Try to avoid rocking back and forth.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start from a plank position.\\", "Go to one elbow then the other. Try to avoid rocking back and forth.\\"]

title: Plank Saw
instructions: ["Support your weight on forearms and toes.\\", "Ensure you maintain a neutral lower back (do not poke the bum into the air).\\", "Point your toes to push your bodyweight forward then drive the elbows into the ground to push your bodyweight back.\\"]

title: Alternating Heel Touch
instructions: ["Lie on your back, knees bent, feet flat.\\", "Reach right hand to right heel.\\", "Switch sides, left hand to left heel. Repeat.\\"]

title: Reverse Crunch Kick Up
instructions: ["Perform a reverse crunch and then kick your legs up toward the ceiling.\\", "Flex at the hips and knees until your hips land back on the bench, then kick your legs back out to the starting position.\\"]

title: Eccentric Dragonflag
instructions: ["Perform a reverse crunch and then kick your legs up toward the ceiling.\\", "With your hips and knees extended, lower yourself slowly back to the start position.\\"]

title: Laying Alternating Leg Raise
instructions: ["Lie on your back, arms by sides, legs straight.\\", "Lift one leg to a 45-degree angle.\\", "Lower leg, lift opposite leg; alternate smoothly.\\"]

title: Laying Bent Leg Raise
instructions: ["Lie on your back, knees bent, feet flat on the floor.\\", "Raise both knees towards your chest.\\", "Lower back down without touching the floor; repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Alternating Bent Leg Raise
instructions: ["Lie on your back, legs bent and lifted off the ground.\\", "Lower one leg to the ground until your foot taps the ground, keep your other leg up.\\", "Alternate sides for the prescribed amount of reps.\\"]

title: Scissor Kick
instructions: ["Lie on your back, hands under your buttocks or on the ground for support.\\", "Lift legs off the ground, alternate crossing them in a scissor motion.\\"]

title: Sideways Scissor Kick
instructions: ["Lift both legs off the ground.\\", "Bring both legs outward, then cross both legs over one another.\\", "Alternating which leg goes on top.\\"]

title: Reach And Catch
instructions: ["Lay flat on your back with both hands over one leg.\\", "Reach toward your knee flexing your abs and obliques.\\", "Do the prescribed amount of reps, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Frog Crunch
instructions: ["Lie on your back, knees bent, hands behind head.\\", "Crunch up, flexing the spine and your abs.\\"]

title: Frog Sit Up
instructions: ["Lay on your back with knees bent and your feet together.\\", "Keep your arms extended overhead. Swing your arms to generate some momentum and sit up.\\"]

title: Elbow Plank Mountain Climber
instructions: ["Begin in an elbow plank position with your core engaged.\\", "Bring your right knee towards your right elbow.\\", "Return to plank, then switch legs quickly. Repeat.\\"]

title: Slow Tempo Mountain Climber
instructions: ["To perform a bodyweight mountain climber, start in a plank position with your hands placed directly under your shoulders.\\", "Bring your right knee towards your chest, keeping your foot close to your hand. Quickly switch legs, bringing your left knee towards your chest.\\", "Continue this movement, alternating legs, at a slow pace for a set amount of time or repetitions.\\"]

title: Switch Jump Mountain Climber
instructions: ["Start in a plank position with hands under shoulders.\\", "Jump one foot forward, switch legs mid-air.\\", "Alternate legs quickly, maintaining a steady plank.\\"]

title: Slalom Mountain Climber
instructions: ["Start in a plank position with hands directly under shoulders.\\", "Drive knees toward left elbow.\\", "Go back to starting position, then drive knees to right elbow, mimicking a zigzag slalom motion.\\"]

title: Jumping Mountain Climber
instructions: ["Begin in a plank position, hands under shoulders, feet together.\\", "Jump feet forward, landing outside hands in a low squat.\\", "Explode back to plank, repeat continuously for desired reps.\\"]

title: Ring Standing Roll Out
instructions: ["Grasp the rings, keeping your arms extended and your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Keep your abs engaged, roll forward onto your toes, and extend your arms in front of you.\\", "Slowly lower your body down toward the ground, keeping your arms straight and your abs engaged.\\", "When your head gets between your arms, pause for a moment and then use your abs to pull your body back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Hanging L Sit
instructions: ["Grip bar, hang with arms extended, body straight.\\", "Engage core, lift knees towards chest.\\", "Hold that position for the specified amount of time.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Hanging Knee Tuck
instructions: ["Grip bar, hang with arms extended, body straight.\\", "Engage core, lift knees towards chest.\\", "Lower legs back down, maintain controlled movement.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Plank Jack
instructions: ["Start in a plank position, hands under shoulders, body straight.\\", "Jump feet wide, then back together, like a jumping jack.\\", "Keep core tight, maintain plank form, repeat for desired time or reps.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Plank Arm Lift
instructions: ["Start in a plank position.\\", "Raise your arm out in front of you.\\", "Return to the starting position, then raise the opposing arm.\\", "Make sure to keep your hips stable. If you're unable to, try performing this exercise from the knees.\\"]

title: Hanging L Sit
instructions: ["Hang from a bar with arms fully extended.\\", "Lift legs to form an \\\\", "Hold for allotted amount of time keeping your abs flexed.\\"]

title: Stability Ball V Up Pass
instructions: ["Lie on your back, holding a stability ball between your feet, arms extended overhead.\\", "Engage your core, lift your legs and arms, passing the ball from feet to hands.\\", "Lower arms and legs back down, then repeat, passing the ball back to feet.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Windshield Wiper
instructions: ["Lie on your back, legs extended, stability ball between your feet, arms out for support.\\", "Engage your core, lift your legs, and rotate them side to side in a controlled motion.\\", "Keep your upper body stable, move slowly, and return to center before switching directions.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Atomic Push Up
instructions: ["Place feet on a stability ball, hands on the floor in a push-up position.\\", "Lower your chest toward the floor, then push up while tucking knees toward your chest.\\", "Extend legs back to starting position, maintaining control and stability throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Pike
instructions: ["Place your feet on the ball and get in to a plank position.\\", "Pull your hips straight up toward the ceiling.\\", "Lower your hips until you're back in a plank position.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Knee Tuck
instructions: ["Start in a plank position with your feet on a stability ball and hands on the floor.\\", "Engage your core and tuck your knees toward your chest, rolling the ball forward carefully.\\", "Extend your legs back to the starting position, maintaining balance and control throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Stir The Pot
instructions: ["Kneel behind a stability ball, place forearms on top, and engage your core muscles.\\", "Lift knees, balance on toes, and slowly move forearms in small controlled circles.\\", "Maintain a stable torso, avoid excessive movement, and reverse direction after several rotations.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Stability Ball Crunch
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back on a ball with your feet flat on the floor and your knees bent.\\", "Engage your core muscles and flex your spine until you feel your abs contract.\\"]

title: Machine Roll Outs
instructions: ["Hold the Ab Roller with both hands and kneel on the floor with your feet up and crossed.\\", "Slowly roll the ab roller straight forward, stretching your body into a straight position.\\", "After a pause at the stretched position, start pulling yourself back to the starting position. This should be a slow and controlled movement.\\"]

title: Rower Knee Tuck
instructions: ["Place your feet on the rower seat and get in to a hand plank position.\\", "Pull your knees to your chest and flex your abs.\\"]

title: Rower Pike
instructions: ["Place your feet on the rower seat and get in to a plank position.\\", "Pull your hips straight up toward the ceiling.\\", "Lower your hips until you're back in a plank position.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Crunch
instructions: ["Place your feet under the foot pads and grab the handles with your hands.\\", "Flex your spine and bring your upper and lower body together.\\"]

title: Machine Crunch
instructions: ["Place your feet under the foot pads and grab the handles with your hands.\\", "Flex your spine and bring your upper and lower body together.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Halo
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a medicine ball.\\", "Circle the ball around your head, maintaining control.\\", "Complete the desired number of repetitions in both directions.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Partner Situp Toss
instructions: ["Lie facing partner, knees bent.\\", "Sit up, toss medicine ball to partner.\\", "Catch and lower down. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Plank
instructions: ["Place forearms on medicine ball, extend legs.\\", "Maintain straight body position for desired time.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Slam
instructions: ["Lift medicine ball overhead.\\", "Slam ball down to ground with force.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Hollow Hold
instructions: ["Lie on your back, holding a medicine ball overhead.\\", "Lift your shoulders and legs off the ground, engaging core.\\", "Hold the position while maintaining stability.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Dead Bug
instructions: ["Lie on your back, place a medicine ball between your extended arms and bent knees.\\", "Lower opposite arm and leg to floor, keeping back pressed against ground and medicine ball in place.\\", "Alternate sides, maintain core engagement, and repeat for desired reps or time.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Situp
instructions: ["Lay flat on your back with straight legs and hold the kettle bell above your chest at arms length.\\", "Draw your belly into the base of your spine to engage the muscles, then raise your head and shoulders off the floor with the kettlebell raised at arms length above your chest.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Russian Twist
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs bent, knees together and feet raised slightly off the floor.\\", "Starting on one side and sitting up straight with your core muscles engaged, lift the kettlebell off the floor with both hands and bring it across your body to the other side, rotating your chest towards the floor as you do so.\\", "Tap the kettlebell lightly on the floor and bring the kettlebell back across your body to the starting position, rotating your chest towards the floor.\\", "Repeat, keeping the legs bent and feet raised throughout the exercise.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Windmill
instructions: ["Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart. Hold the kettlebell in one hand and extend your arm above your head.\\", "Keeping your legs straight and the kettlebell above your head, lower the relaxed arm towards the ground, twisting your body towards the side of the raised arm.\\", "Return to the starting potion, tilt your pelvis forward and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Hollow Hold
instructions: ["Lie on your back, lift legs \\u0026 shoulders off floor.\\", "Hold kettlebell above your head, engage core, and maintain position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Curtsy Lunge (Double)
instructions: ["Hold kettlebells in front rack.\\", "Step back and lunge diagonally.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Forward Lunge (Double)
instructions: ["Start with kettlebells in front rack.\\", "Step forward into lunge.\\", "Return to starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Lateral Lunge (Double)
instructions: ["Hold kettlebell in front rack.\\", "Step sideways into a lunge position.\\", "Return to start position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Reverse Lunge (Double)
instructions: ["Start with kettlebell in front rack.\\", "Step back into lunge.\\", "Return to start position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Single Arm Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Hold kettlebell in front rack.\\", "Step sideways, lunge.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Squat
instructions: ["Hold kettlebells close to chest.\\", "Squat down, keeping chest up.\\", "Stand up, extending hips fully.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Front Rack Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Hold kettlebell in front rack position.\\", "Step forward, lunge. Bringing your back knee to the floor.\\", "Extend your knee and return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Front Rack Step Up
instructions: ["Stand in front of a step or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a kettlebell at one shoulder.\\", "Step up onto the bench with your right foot, pushing off your foot to raise your body up onto the bench.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Step Up
instructions: ["Stand in front of a step or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold kettlebells at your shoulders.\\", "Step up onto the bench with your right foot, pushing off your foot to raise your body up onto the bench.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Windmill Bottom Hand
instructions: ["Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart. Hold the kettlebell in your bottom hand and extend the other arm above your head.\\", "Keeping your legs straight and the kettlebell inside your thigh, lower the kettlebell towards the ground, twisting your body towards the side of the raised arm.\\", "Return to the starting position, tilt your pelvis forward and repeat.\\"]

title: Abdominals Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Lay on a ball or a Bosu ball with your feet firmly planted on the floor.\\", "Lean all the way back until you feel a stretch in your abdomen.\\", "Crunch upwards and hold for a 1-2 count.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Abdominals Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["After completing the desired amount of reps with the left arm, switch to the right arm and lean to the left.\\", "Reach up with your left arm and then lean slowly to the right. Lean until a stretch is felt in the obliques.\\"]

title: Abdominals Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Reach with both hands upwards until you can interlock your fingers.\\", "With your hands above your head, lean back until a stretch is felt in the abdominals.\\"]

title: Abdominals Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Lay on your stomach on the floor with your forearms flat on the ground.\\", "Extend your elbows and push your upper body upwards.\\", "Push your upper body upwards until you feel a stretch in your abs, then return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Standing Crunch
instructions: ["Use a double handle attachment and set the cable all the way to the top.\\", "Face away from the cable tower and walk a few steps forward.\\", "Push your hips back, and flex your abs.\\", "Return to the starting standing position and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Row Bar Kneeling Crunch
instructions: ["Use a double handle attachment and set the cable all the way to the top.\\", "Walk a few steps forward then fall into a kneeling position.\\", "Push your hips back and flex your abs, then push hips forward until in the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Kneeling Oblique Crunch
instructions: ["Use a rope attachment and set the cable all the way to the top.\\", "Walk a few steps forward then fall into a kneeling position.\\", "Push your hips back and flex your abs, then push hips forward until in the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Kneeling Crunch
instructions: ["Use a rope attachment and set the cable all the way to the top.\\", "Walk a few steps forward then fall into a kneeling position.\\", "Push your hips back and flex your abs, then push hips forward until in the starting position.\\"]

title: Band Crunch
instructions: ["Place the band at the highest anchor point you have available. Grab both ends of the band and fall into a kneeling position.\\", "Push your hips back flexing at the spine.\\", "Squeeze your abs and then extend at the hips and spine back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Overhead Carry
instructions: ["Start by standing upright with your feet shoulder-width apart. Hold a single weight plate overhead with both hands, keeping your arms extended straight above your head.\\", "Begin walking forward, taking slow and steady steps while maintaining a straight line. Your focus should be on maintaining balance and control of the weight plate overhead.\\", "As you walk, continue to keep your arms extended and the weight plate overhead. Try to maintain good posture and avoid leaning forward or backward, as this could result in losing control of the weight plate.\\", "Continue walking for a set distance or for a certain amount of time, keeping your focus on proper form and technique. When finished, return to the starting position and repeat as desired.\\"]

title: Plate Russian Twist
instructions: ["Start by sitting on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground\\", "Engage your core muscles by pulling your belly button toward your spine.\\", "Slowly twist your upper body to the right, keeping your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.\\", "Hold for a second and then twist to the left, holding for another second.\\"]

title: Plate Situp
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back on a mat with your legs bent and feet flat on the ground.\\", "Hold a weight plate over your head with both hands, making sure to keep your arms straight.\\", "Engage your core and use your abdominal muscles to sit up, keeping the weight plate towards the ceiling.\\"]

title: Weighted Forearm Plank
instructions: ["Get into a kneeling position with both forearms pressed into the ground.\\", "Place a weight plate on your back (or have a partner do it for you).\\", "Hold the plank for the allotted amount of time.\\"]

title: Weighted Hand Plank
instructions: ["Start in a kneeling position with your hands planted on the ground.\\", "Place a weight plate on your back or have a friend do it for you.\\", "Pick your knees up off the ground. Hold in this position with a flat back.\\"]

title: Plate Hollow Hold
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with your arms extended over head holding a weight plate.\\", "Pick your upper back and your legs off the ground. Your body should be in a banana shape.\\"]

title: Weighted Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start from a plank position. Place a plate on your back.\\", "Go to one elbow then the other. Try to avoid rocking back and forth.\\"]

title: TRX Forearm Plank
instructions: ["Lie face down on the ground and place your forearms on the ground directly under your shoulders.\\", "With your feet in the stirrups, kick both feet into the TRX straps and hold the handles above your head.\\", "Tighten your abs, glutes, and legs to form a straight line from your head to your feet.\\"]

title: TRX Hand Plank
instructions: ["Start by facing away from the TRX straps and placing your feet in the TRX handles with your palms on the ground.\\", "Lift your knees off the ground to begin the set.\\", "Engage your core and maintain this position for the desired amount of time, holding a steady plank.\\"]

title: TRX Kneeling Ab Rollout
instructions: ["Begin in a kneeling position with the TRX straps adjusted to mid-calf length.\\", "Grasp the TRX handles with both hands, keeping your arms extended and your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Keep your abs engaged, roll forward onto your toes, and extend your arms in front of you.\\", "Slowly lower your body down to the ground, keeping your arms straight and your abs engaged.\\"]

title: TRX Knee Tuck
instructions: ["Place your feet in the TRX stirrups and get in to a hand plank position.\\", "Pull your knees to your chest and flex your abs.\\"]

title: TRX Mountain Climber
instructions: ["Start in a plank position with the TRX straps adjusted to mid-calf length. Place your feet in the TRX stirrups.\\", "Keep your abs engaged, and bring one knee towards your chest while keeping the other leg extended behind you.\\", "Switch legs, bringing the opposite knee towards your chest while keeping your abs engaged and your back straight.\\"]

title: TRX Pike
instructions: ["Place your feet in the stirrups and get in to a plank position.\\", "Pull your hips straight up toward the ceiling.\\", "Lower your hips until you're back in a plank position.\\"]

title: Urdhva Dhanurasana Wheel Pose
instructions: ["Lie down on your back with your feet hip-distance apart and your knees bent.\\", "Place your hands on the floor beside your head, fingertips pointing towards your shoulders.\\", "Push your feet and hands into the floor, lift your hips up and straighten your arms.\\", "Lift your chest towards the ceiling and hold the pose for a few breaths before lowering back down.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Forearm Plank
instructions: ["Place forearms on Bosu, elbows under shoulders.\\", "Extend legs, keeping body straight.\\", "Hold the plank position, engaging core.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Hand Plank
instructions: ["Place hands on Bosu, shoulder-width apart.\\", "Extend legs, keeping body straight.\\", "Hold the plank position, engaging core.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Plank Glute Kickback
instructions: ["Start in a plank position with Bosu under feet.\\", "Lift one leg back, squeezing glutes.\\", "Lower the leg back down and switch sides.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Situp
instructions: ["Lie on back, bosu elevated toward the ceiling.\\", "Sit up, engaging core muscles.\\", "Lower back down to complete one situp.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Toe Tap
instructions: ["Stand in front of a low box.\\", "Bring one foot to the edge of the box and alternate as quickly as possible.\\", "Only lightly tap your feet to the box.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Up And Over
instructions: ["Stand next to Bosu, step up and over it.\\", "Repeat, moving laterally side to side.\\", "Keep a steady pace, engaging core muscles.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Walkover Pushup
instructions: ["Place both hands on Bosu, wider than shoulder-width.\\", "Perform a pushup, then walk hands to the other side.\\", "Perform another pushup, repeat back and forth.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Crunch
instructions: ["Hold the rope attachment and lay flat.\\", "Flex your spine and curl your upper back off the ground.\\"]

title: Toe Tap
instructions: ["Stand in front of a low box.\\", "Bring one foot to the edge of the box and alternate as quickly as possible.\\", "Only lightly tap your feet to the box.\\"]

title: Cardio Forward Scissor
instructions: ["Do a light hop and split your stance.\\", "Land lightly on your toes, and then bring the opposing leg forward.\\"]

title: Cardio In And Out Forward
instructions: ["Bring one leg forward and then the other.\\", "Bring the original leg backwards and then the other.\\"]

title: Cardio Ski Erg
instructions: ["Leap sideways, land on right foot, left leg behind to the side.\\", "Drop into a single-leg burpee, right leg only, hands to ground.\\", "Return to standing on right, leap sideways to left, repeat with left leg.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Hanging Knee Tuck
instructions: ["Put a hip thrust pad on the smith machine bar at neck height. Put both arms over the bar and pull your feet off the ground.\\", "Pull your knees to your chest and flex your abs.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Reverse Crunch Hip Raise
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground. With your feet on the bar.\\", "Lift your hips off the ground.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Situp
instructions: ["Set up the Smith machine bar at an appropriate height.\\", "Lie on your back beneath the bar, gripping it with your hands.\\", "Engage your core, lift your upper body toward the bar, and exhale.\\", "Lower your upper body back down in a controlled manner, inhaling.\\"]

title: Core Stability Regression Crosslateral Limb Raise Push Up Position
instructions: ["Bring yourself to a strict push-up position\\", "Tap the hand of the working arm on the ground to find your balance. Raise opposite limbs till they are parallel to the ground\\", "Hold for a split second and then try to bring your elbow to your opposite knee by driving both towards the centre of the body.\\", "Spine might curve slightly but you should not shift your hips during the movement.\\"]

title: Bosu Serratus Activation Active Plank
instructions: ["Support your weight on your forearms and toes (plank).\\", "Allow your upper back to sink in between the shoulder blades.\\", "Push your elbows into the ground and slightly forward, and move the shoulder blades away from the spine.\\"]

title: Serratus Activation Active Plank
instructions: ["Support your weight on your forearms and toes (plank).\\", "Allow your upper back to sink in between the shoulder blades.\\", "Push your elbows into the ground and slightly forward, and move the shoulder blades away from the spine.\\"]

title: Dead Bugs Same Side
instructions: ["Lay on your back. Extend your straight arms above the chest and raise your bent knees till they are over your hips.\\", "Lower limbs of the same side towards the ground. You can feel the ground but do not rest on or tap off of the ground.\\", "Maintain a flat lower back throughout the movement (lower back should be in contact with the ground).\\"]

title: Dead Bugs Cross Lateral
instructions: ["Lay on your back. Extend your straight arms above the chest and raise your bent knees till they are over your hips.\\", "Lower opposite limbs towards the ground. You can feel the ground but do not rest on or tap off of the ground.\\", "Maintain a flat lower back throughout the movement (lower back should be in contact with the ground).\\"]

title: Core Stability 5 Crosslateral Limb Raise Into Knee Elbow Tuck Push Up Position
instructions: ["Bring yourself to a strict push-up position\\", "Raise opposite limbs till they are parallel to the ground\\", "Hold for a split second and then try to bring your elbow to your opposite knee by driving both towards the centre of the body.\\", "Spine might curve slightly but you should not shift your hips during the movement.\\"]

title: Core Stability 4 Crosslateral Limb Raise Push Up Position
instructions: ["Bring yourself to a strict push-up position\\", "Maintain a toe placement roughly at shoulder width (the wider the leg stance the easier the exercise - the narrower the stance the more difficult it becomes.\\", "Tap your opposite shoulder with your fingertips.\\", "Do not tilt or shift your hips. Do not round or arch your back.\\"]

title: Core Stability 1 Crosslateral Limb Raise 4Pt Position
instructions: ["Bring yourself to the 4 point position (on all fours)\\", "90\u00b0 angles at hips and shoulder and neutral spine\\", "Raise opposite limbs till they are parallel to the ground\\", "Hold for a split second and bring back to starting position\\"]

title: Leg Lowers
instructions: ["Lie on your back. Raise your legs but bend your knees\\", "Keep a 90\u00b0 angle at hips and knees. Lower your toes to the ground without bending your knees\\", "Make sure you maintain a flat lower back against the ground throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Bench Lift Off Active
instructions: ["While seated on a bench, place your palms on the bench by your sides\\", "Palm placement should allow room for the fingers to grip the edge of the bench\\", "Try to lift your bodyweight off the bench by pushing the palms into the bench\\", "Lockout your elbows and repeat or hold isometrically\\"]

title: Bench Lift Off Static
instructions: ["While seated on a bench, place your palms on the bench by your sides\\", "Palm placement should allow room for the fingers to grip the edge of the bench\\", "Try to lift your bodyweight off the bench by pushing the palms into the bench\\", "Lockout your elbows and hold isometrically\\"]

title: Barbell Calf Jump
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.\\", "Shift your weight onto the balls of your feet and raise stay flat footed. Using your calf muscles, mimic a jumping motion but don't leave the floor.\\", "Explode onto your tip toes and hold for a second.\\", "Bring your heels back to the floor then initiate the next rep.\\"]

title: Barbell Seated Calf Raise
instructions: ["Start by sitting on a bench with a barbell resting on your knees. Your feet should be flat on the ground, about hip-width apart.\\", "Place your hands on the barbell for support, and lift your heels off the ground.\\", "Hold this position for a moment, then slowly lower your heels back to the ground.\\"]

title: Barbell Toes Up Calf Raise
instructions: ["Begin by standing on a raised surface (such as a step or box) with the balls of your feet on the edge of the surface and your heels hanging off. Hold a barbell across your upper back and shoulders, using an overhand grip.\\", "Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, push through the balls of your feet to raise your heels up as high as you can.\\", "Lower your heels back down to the starting position, allowing your calves to stretch.\\"]

title: Landmine Calf Raise
instructions: ["Stand facing the barbell, holding the end of the barbell close to your chest in both hands with your elbows tucked in to your sides.\\", "Drive though the balls of your feet to raise your heels off the ground, squeezing your calves, with a focus on making sure your ankles do not turn out or in.\\", "Lower your heels back down to the ground and repeat for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Calf Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall with your feet on the ground. You can put the the balls of your feet on top of a plate to extend the range of motion.\\", "Imagine you have a string attached to your heels and pull your heels up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Calf Raise
instructions: ["Start by sitting on a bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and a dumbbell in each hand placed on each leg.\\", "From this starting position, raise your heels as high as you can by pushing up through your toes.\\", "Slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position, and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Leg Calf Raise
instructions: ["Standing straight with a dumbbell in one hand, lift the same foot as the side without the dumbbell off the floor. Hold onto something for balance.\\", "Raise your heel upwards while keeping your knees stationary.\\", "Pause when your heels are fully extended and then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Tip Toe Walking
instructions: ["Point your toes into the floor.\\", "Slowly walk forwards and backward\\", "Keep your heels in the air as long as possible while walking.\\", "It may be beneficial to do this last at the end of your workout.\\"]

title: Calf Raises
instructions: ["Balance on the balls of your feet on the platform or plates, leaning forward to use the wall to assist with balance.\\", "Lower the heels of your feet towards the ground and pause, then push through the balls of your feet like you are standing tip toe, pausing at the apex of the motion.\\", "Repeat as necessary.\\"]

title: Walking Calf Raises
instructions: ["Walk forward and push your toe into the ground\\", "Lift you heel off the ground each step and tense your calf muscle\\", "Repeat on each leg and walk forward slowly\\"]

title: Bodyweight Donkey Calf Raise
instructions: ["Hold on to something for balance.\\", "Hinge forward and maintain that position. Calf raise until you feel a contraction in your calfs.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Single Leg Calf Raise
instructions: ["Hold onto something for balance. Raise one foot off the ground.\\", "Raise your heel upwards while keeping your knees stationary.\\", "Pause when your heels are fully extended and then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Machine Standing Calf Raises
instructions: ["Adjust the machine in accordance with your height and place your shoulders underneath the padded lever.\\", "The balls of your feet should be supporting your weight on the calve block, your heels extending off of it.\\", "Extend your heels upwards while keeping your knees stationary, and pause at the contracted position.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Machine Seated Calf Raises
instructions: ["Get comfortable on the machine, then place your lower thighs beneath the padded lever. Place your toes and the balls of your feet onto the foot supports.\\", "Prevent the weight from slipping forward by gripping the handles, and release the safety bar.
