Lower the weight until your calves are extended.\\", "Push your heels up to lift the padded lever and hold the contracted position, then slowly lower back down to the starting position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Machine Horizontal Leg Press Calf Jump
instructions: ["Start with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.\\", "Shift your weight onto the balls of your feet and raise stay flat footed. Using your calf muscles, mimic a jumping motion but don't leave the platform.\\", "Explode onto your toes and hold for a second.\\"]

title: Machine Horizontal Leg Press Calf Raise
instructions: ["Adjust the machine in accordance with your height.\\", "The balls of your feet should be supporting your weight on the bottom of the platform, your heels extending off of it.\\", "Extend your heels upwards while keeping your knees stationary, and pause at the contracted position.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Machine Donkey Calf Raise
instructions: ["Adjust the machine to fit your height. Place your elbows on the pad, grab the handles. The vertical pad should be resting on your lower back.\\", "Raise your heels toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Machine 45 Degree Calf Raise
instructions: ["Adjust the machine in accordance with your height and sit.\\", "The balls of your feet should be supporting your weight on the calve block, your heels extended off of it.\\", "Extend your heels upwards while keeping your knees stationary, and pause at the contracted position.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Calf Raise
instructions: ["Sit on the machine and press your back into the back pad.\\", "Place the balls of your feet on the edge of the foot plate.\\", "Let your heels lower until you feel a stretch in your calves, then press back up until you feel a contraction.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Leg Calf Raise
instructions: ["Standing straight with a kettlebell in one hand, lift the same foot as the side without the kettlebell off the floor.\\", "Raise your heel upwards while keeping your knees stationary.\\", "Pause when your heels are fully extended and then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Calf Raise
instructions: ["Standing straight with a kettlebell in each hand, raise your heels upwards while keeping your knees stationary.\\", "Pause when your heels are fully extended and then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Seated Calf Raise
instructions: ["Sitting comfortably on a chair with your core stomach muscles engaged, place your feet on the floor.\\", "Place the kettlebell on your legs, just above the knees and raise your heels upwards off the floor.\\", "Pause when your heels are fully extended and then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Calf Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall with your feet on the ground. You can put the the balls of your feet on top of a plate to extend the range of motion.\\", "Imagine you have a string attached to your heels and pull your heels up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Goblet Calf Raise
instructions: ["Standing straight with a kettlebell in a goblet position, raise your heels upwards while keeping your knees stationary.\\", "Pause when your heels are fully extended and then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Leg Single Arm Calf Raise
instructions: ["Standing straight with a kettlebell in one hand, lift the opposing foot off the floor.\\", "Raise your heel upwards while keeping your knees stationary.\\", "Pause when your heels are fully extended and then slowly return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Seated Calf Raise Double
instructions: ["Start by sitting on a bench with a barbell resting on your knees. Your feet should be flat on the ground, about hip-width apart.\\", "Place your hands on the barbell for support, and lift your heels off the ground.\\", "Hold this position for a moment, then slowly lower your heels back to the ground.\\"]

title: Calves Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Balance the balls of your feet on the platform, leaning forward to use the wall to assist with balance. Engage your calves so that your feet are flat before beginning the stretch.\\", "Lower the heels of your feet towards the ground and pause, then push through the balls of your feet like you are standing tip toe, pausing at the apex of the stretch.\\", "Repeat as necessary.\\"]

title: Calves Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["With both feet flat on the ground, place one leg in front of your shoulder, your other leg should mirror this position behind your other shoulder. In the starting position both of your knees should be straight.\\", "Place the palms of your hands against the wall at shoulder height in front of you, lean towards the wall and bend your front leg at the knee while keeping your back leg straight.\\", "Pause at the apex of the stretch and return to the starting position. Switch the position of your legs and repeat.\\"]

title: Calves Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Place the ball of your foot against the wall with your heel on the ground. Place your hands on the wall in front of your shoulders.\\", "Keeping your knee straight, slowly lean towards the wall, pause for a few seconds when you feel the stretch extending through your calf muscle.\\", "Return to the starting position, and repeat the stretch with your other leg.\\"]

title: Cable Calve Raise
instructions: ["Use a straight bar or ez bar attachment with the cable set all the way to the bottom.\\", "Walk a few steps back.\\", "Pull your heels straight up until you feel a contraction in your calves and then back to original position.\\"]

title: Cable Bar Calve Raise
instructions: ["Use a straight bar or ez bar attachment with the cable set all the way to the bottom.\\", "Walk a few steps back.\\", "Pull your heels straight up until you feel a contraction in your calves and then back to original position.\\"]

title: Cable Belt Calf Raise
instructions: ["Put on a dip belt and attach the cable carabiner to the chain/strap.\\", "Take a few steps back and stand tall. Raise up onto the balls of your feet and hold for a 1 count.\\"]

title: Band Calf Raise
instructions: ["Attach band to a low anchor point.\\", "Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Lean back slightly. Raise your heels straight up and down\\"]

title: TRX Calf Raise
instructions: ["Hold the TRX straps under your arms and the handles in your armpits.\\", "Lean forward against the straps.\\", "Keep your body straight and initiate the calf raise by raising your heels off the ground.\\"]

title: Downward Dog Toe To Heel
instructions: ["Begin in a downward-facing dog position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your feet hip-width apart.\\", "Lift your right foot off the mat and place your right toes on top of your left heel.\\", "Press your palms and fingers firmly into the mat and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, deepening the stretch in your hamstrings and calves.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, and then release by slowly walking your hands back out to a downward-facing dog position.\\"]

title: Pyramid Pose Calf Blocks
instructions: ["Start standing with a flat and vertical block on the matt\\", "Bend forward, placing hand on vertical block, and front of foot on the flat block.\\", "Press the bottom of your foot towards the ground, and repeat on each side.\\"]

title: Walk Your Downward Dog
instructions: ["Begin in a downward-facing dog position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your feet hip-width apart.\\", "Walk your feet towards your hands, bending your knees as needed to allow your heels to touch the mat.\\", "Press your palms and fingers into the mat and lift your hips up towards the ceiling to deepen the stretch in your hamstrings and calves.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, and then release by slowly walking your hands back out to a downward-facing dog position.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Calf Raise
instructions: ["Stand on Bosu with feet hip-width apart.\\", "Rise up on toes, squeezing calves.\\", "Lower heels back down to complete one rep.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Seated Calf Raise
instructions: ["Sit on the bench with the bar attachment over your legs.\\", "Raise your heels up to the ceiling.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Standing Calf Raise
instructions: ["Hold the two handles and stand tall.\\", "Raise your heels as high as possible.\\"]

title: Cardio Box Quick Feet
instructions: ["Stay light on your toes and tap both feet to the ground in quick succession.\\", "Move in a square pattern.\\"]

title: Cardio Criss Cross Jacks
instructions: ["Perform a jumping jack while crossing the feet.\\"]

title: Cardio Diamond Hop
instructions: ["With both feet, leap forward then back, then to the left, then to the right.\\"]

title: Cardio Figure Eight Sprint
instructions: ["Perform s sprint in a figure eight pattern.\\", "Make sure to stay low.\\"]

title: Cardio In In Out Out Shuffle
instructions: ["Start with your feet side by side.\\", "Bring one foot laterally, then the other.\\", "Return the first foot to its starting position, then the other.\\"]

title: Cardio Knee Taps
instructions: ["Stand straight, feet hip-width apart, engage core.\\", "Lift knees alternately, tap with same side hand.\\", "Continue rhythmically, maintain posture, increase speed as able.\\"]

title: Cardio Lateral Quick Feet
instructions: ["Start with a shoulder width stance.\\", "Quickly tap your feet while moving laterally.\\"]

title: Cardio Lateral Shuffle
instructions: ["Start with a wide stance.\\", "Shuffle sideways for a specified distance while maintaining a quarter squat position.\\"]

title: Cardio Long Jump
instructions: ["Stand feet shoulder-width, knees slightly bent, arms behind you, eyes forward.\\", "Swing arms backward, squat deeply, loading legs for explosive power.\\", "Swing arms, explode forward, extend legs mid-air, land softly on both feet.\\"]

title: Cardio Long Jump Shuffle Back
instructions: ["Stand feet shoulder-width, knees slightly bent, arms behind you, eyes forward.\\", "Swing arms backward, squat deeply, loading legs for explosive power.\\", "Swing arms, explode forward, extend legs mid-air, land softly on both feet.\\", "Shuffle back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Cardio Quick Feet
instructions: ["Quickly tap each foot to the ground.\\"]

title: Cardio Seal Jacks
instructions: ["Stand with feet together, arms in front at chest level, palms touching.\\", "Spread legs wide, simultaneously swing arms out to sides, palms facing forward.\\", "Jump back to starting position, bringing arms together again quickly. Repeat rhythmically.\\"]

title: Cardio Shuttle Sprint
instructions: ["Set up two cones at a specified distance.\\", "Stay low and sprint quickly to the second cone.\\", "Hinge forward and tap the cone, then turn and sprint to the original cone.\\", "Repeat for the desired time or reps.\\"]

title: Cardio Single Leg Forward Hop
instructions: ["Pick up one leg off the ground.\\", "Hop forward and backward quickly while staying on your toes.\\"]

title: Cardio Single Leg Lateral Hop
instructions: ["Pick up one leg off the ground.\\", "Hop laterally quickly while staying on your toes.\\"]

title: Cardio Skater To Single Leg Burpee
instructions: ["Leap sideways, land on right foot, left leg behind to the side.\\", "Drop into a single-leg burpee, right leg only, hands to ground.\\", "Return to standing on right, leap sideways to left, repeat with left leg.\\"]

title: Cardio Sprint In Place
instructions: ["Stand tall, feet hip-width apart, knees slightly bent, ready to move.\\", "Quickly drive knees up towards chest, alternating legs, pumping arms in rhythm.\\", "Gradually speed up, maintaining high knees and arm movement, breathe steadily.\\"]

title: Cardio Three Step Heismans
instructions: ["Start with a shoulder width stance.\\", "Stay on your toes, step right, tap your left toe to the ground, plant your right foot and raise your left leg.\\", "Then repeat in the opposite direction.\\"]

title: Treadmill Jog
instructions: ["Get the treadmill up to a comfortable speed where you are doing a light jog.\\"]

title: Treadmill Sprint
instructions: ["Get the treadmill up to a speed where you are doing a sprint.\\"]

title: Treadmill Walk
instructions: ["Get the treadmill up to a comfortable speed where you are doing a walk.\\"]

title: Jump Rope
instructions: ["Hold handles, elbows close, and jump with both feet together.\\", "Rotate wrists to swing the rope over your head.\\", "Jump as it reaches your feet, keeping a steady rhythm.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Seated Calf Raise
instructions: ["Start by sitting on a bench or box with the bar resting on your knees. Your feet should be flat on the ground, about hip-width apart.\\", "Place your hands on the barbell for support, and lift your heels off the ground.\\", "Hold this position for a moment, then slowly lower your heels back to the ground.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Calf Raise
instructions: ["Place the bar on your back\\", "Start with feet flat on the ground\\", "Extend your heels upwards while keeping your knees stationary, and pause at the contracted position.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Gastrocnemius Stretch Push Up Position
instructions: ["Get yourself in the pushup position.\\", "Straighten your knees and try to push one heel down towards the ground.\\", "Cross your other leg over the top to apply extra pressure to the stretch.\\"]

title: Calf Stretch On Box Bilateral
instructions: ["Stand on a box. From the standing position, shift your weight onto the balls of one foot.\\", "Lower the heels of your feet toward the ground, and hold the position for the duration specified\\", "You should feel your calf stretching.\\"]

title: Calf Raise Isometric Unilateral
instructions: ["From the standing position, shift your weight onto the balls of one foot.\\", "Raise your heel off the ground, and hold the position for the duration specified\\", "You should feel your calf working.\\"]

title: Soleus Stretch
instructions: ["Stand close to a wall on a narrow, staggered stance (toes of the back leg should be at the same level as the heel of the front leg).\\", "Keep your weight on the back leg as you bend your knees.\\", "Hold the position for the prescribed duration.\\"]

title: Seated Plantar Flexions
instructions: ["Sit on the floor using your palms or elbows to lean back onto.\\", "Attach one end of a band around your toes and hold onto the other.\\", "Point and flex the toes against the resistance.\\"]

title: Gastrocnemius Stretch Unilateral On Box
instructions: ["Stand on the edge of a box, knees extended.\\", "Bend one leg while allowing the weight to push the heel of your straight leg towards the ground.\\", "You should feel your calves being stretched.\\"]

title: Gastrocnemius Stretch Unilateral On Wall
instructions: ["Stand by a wall but not too close.\\", "Place the palms on the wall and extend one leg behind you, while slightly bending the front leg.\\", "Push the wall in order to drive the heel of the extended leg into the ground till you feel a stretch in your calf.\\"]

title: Gastrocnemius Stretch Bilateral On Box
instructions: ["Stand on the edge of a box, knees extended.\\", "Let your weight push your heels towards the ground.\\", "You should feel your calves being stretched.\\"]

title: Calf Raise 3B Soleus Bias Unilateral
instructions: ["From the standing position, bend your knees till you get to a squated or semi-squated position. Be close to a pole or squat rack to use for balance\\", "Maintain the squat while shifting your weight onto the working leg and raising the other off the ground\\", "Raise your heel off the ground\\", "Hold the position for a split second before lowering your heel again\\", "Do not rest at the bottom. As soon as you feel your heel touch the ground, repeat the movement\\"]

title: Calf Raise 3A Soleus Bias Bilateral
instructions: ["From the standing position, bend your knees till you get to a squated or semi-squated position\\", "Maintain the squat while raising both heels off the ground\\", "Hold the position for a split second before lowering your heels again\\", "Do not rest at the bottom. As soon as you feel your heels touch the ground, repeat the movement\\"]

title: Calf Raise 2D Unilateral From Box
instructions: ["Use the edge of a step to place the balls of one foot on\\", "Raise the heel, before lowering it below the level of the step, or until you feel a stretch in the calf\\", "Try pausing on both ends of range for a split second\\"]

title: Calf Raise 2C Eccentric Unilateral From Box
instructions: ["While standing on the edge of a step, use both legs to raise your heels, before shifting your weight onto the working leg\\", "Hold the top position for a split second and then very slowly lower your heel below the level of the step or until you start feeling a stretch in the calf\\", "Try to avoid muscular (calf) contraction while raising the heels and then exert muscular contraction on the eccentric phase\\"]

title: Calf Raise 2B Unilateral Floor
instructions: ["From the standing position, shift your weight onto onto one foot\\", "Raise the heel of the working leg off the ground, before lowering it back to the ground\\", "Do not rest at the bottom. As soon as you feel your heel touch the ground, repeat the movement\\", "You should feel your calf working\\"]

title: Calf Raise 2A Eccentric Unilateral Floor
instructions: ["Raise both heels off the ground, shift your weight onto the working leg while the opposite leg is suspended.\\", "Hold the top position for a split second and then very slowly lower your heel to the ground\\", "Try to avoid muscular (calf) contraction while raising the heel and then exert muscular contraction on the eccentric phase\\"]

title: Calf Raise 1E Bilateral Isometric Floor
instructions: ["From the standing position, shift your weight onto the balls of your feet\\", "Raise the heels off the ground, and hold the position for the duration specified\\", "You should feel your calves working\\"]

title: Calf Raise 1D Bilateral From Box
instructions: ["Use the edge of a step to place the balls of your feet on\\", "Raise the heels, before lowering them below the level of the step, or until you feel a stretch in the calves\\", "Try pausing on both ends of range for a split second\\", "You should feel your calves working\\"]

title: Calf Raise 1C Bilateral Eccentric From Box
instructions: ["While standing on the edge of a step, shift your weight on your toes while quickly raising the heals\\", "Hold the top position for a split second and then very slowly lower your heels below the level of the step until you start feeling a stretch in the calves\\", "Try to avoid muscular (calf) contraction while raising the heels and then exert muscular contraction on the eccentric phase\\", "Pause on both ends of range\\"]

title: Calf Raise 1B Bilateral Floor
instructions: ["From the standing position, shift your weight onto the balls of your feet\\", "Raise the heels off the ground, before lowering them back to the ground\\", "Do not rest at the bottom. As soon as you feel your heels touch the ground, repeat the movement\\", "You should feel your calves working\\"]

title: Calf Isometric On Step
instructions: ["Stand on the edge of a step (on the balls of your feet)\\", "Support your weight in this position for the given amount of time\\", "You should feel your calves working\\"]

title: Ankle Circle
instructions: ["Sit or stand, lift one foot slightly off the ground.\\", "Rotate your ankle in a circular motion.\\", "Complete the allotted amount of reps, then switch directions and repeat on the other foot.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Tibialis Raise
instructions: ["Sit on a box or bench, place your heels on a step or plate, and place dumbbells on your quads.\\", "Raise your toes straight toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Standing Tibialis Raise
instructions: ["Place your heels on a step or plate, and hold dumbbells to your side.\\", "Raise your toes straight toward the ceiling.\\", "Hold at the top for extra benefit. Slowly return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Seated Tibialis Raise
instructions: ["Sit on a box or bench, place your heels on a step or plate.\\", "Raise your toes straight toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dorsal Flexion Hold
instructions: ["From the standing position, raise your toes and balance on your heels for the given duration.\\", "Maintain a good upper body form.\\"]

title: Wall Supported Dorsal Flexion
instructions: ["Lean against a wall, raise your toes and balance on your heels for the given duration.\\", "Maintain a good upper body form.\\"]

title: Barbell Wrist Curl
instructions: ["Grab a straight bar with a supinated (underhand) grip.\\", "Kneel down next to a flat bench and place your forearms on the bench with your wrists just off the bench.\\", "Let the barbell pull down on your wrists until they are extended.\\", "Curl the barbell until your wrists are fully flexed.\\", "Lower in a controlled manner and repeat.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Wrist Curl
instructions: ["Grip the dumbbell with your palm facing upwards with your forearm rested against the bench.\\", "Slowly curl your wrist upwards in a semicircular motion.\\", "Return to starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Wrist Extension
instructions: ["Grab two dumbbells with an overhand grip and lay your forearms across your knees.\\", "Let your wrists flex fully, then extend your wrists.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Bench Wrist Curl
instructions: ["Grip the dumbbell with your palm facing upwards with your forearm rested against the bench.\\", "Slowly curl your wrist upwards in a semicircular motion.\\", "Return to starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Bench Wrist Curl
instructions: ["Drape one arm over a bench while holding a dumbbell. Point your palm toward the ceiling.\\", "Extend and curl your wrist against resistance.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Wrist Supinations Pronations
instructions: ["Sit by a bench or table and lean your arm on it.\\", "Hold a dumbbell/weight/lever on one end.\\", "Rotate the wrist so the palm faces down and up in succession.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Farmer Walk
instructions: ["Grab a dumbbell in each hand, arms straight down.\\", "Walk forward with a straight posture.\\"]

title: Dead Hang
instructions: ["Grip a pull-up bar with palms facing forward.\\", "Hang with arms fully extended.\\", "Hold for recommended amount of time, keeping your core engaged.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Farmers Carry
instructions: ["Hold two kettlebells in each hand.\\", "Keep your shoulders blades pulled back and walk for a specified duration.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Wrist Extension
instructions: ["Stand up straight with a kettlebell in both hands in front of your pelvis, with your forearms facing inwards.\\", "Flex your wrist upwards until wrists are fully extended.\\", "Lower to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Wrist Curl
instructions: ["Stand up straight with a kettlebell in both hands in front of your pelvis, with your forearms facing outwards.\\", "Flex your wrist towards your body until the kettlebell is level with your stomach.\\", "Lower to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Farmers March
instructions: ["Stand tall holding two kettlebells in each hand.\\", "March in place for the desired amount of reps or time.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Farmers March
instructions: ["Standing straight with a kettlebell in one hand, lift the knee of one leg off the floor to knee height.\\", "Bring the leg back to standing and repeat with the other leg, keeping the kettlebell on the same side.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Walking Farmers March
instructions: ["Standing straight with kettlebells, start walking towards a set point. Pulling your knee up toward the ceiling.\\", "Make sure to keep your chest tall and shoulder blades pulled back.\\", "Try to keep your stride distance roughly the same.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Bench Wrist Curl
instructions: ["Grip the kettlebells with your palm facing upwards with your forearm rested against the bench.\\", "Slowly curl your wrist upwards in a semicircular motion.\\", "Return to starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Farmers Walk
instructions: ["Standing straight with a kettlebell in one hand, walk for a specified distance or duration.\\", "Stay upright and don't lean to one side.\\"]

title: Forearms Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Raise your arm to shoulder height at 90 degrees to your body.\\", "Press lightly on your hand and push towards you.\\", "Rotate the arm across your body.\\", "Switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Forearms Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Place your hands together.\\", "Rotate your arms and hands 180 degrees.\\", "Hold at the peak of the stretch.\\", "Return to starting position.\\"]

title: Forearms Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Place your hand against a wall, palms facing upward, with finger tips touching.\\", "Slowly lean into your palm.\\", "Hold at the peak of the stretch.\\", "Return to starting position.\\"]

title: Forearms Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Place your palm flush against the wall.\\", "Take one step forward and straighten your arm slowly to extend your bicep.\\", "Hold at the peak of the stretch.\\", "Return to starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Wrist Curl
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. The cable should be set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Face away from the cable machine. Stagger your stance so you have a better base of support.\\", "Start with your elbow at a 90\u00b0 angle with your palm facing up. Flex and extend at the wrist.\\"]

title: Cable Wrist Extension
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. The cable should be set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Face away from the cable machine. Stagger your stance so you have a better base of support.\\", "Start with your elbow at a 90 degree angle with your palm facing down. Flex and extend at the wrist.\\"]

title: Cable Bar Reverse Grip Curl
instructions: ["Use a bar attachment. The cable should be set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Face the cable machine.\\", "Stagger your stance so you have a better base of support. Face your palm down. Flex at the elbow and extend.\\"]

title: Plate Pinch Grip Side Bend
instructions: ["Stand straight with the plate held at your side\\", "Keep your hips and shoulders facing forward, bend to one side slowly\\", "Return to the upright position.\\", "Switch hands and repeat\\"]

title: Plate Pinch Grip Farmer's Carry
instructions: ["Stand tall holding two plates in each hand with a pinch grip.\\", "Walk for the desired distance or time.\\"]

title: Plate Weighted Dead Hang
instructions: ["Attach weight to yourself using a dip belt. Grip a pull-up bar with palms facing forward.\\", "Hang with arms fully extended.\\", "Hold for recommended amount of time, keeping your core engaged.\\"]

title: Table Top Pose Variation 1
instructions: ["Start in a tabletop position on your hands and knees with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.\\", "Turn your hands so that your fingers are pointing towards the sides of your mat and the tops of your hands are on the floor.\\", "Keep your arms straight and your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Hold the pose for several breaths or as long as is comfortable.\\"]

title: Table Top Pose Variation 2
instructions: ["Start in a tabletop position on your hands and knees with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.\\", "Turn your hands so that your fingers are pointing towards your knees and the tops of your hands are on the floor.\\", "Keep your arms straight and your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Hold the pose for several breaths or as long as is comfortable.\\"]

title: Table Top Pose Variation 3
instructions: ["Come onto your hands and knees on the mat with your wrists directly under your shoulders and your knees under your hips.\\", "Turn your palms down and spread your fingers wide, with your fingertips pointing towards your knees.\\", "Press into your palms and extend your arms fully to lift your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, and then release by slowly lowering your hands to the mat and coming back to a neutral tabletop position.\\"]

title: Vajrasana Variation 1
instructions: ["Begin in a kneeling position with your knees together and your shins and feet on the floor.\\", "Sit back on your heels and place your palms face down on your thighs, with your fingers pointing towards your knees.\\", "Relax your shoulders and take deep breaths.\\", "Hold the pose for several breaths or as long as is comfortable.\\"]

title: Crosslateral Core Stabilisation Unilateral Load Kettlebell
instructions: ["Begin by standing with your feet hip-width apart and holding a kettlebell at one side of your body, with your palms facing your thighs.\\", "Hing forward with a flat back and lift the kettlebell.\\", "Hold the kettlebell at your side and make sure to not lean to one side.\\"]

title: Seated Wrist Flexor Stretch
instructions: ["Bring one arm in front of you palm facing up, elbow straight and shoulder relaxed.\\", "With your other hand hold onto the palm and force it into passive extension.\\", "This will stretch your wrist flexors.\\"]

title: Seated Wrist Extensor Stretch
instructions: ["Raise one arm keeping your shoulder relaxed.\\", "Hold the back of your palm with the other hand and passively flex the wrist.\\", "You should feel a stretch on the top part of your arm.\\"]

title: Wrist Extensor Mobilisation
instructions: ["Kneel by a bench placing the arm you want to mobilise on, palm facing down.\\", "Bring a massage ball to the top of your forearm and move it around applying gentle pressure.\\", "Find the right/sore spot.\\", "You can move your wrist in various directions in order to mobilise your wrist extensors.\\"]

title: Wrist Extensor Kneeling Hold
instructions: ["Drape your forearm over a bench.\\", "Hold a dumbbell in a neutral wrist position with your palm facing downwards.\\"]

title: Ulnar Deviations
instructions: ["Stand up straight holding a dowel/lever/weight in one hand.\\", "Hold the weight so it points behind you and towards the ground.\\", "Squeeze your grip to raise the weight.\\"]

title: Barbell Wrist Extension
instructions: ["Grab a barbell with an overhand grip and lay your forearms across a bench.\\", "Let your wrists flex fully, then extend your wrists.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Bench Wrist Extension
instructions: ["Grab two dumbbells with an overhand grip and lay your forearms across a bench.\\", "Let your wrists flex fully, then extend your wrists.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Bench Wrist Extension
instructions: ["Grab two kettlebells with an overhand grip and lay your forearms across a bench.\\", "Let your wrists flex fully, then extend your wrists.\\"]

title: Barbell Stiff Leg Deadlifts
instructions: ["Stand with a barbell at your shins with your feet shoulder width apart.\\", "Bend forward at your hips and keep your knees as fully extended as possible.\\", "Grab the barbell and then extend your hips while maintaining a straight back.\\", "From the standing position, lower the weight in a controlled manner.\\", "You can either lower the weight to the floor or before you touch the floor, depending on your mobility.\\"]

title: Barbell Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sit on the ground with a bench behind you. Have the barbell over your legs just above your hips.\\", "Lean back against the bench so that your shoulders are resting upon it, stretch your arms out to either side using the bench as support.\\", "Raise the weight by driving through your feet and extending your hips upwards. Support the weight with your shoulders and feet.\\", "Slowly extend as far as you can, and then slowly return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with your mid-foot under the bar and grip the bar with your hands, about a shoulder width apart.\\", "Bend your knees, then lift the bar by straightening your back. It is important to keep your back straight.\\", "Stand to your full height and hold.\\", "Lower the bar to the floor by bending your knees and keeping your back straight.\\"]

title: Barbell Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Place the barbell on your back\\", "Step your foot back and around while simultaneously bringing the weight down.\\", "Return to start and repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Barbell Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: ["Find a box or bench that is roughly knee height or a few inches lower. (The lower the box is the lower the mobility requirement).\\", "You can either place your toes or the top of your foot on the box. Point your front foot forward or slightly turned outwards and break at the knees and hips simultaneously.\\", "Aim to get your front leg to hit parallel depth (hamstring parallel with the ground) or lower.\\", "The further forward your front foot is, the longer the Range of Motion is at your hips. The further back your front foot is, the longer the ROM at your knees.\\"]

title: Barbell Front Squat Bodybuilding
instructions: ["Measure your shoulders against the bar to make sure you're even. Throw your shoulders under the bar. The bar should be digging into your neck slightly.\\", "Make sure to push your elbows up to the ceiling for the entire rep. To make sure you don't get too pitched forward.\\", "Use the squat stance you would use for a back or goblet squat. Push your hips back to initiate the squat. Break at the knees until you hit parallel depth.\\", "Squat back up to a standing position.\\"]

title: Barbell High Bar Squat
instructions: ["Place the bar on top of your traps.\\", "Push your hips back and break at the knees. Push your elbows forward to keep yourself from getting pitched too far forward.\\", "Aim to get your hamstrings to parallel with the floor.\\", "Push your heels into the floor and squat back to a standing position.\\"]

title: Barbell Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell at your shoulders with an overhand grip.\\", "Step forward with your right foot and bend both knees to lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Front Rack Step Up
instructions: ["Stand in front of a step or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell at your shoulders with an overhand grip.\\", "Step up onto the bench with your right foot, pushing off your foot to raise your body up onto the bench.\\", "Bring your left foot up onto the bench and stand up straight, keeping the barbell at your shoulders.\\", "Step back down with your left foot, followed by your right foot, to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lie on your back on the floor with your knees bent and your feet flat on the ground. Place a barbell across your hips and grasp it with both hands.\\", "Keeping your arms straight, push through your heels to lift your hips off the ground and raise the barbell.\\", "Hold the bridge position for a moment, then slowly lower your hips back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Heels Up Back Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your heels on a plate or low step.\\", "Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position.\\", "Push through your heels to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Heels Up Front Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and feet on a plate. Place the bar in a front rack position.\\", "Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your heels raised off the ground.\\", "Push through your heels to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell at your shoulders with an overhand grip.\\", "Step out to the side with your right foot and bend your right knee to lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Repeat on the opposite side by stepping out with your left foot.\\"]

title: Barbell Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet about hip-width apart, with a barbell on your shoulders. Your feet should be slightly pointed outward, and your shoulders should be down and relaxed.\\", "Step backward with one foot, lowering your body until your front thigh is parallel to the ground and your back knee is hovering just above the ground.\\", "Push off your back foot, returning to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Side Step Up
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet about hip-width apart, with a barbell on your shoulders. Your feet should be slightly pointed outward, and your shoulders should be down and relaxed.\\", "Place a step or box beside you, and step up onto it with one foot. Your other foot should remain on the ground.\\", "Push off your grounded foot, raising your body up onto the step.\\", "Step back down with the same foot, returning to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Split Squat
instructions: ["Take a large step forward with one leg, and lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the ground. Your front knee should be bent at a 90-degree angle, and your back leg should be straight.\\", "Push through the heel of your front foot to raise your body back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Step Up Balance
instructions: ["Begin by standing in front of a sturdy box or bench that is about knee-height, holding a barbell across your upper back and shoulders, using an overhand grip.\\", "Place your right foot on the box and push through the heel to lift your body up and onto the box, keeping your left foot off the ground.\\", "Step back down with your right foot, lowering your left foot to the ground.\\"]

title: Barbell Step Up
instructions: ["Begin by standing in front of a sturdy box or bench that is about knee-height, holding a barbell across your upper back and shoulders, using an overhand grip.\\", "Place your right foot on the box and push through the heel to lift your body up and onto the box.\\", "Step back down with your right foot.\\"]

title: Barbell Tap Pause Squat
instructions: ["Begin by standing in front of a sturdy box or bench that is about knee-height, holding a barbell across your upper back and shoulders, using an overhand grip.\\", "Sit back and lower your body down until your glutes tap the top of the box, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.\\", "Push through your heels to extend your hips and stand up, bringing your body back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Feet Elevated Figure Four Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a box, the barbell placed over your hips, and cross one leg over the other.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Feet Elevated Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a box, the barbell placed over your hips.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Feet Elevated Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a box, the barbell placed over your hips. Raise one leg up and off the box.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Feet Elevated Staggered Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a box, the barbell placed over your hips. Place one foot about 6-9 inches in front of the other.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Landmine Alternating Lunge And Twist
instructions: ["Set up the landmine attachment and load weight.\\", "Stand facing the landmine, holding the weight away from your chest.\\", "Step backward with one leg, lunge down while twisting your torso toward the front leg, return to starting position, and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Landmine Alternating Lunge To Chest Press
instructions: ["Stand facing the landmine with feet hip-width apart and holding the end of the landmine barbell with both hands, keeping elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Step backward with the right foot, lunge down, and press the landmine away from your chest.\\", "Push through the left heel to return to the starting position while pulling the landmine back to your chest.\\", "Repeat on the opposite side, alternating for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Stand facing the barbell while holding the end of the bar at your side with one hand.\\", "With the leg on the same side of your body as the barbell, lunge backward and across your body at a 45 degree angle while keeping your weight on your front heel to lower your back knee gently to the ground.\\", "Drive through your front heel as you step back to the starting position, and repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Glute Kick Back
instructions: ["Start on your hands and knees perpendicular to the barbell with the end of the barbell resting on the inside of your knee that is closer to the bar.\\", "Keeping your core braced, your back flat, and your moving leg bent at a 90 degree angle, drive the heel of your working leg up the ceiling while squeezing your glute.\\", "Follow the movement path as you bring your knee back down to the ground beneath your hip, keeping your knee bent to maintain control of the barbell.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Goblet Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Start facing the barbell while holding the end of the bar in the goblet position in front of your chest with your elbows close to your sides.\\", "Step backward and across your body with one leg at a 45 degree angle while keeping your weight on your front heel to gently lower your back knee to the ground.\\", "Drive through your front heel as you step back up and to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps before switching legs.\\"]

title: Landmine Goblet Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Start facing the barbell while holding the end of the bar close to your chest in the goblet position with your elbows tucked in close to your body.\\", "Step directly out to the side with both toes pointing forward. Keep your weight on the heel of the leg you step out with as you sink down over that foot while your other leg remains straight for balance.\\", "Drive through the heel over which you have centered your body as you step back to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Hack Squat
instructions: ["Start facing away from the landmine attachment with the end of the barbell resting on one shoulder against the base of your neck while leaning slightly back into the weight of the barbell.\\", "Squat down with control while keeping the weight of the barbell as close to centered over your midpoint as possible, then drive through your heels to stand all the way back up and return to starting position.\\", "Repeat for desired number of reps, then switch the side of your body the barbell is on every subsequent set.\\"]

title: Landmine Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Stand facing the landmine with your feet shoulder width apart while holding the end of the barbell in your hands with your arms fully extended down towards the ground.\\", "While keeping your torso tall and core engaged, step directly out to one side, using the foot you have stepped out with to sit down into the lunge while keeping your other leg straight.\\", "Drive through your heel on your bent leg as your step together to return to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for desired number of reps on the same side before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Lunge
instructions: ["Stand in front of the landmine with your feet hip-width apart and your back straight. Grasp the landmine barbell with one hand, holding it at at your side with your palm facing in towards your leg.\\", "Take a step backward with your foot on the same side that you're holding the barbell, lowering your body into a lunge position. Bend both knees to lower your body down until your front thigh is parallel to the ground, or as low as your flexibility allows. Keep your torso upright, your chest lifted, and your core engaged throughout the movement.\\", "Push through the heel of your front foot to return to the starting position. Repeat for desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Lunge To Overhead Press
instructions: ["Stand facing the landmine attachment while holding the end of the bar with one hand at your shoulder on the same side with your elbow tucked to your body underneath your wrist.\\", "Step back with the leg on the same side that you are holding the bar on and with control lower yourself down into a lunge position while keeping your core engaged and torso tall, then drive through your front heel as you step back to the starting position.\\", "Once your feet are back in the starting position, drive the bar up overhead until your arm is fully extended, then lower the bar back down to the starting position.\\", "Repeated for the desired number of reps, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Rotational Lift To Press
instructions: ["Stand perpendicularly to the barbell with the end of the bar in front of your feet. Squat down and hold the end of the bar with your hand closer to the landmine attachment with your palm facing your body.\\", "Drive your feet into the ground to start the motion. As your legs fully extend, pull the bar upwards with your hand and start to rotate your torso in towards the landmine attachment. As you do so, bring your other hand up to the bar and switch your grip. Press through the bar to extend your arm all the way upright, pivoting your back foot to allow for more trunk rotation.\\", "Perform the movement in reverse to return to the starting position. Repeat for desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Setup a landmine with your back on a box.\\", "Lay the end of the bar over your hip.\\", "Push your hips toward the ceiling until you feel a contraction, then bring your hips back toward the floor.\\"]

title: Landmine Squat
instructions: ["Hold the end of the bar in a goblet position.\\", "Push your hips back and break at the knees.\\", "Reach at least parallel with the ground before pushing through your heels back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Landmine Sumo Deadlift
instructions: ["Stand with a wide stance and straddle over the end of the bar.\\", "Bend at the hips and knees, and grab the bar.\\", "Stand up with the bar.\\"]

title: Landmine Thruster
instructions: ["Hold the bar with a goblet position.\\", "Push your hips back and sink into a squat.\\", "Push through your heels and squat back up. Use the momentum you generate at the legs to push the bar over head.\\", "Let the bar return to the goblet position before starting the next rep.\\"]

title: Barbell Figure Four Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Put your shoulder blades on a bench and cross one leg over the other.\\", "Start with your hips up.\\", "Drop your hips and then push your hips up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Barbell Front Squat With Straps
instructions: ["Measure your shoulders against the bar to make sure you're even. Wrap a pair of lifting straps around the bar. Hold the ends of the straps. Throw your shoulders under the bar. The bar should be digging into your neck slightly.\\", "Make sure to push your elbows up to the ceiling for the entire rep. To make sure you don't get too pitched forward.\\", "Use the squat stance you would use for a back or goblet squat. Push your hips back to initiate the squat. Break at the knees until you hit parallel depth.\\", "Squat back up to a standing position.\\"]

title: Barbell Single Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on a bench with your foot on the ground and a barbell on your hips.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Figure Four Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Put your shoulder blades on a bench and cross one leg over the other. Put one foot on a low box or plate.\\", "Start with your hips up.\\", "Drop your hips and then push your hips up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Barbell Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sit on the ground with a bench behind you. Place both feet on a plate or low box. Have the barbell over your legs just above your hips.\\", "Lean back against the bench so that your shoulders are resting upon it, stretch your arms out to either side using the bench as support.\\", "Raise the weight by driving through your feet and extending your hips upwards. Support the weight with your shoulders and feet.\\", "Slowly extend as far as you can, and then slowly return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Single Leg Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on a bench with your foot on a plate or low box and a barbell on your hips.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Barbell Kickstand Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, one foot slightly behind. Bar on your back.\\", "Lower into a squat, keeping weight on front heel.\\", "Return to standing, engaging glutes and core.\\"]

title: Barbell Quad Stomp
instructions: ["Have the barbell in a high bar position and place your foot on a plate or a low box.\\", "Put all of your weight on your front foot and lean forward.\\", "Lower until your calves touch your hamstrings and then extend back up.\\"]

title: Barbell Front Rack Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, barbell in front rack, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Barbell Curtsy Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, barbell on your back, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Barbell Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, bar on your back, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Squat
instructions: ["Hold the weight tucked into your upper chest area, keeping your elbows in. Your feet should be slightly wider than shoulder width.\\", "Sink down into the squat, keeping your elbows inside the track of your knees.\\", "Push through your heels while keeping your chest up and return to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: ["Holding the dumbbell in a goblet squat place your foot on a bench or box.\\", "Break at the hips and knees. Try to go to the point where your hamstring is parallel with the ground. Or until your back knee taps the floor.\\", "Make sure to keep your back flat and your elbows directly under your fists.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Place your shoulder blades against a box or bench that won't move.\\", "Both your feet should be planted and your heels should not come off the floor. Point your toes forward.\\", "Break at the hips. Seek the longest range of motion possible. Focus on the top end of the movement. Push your hips as high as possible on each rep.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with both feet planted. Make sure you keep your heels glued to the floor.\\", "Place the dumbbell on your hips. Push your hips toward the ceiling until you feel your glutes contract.\\", "Then return to the floor.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: ["Find a box or bench that is roughly knee height or a few inches lower. (The lower the box is the lower the mobility requirement).\\", "You can either place your toes or the top of your foot on the box. Point your front foot forward or slightly turned outwards and break at the knees and hips simultaneously.\\", "Aim to get your front leg to hit parallel depth (hamstring parallel with the ground) or lower.\\", "The further forward your front foot is, the longer the Range of Motion is at your hips. The further back your front foot is, the longer the ROM at your knees.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing each other.\\", "Take a big step forward with your right foot, lowering your hips until your right thigh is parallel to the ground and your left knee is hovering just above the floor.\\", "Push through your right heel to straighten your right leg and return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet hip-width apart and a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Step your left foot behind and to the right of your right foot, crossing it behind your right leg.\\", "Bend your knees and lower your hips down and back, as if you were about to sit in a chair.\\", "Push through your right heel to straighten your right leg and return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Step forward with one of your legs while bending at your back leg. Bring your back knee to the floor or close to the floor.\\", "Push through your front leg explosively to get back to your starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine. This will help to stabilize your body. Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Take a large step to the side with your right foot, planting it firmly on the ground.\\", "As you step, bend your right knee and lower your hips until your right thigh is parallel to the ground. Your left leg should remain straight.\\", "Push through your right heel to return to the starting position. Repeat on the opposite side by stepping out with your left foot.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Take a big step backwards with your left leg, lowering your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground and your right knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\", "Push through your right heel to return to standing, bringing your left leg back to starting position.\\", "Repeat the movement on the other side, stepping backwards with your right leg and lowering your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground and your left knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Split Squat
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Take a large step forward with one leg, and lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the ground. Your front knee should be bent at a 90-degree angle, and your back leg should be straight.\\", "Push through the heel of your front foot to raise your body back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Lateral Lunge Reach
instructions: ["Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine. This will help to stabilize your body. Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Take a large step to the side with your right foot and reach toward the floor with your single dumbbell.\\", "As you step, bend your right knee and lower your hips until your right thigh is parallel to the ground. Your left leg should remain straight.\\", "Push through your right heel to return to the starting position. Repeat on the opposite side by stepping out with your left foot.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold two dumbbells by your side.\\", "Take a big step backwards with your left leg, lowering your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground and your right knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\", "Push through your right heel to return to standing, bringing your left leg back to starting position.\\", "Repeat the movement on the other side, stepping backwards with your right leg and lowering your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground and your left knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Split Squat
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Take a large step forward with one leg, and lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the ground. Your front knee should be bent at a 90-degree angle, and your back leg should be straight.\\", "Push through the heel of your front foot to raise your body back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Figure Four Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with one leg crossed over the other and your heel planted on the ground.\\", "Push your hips toward the ceiling and hold for a second.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Figure Four Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Put your shoulder blades on a bench and cross one leg over the other.\\", "Start with your hips up.\\", "Drop your hips and then push your hips up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Front Rack Squat
instructions: ["Place two dumbbells on your shoulders and push your elbows upward.\\", "Push your hips back and break at the knees.\\", "Hit parallel depth and then drive through your heels back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Pulse Squat
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell in goblet position.\\", "Squat down to parallel depth and then halfway back up.\\", "Stay in this short range of motion for the duration of the set.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Heels Up Goblet Squat
instructions: ["Take a half kneeling stance. The dumbbell should start over your knee that is up.\\", "Rotate at the spine and point the dumbbell to the opposing side.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Heels Up Narrow Goblet Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet on a plate. Your feet should be very close to one another, but not touching.\\", "Begin your squat by pushing your hips back and breaking at the knees. Try to keep your chest tall while squatting.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Offset Squat
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell over one shoulder.\\", "Initiate the squat by pushing your hips back.\\", "Avoid doing any twisting. Try to keep your shoulders even.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell on your hips.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell on your hips.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Staggered Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your feet on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand.\\", "Place one foot on the ground and the other slightly in front, with your knees bent.\\", "From this starting position, raise your hips up off the ground by pushing through your heels and squeezing your glutes.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Staggered Hip thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back on a bench with your feet on the ground and a dumbbell on your hips.\\", "Place one foot on the ground and the other slightly in front, with your knees bent.\\", "From this starting position, raise your hips up off the ground by pushing through your heels and squeezing your glutes.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Thruster
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in each hand.\\", "Bring the dumbbells to your shoulders, with your palms facing inward and your elbows bent.\\", "From this starting position, dip your knees slightly and then quickly extend them as you press the dumbbells upwards.\\", "As you press the dumbbells upwards, also push your hips forward to help generate additional power.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position, and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Feet Elevated Figure Four Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a box, the dumbbell placed over your hips, and cross one leg over the other.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Feet Elevated Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your knees bent and feet on top of a sturdy box, bench or elevated surface. Place a dumbbell over your hips.\\", "Drive through your heels to lift your hips off the floor, making sure to keep your feet and knees pointing forward.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Feet Elevated Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a box, the dumbbell placed over your hips. Raise one leg up and off the box.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Feet Elevated Staggered Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your knees bent and feet in a staggered position on the box.\\", "Drive through your heels to lift your hips off the floor, making sure to keep your feet and knees pointing forward.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Overhead Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and hold two dumbbells overhead with both hands, using an overhand grip.\\", "Begin the squat by bending at the hips and knees, keeping your core tight and the dumbbells balanced overhead.\\", "Lower your body as far as you can while keeping the dumbbells overhead, then push back up to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, making sure to keep your back straight, chest lifted, and the dumbbells stable overhead throughout the entire movement.\\"]

title: Single Arm Overhead Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and a dumbbell in your right hand, extending it overhead.\\", "Inhale and begin to squat down, keeping the dumbbell overhead and your back straight.\\", "Go down as far as you can while still maintaining control, then exhale and return to standing position, keeping the dumbbell overhead. Repeat for desired reps and then switch to the other arm.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Standing Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Stand with a dumbbell held on the side of your leg.\\", "Raise that leg laterally as high as your hip range of motion allows for.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Figure Four Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a box, the barbell placed over your hips, and cross one leg over the other.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sit on the ground with a bench behind you. Place both feet on a plate or low box. Have the dumbbell over your legs just above your hips.\\", "Lean back against the bench so that your shoulders are resting upon it, stretch your arms out to either side using the bench as support.\\", "Raise the weight by driving through your feet and extending your hips upwards. Support the weight with your shoulders and feet.\\", "Slowly extend as far as you can, and then slowly return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Leg Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on a bench with your foot on a plate or low box and a dumbbell on your hips.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Side Step Up
instructions: ["Begin by standing beside a sturdy box or bench that is about knee-height, holding a dumbbell with a goblet grip.\\", "Place your right foot on the box and push through the heel to lift your body up and onto the box.\\", "Step back down with your right foot.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Side Step Up
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet about hip-width apart, with a dumbbell in your hands. Your feet should be slightly pointed outward, and your shoulders should be down and relaxed.\\", "Place a step or box beside you, and step up onto it with one foot. Your other foot should remain on the ground.\\", "Push off your grounded foot, raising your body up onto the step.\\", "Step back down with the same foot, returning to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Step Up
instructions: ["Begin by standing in front of a sturdy box or bench that is about knee-height, holding a dumbbell with a goblet grip.\\", "Place your right foot on the box and push through the heel to lift your body up and onto the box.\\", "Step back down with your right foot.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Front Rack Step Up
instructions: ["Stand in front of a step or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold one dumbbell on your shoulder with an overhand grip.\\", "Step up onto the bench with your right foot, pushing off your foot to raise your body up onto the bench.\\", "Bring your left foot up onto the bench and stand up straight, keeping the barbell at your shoulders.\\", "Step back down with your left foot, followed by your right foot, to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Front Rack Step Up
instructions: ["Stand in front of a step or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold two dumbbells at your shoulders with an overhand grip.\\", "Step up onto the bench with your right foot, pushing off your foot to raise your body up onto the bench.\\", "Bring your left foot up onto the bench and stand up straight, keeping the barbell at your shoulders.\\", "Step back down with your left foot, followed by your right foot, to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Step Up
instructions: ["Stand in front of a step or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold one dumbbell on your side with a neutral grip.\\", "Step up onto the bench with your right foot, pushing off your foot to raise your body up onto the bench.\\", "Bring your left foot up onto the bench and stand up straight, keeping the barbell at your shoulders.\\", "Step back down with your left foot, followed by your right foot, to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Step Up
instructions: ["Stand in front of a step or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold two dumbbells on your side with a neutral grip.\\", "Step up onto the bench with your right foot, pushing off your foot to raise your body up onto the bench.\\", "Bring your left foot up onto the bench and stand up straight, keeping the barbell at your shoulders.\\", "Step back down with your left foot, followed by your right foot, to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Kickstand Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, one foot slightly behind. Hold dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Lower into a squat, keeping weight on front heel.\\", "Return to standing, engaging glutes and core.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Swing Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width. Dumbbells at your side.\\", "Step forward with your right foot and bend both knees to lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Step back with the same leg until the back knee taps the floor.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Alternating Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell at your chest, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step one leg diagonally back into a lunge.\\", "Alternate legs, keeping your chest up and core engaged.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Alternating Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Hold one dumbbell with one or both hands, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step out to one side, bending the knee.\\", "Push off, return to center, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Alternating Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold two dumbbells by your side.\\", "Take a big step backwards with your left leg, lowering your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground and your right knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\", "Push back up and switch legs, alternating each rep.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Alternating Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Stand tall, holding dumbbells by your sides, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step forward with one leg, lowering until both knees form 90\u00b0 angles.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, and switch legs.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Assisted Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: ["Grab a stick of some sort or hold onto something stable (rack, bench).\\", "Grab a box that is knee height or slightly lower.\\", "Hold the stick in your right arm, dumbbell in the other and put your right leg on the box.\\", "Begin your squat by breaking at the knees. Get your knee close to the floor or all the way to the floor. Make sure to keep your chest tall.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Front Rack Deficit Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, dumbbells in front rack position, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Deficit Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, dumbbell in a goblet position, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Deficit Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, dumbbells in both hands, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Quad Stomp
instructions: ["Place your front foot on a low box and take a split stance. Put all of your weight on your front foot.\\", "Break at the knees and lower yourself until your calves touch your hamstrings.\\", "Push yourself back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Curtsy Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, dumbbells in both hands, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Front Rack Curtsy Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, dumbbells in front rack, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Goblet Curtsy Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, dumbbell in goblet squat position, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Goblet Wall Squat
instructions: ["Place a stability ball against a wall at about hip height.\\", "Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Break at the hips and knees until you hit parallel or just below, then squat back up.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Stability Ball Wall Squat
instructions: ["Place a stability ball against a wall at about hip height.\\", "Hold two dumbbells in each hand.\\", "Break at the hips and knees until you hit parallel or just below, then squat back up.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Front Rack Stability Ball Wall Squat
instructions: ["Place a stability ball against a wall at about hip height.\\", "Hold two dumbbells in front rack position.\\", "Break at the hips and knees until you hit parallel or just below, then squat back up.\\"]

title: Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lie down with your knees bent and your feet flat on the floor.\\", "Push your hips up so that your butt is elevated and your back straight.\\", "Tense your glutes and raise your hips towards the ceiling.\\", "Once you are at the highest point you can manage, hold the position for a few seconds, and then slowly return to the starting position\\"]

title: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your back to a bench (or raised surface) and place one of your feet on the bench.\\", "Squat down until your front leg is about parallel to the floor.\\", "Go back to the starting position. After completing the desired amount of reps, switch legs and repeat.\\"]

title: Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Tense your glutes and raise your hips towards the ceiling.\\", "Once you are at the highest point you can manage, hold the position for a few seconds, and then slowly return to the starting position.\\", "Push your hips up, so that your butt is elevated and your back straight.\\", "Lie down with one knee bent and and one with a slight bend.\\"]

title: Side Lunges
instructions: ["Take a slow, lateral step to the right.\\", "Extend the left knee, and drive your weight into your right side.\\", "Flex your knee and lower your body.\\", "Push back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Forward Lunges
instructions: ["Step forward with one leg.\\", "Lower your body until your rear knee nearly touches the ground.\\", "Ensure you remain upright, and your front knee stay above the front foot.\\", "Push off the floor with your front foot until you return to the starting position. Switch legs.\\"]

title: Jump Squats
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Start by doing a regular squat, then engage your core and jump up explosively.\\", "When you land, lower your body back into the squat position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart.\\", "flex your knees and hips and sit back into the squat while lowering your body\\", "Continue down to full depth\\", "Return to starting position.\\"]

title: Kickbacks
instructions: ["Get down on all fours and position your hands under your shoulders and your knees under your hips.\\", "Kick back with one leg and squeeze your glutes.\\", "Slowly return to starting position by bending your knee and lowering your leg.\\", "Switch Legs. Repeat.\\"]

title: Assisted Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: ["Grab a stick of some sort or hold onto something stable (rack, bench).\\", "Grab a box that is knee height or slightly lower.\\", "Hold the stick in your right arm and put your right leg on the box.\\", "Begin your squat by breaking at the knees. Get your knee close to the floor or all the way to the floor. Make sure to keep your chest tall.\\"]

title: Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Step your left foot diagonally behind your right leg, crossing it behind your body. Bend your knees and lower your hips until your left thigh is parallel to the floor and your right knee is hovering just above the ground.\\", "Push through your right foot to straighten your legs and return to the starting position.\\", "Repeat the movement with your other leg.\\"]

title: Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Step forward with one leg and lower your body until your front thigh is parallel to the floor and your back knee almost touches the ground. Keep your chest up and your front foot flat on the floor.\\", "Push through your front foot to straighten your legs and return to the starting position.\\", "Repeat the movement with your other leg.\\"]

title: Heels Up Squat
instructions: ["Place your heels on a plate or very low step.\\", "Keep your chest tall and initiate the squat by pushing your hips back and breaking at the knees.\\", "You should notice yourself able to squat lower than normal.\\"]

title: Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine. This will help to stabilize your body.\\", "Take a large step to the side with your right foot, planting it firmly on the ground.\\", "As you step, bend your right knee and lower your hips until your right thigh is parallel to the ground. Your left leg should remain straight.\\", "Push through your right heel to return to the starting position. Repeat on the opposite side by stepping out with your left foot.\\"]

title: Split Squat
instructions: ["Take a split stance. Make sure to keep your chest tall.\\", "Bring your rear knee to the floor or close to it.\\", "Drive through your front heel and your rear foot back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Feet Elevated Figure Four Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your knees bent and feet on top of a sturdy box, bench or elevated surface.\\", "Drive through your heels to lift your hips off the floor, making sure to keep your feet and knees pointing forward.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Feet Elevated Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your knees bent and feet on top of a sturdy box, bench or elevated surface.\\", "Drive through your heels to lift your hips off the floor, making sure to keep your feet and knees pointing forward.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Feet Elevated Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your knees bent and feet on top of a sturdy box, bench or elevated surface. Lift one leg off the box.\\", "Drive through your heel to lift your hips off the floor, making sure to keep your feet and knees pointing forward.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Feet Elevated Staggered Glute Bridge
