instructions: ["Start by lying on your back with your knees bent and feet in a staggered position on the box.\\", "Drive through your heels to lift your hips off the floor, making sure to keep your feet and knees pointing forward.\\"]

title: Box Jump
instructions: ["Stand in front of a box.\\", "*Start with a low box if this is your first time*\\", "Sink into a quarter of half squat and then pop your hips forward.\\", "Try to land in the middle of the box as softly as possible to minimise impact on your joints.\\"]

title: Depth Jump
instructions: ["Stand on top of a box. Step off of the box and land on the floor.\\", "Land as softly as possible. Squat as you land to minimise impact on your joints.\\", "Go straight into another hop after you've landed. This will help you learn to absorb impact.\\"]

title: Seated Box Jump
instructions: ["Setup two boxes. One to jump on and one to sit.\\", "Go from a seated position and pop your hips forward forcefully.\\", "Jump and land on the box softly.\\"]

title: Single Leg Box Jump
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width stance.\\", "Jump onto your box and land with one foot.\\", "Try to land in the middle of the box and land as softly as possible.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Alternating Jump Lunge
instructions: ["Start in a standing position.\\", "Lunge forward, switch legs mid-air.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Figure Four Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on a bench with your foot resting on top of a box,  and cross one leg over the other.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the box.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Put your shoulder blades on a bench. Both feet on a low box or a plate.\\", "Start with your hips up.\\", "Drop your hips and then push your hips up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Lateral Lunge Jump
instructions: ["Start with a shoulder width stance.\\", "Jump laterally and fall into a squat. Tap the ground.\\", "Jump the opposite direction\\"]

title: Bodyweight Pulse Squat
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell in goblet position.\\", "Squat down to parallel depth and then halfway back up.\\", "Stay in this short range of motion for the duration of the set.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Single Leg Heels Elevated Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on a bench with your foot on a plate or low box.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Swing Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width.\\", "Step forward with your right foot and bend both knees to lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Step back with the same leg until the back knee taps the floor.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Swingthrough Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width.\\", "Step forward with your right foot and bend both knees to lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Step back with the same leg until the back knee taps the floor.\\"]

title: In And Out Jump Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Start by doing a regular squat, then engage your core and jump up explosively.\\", "Narrow your stance while in the air, and land softly. Go directly into another rep.\\"]

title: Pole Overhead Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and hold a pole overhead, using an overhand grip.\\", "Begin the squat by bending at the hips and knees, keeping your core tight and the dumbbells balanced overhead.\\", "Lower your body as far as you can while keeping the dumbbells overhead, then push back up to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, making sure to keep your back straight, chest lifted, and the dumbbells stable overhead throughout the entire movement.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Pop Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Start by doing a regular squat, tap the floor, then engage your core and jump up explosively.\\", "Bring your feet mostly together, tap your toes back to the floor, then bring your feet back their original width.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Alternating Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Place the barbell on your back\\", "Step your foot back and around while simultaneously bringing the weight down.\\", "Return to start and repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Alternating Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Stand tall, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step right, lunge to side.\\", "Return, then lunge left.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Alternating Reverse Lunges
instructions: ["Stand with feet together.\\", "Step back with right foot.\\", "Return to starting position, then lunge with left foot.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Abduct at the hips and raise your leg out to the side.\\", "Return to the starting position and stop just short of your foot touching back to the ground (to keep tension on the muscle).\\"]

title: Bodyweight Step Up Knee Drive
instructions: ["Begin by standing in front of a sturdy box or bench that is about knee-height.\\", "Place your right foot on the box and push through the heel to lift your body up and onto the box, bring your off leg all the way through until your leg is parallel with the ground.\\", "Step back down with your right foot, lowering your left foot to the ground.\\"]

title: Hamstring Bridge With Elevated Legs Box Unilateral
instructions: ["Lie on your back. Place one heel on a box or bench, having a 90\u00b0 angle at hip and knee.\\", "Perform a posterior pelvic tilt (flatten your lower back against the ground).\\", "Push through your heel into the box, lifting your hips up to the point where there is a straight line from your chest to your knees.\\"]

title: Hamstring Bridge With Elevated Legs Box Bilateral
instructions: ["Lie on your back. Place your heels on a box or bench, having a 90\u00b0 angle at hips and knees.\\", "Perform a posterior pelvic tilt (flatten your lower back against the ground).\\", "Push through your heels into the box, lifting your hips up to the point where there is a straight line from your chest to your knees.\\"]

title: Hamstring Bridge Isometric Open Angle
instructions: ["Lie on your back with knees slightly bent and heels dug in.\\", "Perform a posterior pelvic tilt (flatten your lower back on the ground).\\", "Press the heels into the ground to raise your hips off it.\\", "Hold the position for the specified duration.\\"]

title: Glute Bridge Isometric Hold Single Alternate
instructions: ["Lie on your back. Bend your knees so your feet are flat on the floor with heels under knees\\", "Push through your heels into the ground, lifting your hips up to the point where there is a straight line from your chest to your knees. Squeeze your bum at the top of the movement\\", "Maintain the top position and extend one leg at the time.\\"]

title: Glute Bridge Eccentric Unilateral
instructions: ["Lie down with your knees bent and your feet flat on the floor.\\", "Push your hips up so that your butt is elevated and your back straight.\\", "Tense your glutes and raise your hips towards the ceiling.\\", "Once you are at the highest point you can manage, hold the position for a few seconds, and raise one leg off the ground.\\", "Lower slowly to the start position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Alternating Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Step forward with your right foot and bend both knees to lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Push off your right foot to return to the starting position. Then switch legs.\\"]

title: Walking Lunge
instructions: ["Take a step forward shifting your weight onto the front leg.\\", "Bend the knee of the front leg so the knee of the back leg comes close to the ground.\\", "Stand up and go into lunging with the opposite leg.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Box Squat
instructions: ["Stand in front of a box or bench with your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Lower your body into a squat position, sitting back onto the box and pausing for a moment before standing back up.\\", "Push through your heels to return to the standing position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Kickstand Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, one foot slightly behind.\\", "Lower into a squat, keeping weight on front heel.\\", "Return to standing, engaging glutes and core.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Ninety Ninety Hip Stretch
instructions: ["Sit with one leg in front of you flat on the ground.\\", "While the other leg is to your side, also flat on the ground with your foot pointed backwards.\\", "Hold this position for the prescribed amount of time then change sides.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Single Leg Squat
instructions: ["Stand on one leg, extend the other forward for balance.\\", "Lower into a squat, keeping your chest up and core tight.\\", "Press through your heel to stand back up, repeat.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Deficit Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Quad Stomp
instructions: ["Place your foot on a plate or a low box.\\", "Put all of your weight on your front foot and lean forward.\\", "Lower until your calves touch your hamstrings and then extend back up.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Curtsy Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, keeping bar stable throughout.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Single Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Lie on the ball, one foot on the ground.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Straight Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lie on your back, heels on a stability ball, legs straight, arms by your sides.\\", "Press through your heels, lift hips, engage glutes and core, forming a straight line.\\", "Slowly lower hips, maintaining control, then repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on your back with your feet resting on top of a ball.\\", "Push through your heels and raise your hips towards the ceiling, keeping your feet flat on the bar.\\", "Engage your glutes at the top of the movement, pause briefly and then lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sit on the floor, place upper back on a stability ball, feet flat, knees bent.\\", "Drive hips upward by squeezing glutes, forming a straight line from shoulders to knees.\\", "Lower hips slowly without touching the floor, maintaining core engagement, then repeat.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Wall Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, placing a stability ball between your lower back and wall.\\", "Slowly squat down by bending knees to 90 degrees, keeping back straight and core engaged.\\", "Press through heels, straighten legs, and return to standing while maintaining balance and control.\\"]

title: Machine Leg Press
instructions: ["Place your legs on the platform with your feet at shoulder width.\\", "Release the weight and extend your legs fully, without locking your knees.\\", "Lower the weight until your legs are at a 90\u00b0 angle (but DO NOT allow your butt and lower back to rise off of the pad. This will put your lower back in a rounded position, which is very dangerous.)\\", "Raise the weight back to starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Adjust the machine for your height, sit with your back against the pad, knees bent, feet flat on the platform.\\", "Brace your core, push through your heels, and extend your hips upwards, lifting the weight while squeezing your glutes.\\", "Lower the weight slowly back to the starting position, ensuring controlled movement; repeat for desired reps and sets.\\"]

title: Machine Hack Squat
instructions: ["Position yourself in the hack squat machine with your back against the pad and shoulders under the shoulder pads.\\", "Place feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. Keep your back straight, and slowly lower into a squat position.\\", "Press through your heels to return to the starting position, keeping your core engaged. Repeat for desired reps and sets.\\"]

title: Machine Horizontal Sissy Leg Press
instructions: ["Place your feet at the bottom the platform at shoulder width. Lift your heels up.\\", "Press against the platform and extend your legs fully, without locking your knees.\\", "Lower the weight until your legs are at a 90\u00b0 angle (but DO NOT allow your butt and lower back to rise off of the pad. This will put your lower back in a rounded position, which is very dangerous.)\\", "Raise the weight back to starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Horizontal Leg Press
instructions: ["Place your legs on the platform with your feet at shoulder width.\\", "Release the weight and extend your legs fully, without locking your knees.\\", "Lower the weight until your legs are at a 90\u00b0 angle (but DO NOT allow your butt and lower back to rise off of the pad. This will put your lower back in a rounded position, which is very dangerous.)\\", "Raise the weight back to starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Adjust machine settings to fit your height. Sit with back flat against pad, legs together.\\", "Slowly press legs apart against resistance. Pause at peak.\\", "Slowly return legs to starting position. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Machine Hip And Glute Abduction
instructions: ["Stand on the platform and set the pad just over the opposing hip of the working leg.\\", "Place the working leg over the pad.\\", "Press your leg outward. Aim to get the longest range of motion possible.\\"]

title: Machine Hip And Glute Kickback
instructions: ["Stand on the platform and sideways on the machine.\\", "Place the pad at just above hip height. Place the working leg over the pad.\\", "Extend the working leg backwards and flex your glute at the end of each rep.\\"]

title: Machine Pendulum Squat
instructions: ["Position yourself in the pendulum squat machine with your back against the pad and shoulders under the shoulder pads.\\", "Place feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. Keep your back straight, and slowly lower into a squat position.\\", "Press through your heels to return to the starting position, keeping your core engaged. Repeat for desired reps and sets.\\"]

title: Machine Single Leg Leg Press
instructions: ["This particular leg press has two separate foot plates. There are holding pins on both sides. Engage the pin on one side.\\", "Lower the weight but stop before your lower back begins to round.\\", "Press back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Squat Press
instructions: ["Place your legs on the platform with your feet at shoulder width.\\", "Release the weight and extend your legs fully, without locking your knees.\\", "Lower the weight until your legs are at a 90\u00b0 angle (but DO NOT allow your butt and lower back to rise off of the pad. This will put your lower back in a rounded position, which is very dangerous.)\\", "Raise the weight back to starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Adjust the machine for your height, sit with your back against the pad, knees bent, feet flat on the platform.\\", "Brace your core, push through your heels, and extend your hips upwards, lifting the weight while squeezing your glutes.\\", "Lower the weight slowly back to the starting position, ensuring controlled movement; repeat for desired reps and sets.\\"]

title: Horizontal Hack Squat
instructions: ["Position yourself in the hack squat machine with your back against the pad and shoulders under the shoulder pads.\\", "Place feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.\\", "Press through your heels to the starting position, keeping your core engaged. Repeat for desired reps and sets.\\"]

title: Machine Glute Kickback
instructions: ["Grab the handles, place one knee on the pad, and the foot of the working leg on the foot plate.\\", "Push your working leg back until you feel your glute contract, then return to the starting position without resting the weights.\\"]

title: Gluteator
instructions: ["Sit on the seat upright with your knees placed on the pads and your feet on the foot pads.\\", "Push your legs outwards and backwards and flex your glutes.\\"]

title: Vertical Leg Press
instructions: ["Lay on the pad and place your feet on the foot plate.\\", "Lift the plate up and disengage the holding hook.\\", "Lower the weight. Stop before your lower back rounds off the pad.\\", "Press the weight back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Belt Squat
instructions: ["Put the belt around your waist and hook the end of the belt onto the machines.\\", "Stand up to disengage the holding mechanism. Hold the arms while you squat.\\", "Once you've completed your set, reset the holding mechanism.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Clean And Press Slam
instructions: ["Hold the medicine ball with an overhand grip.\\", "Lift the ball explosively, clean it to shoulder height.\\", "Press the ball overhead, then slam it to the ground.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Ball Headlock Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding medicine ball close.\\", "Squat down, keeping ball close to head and chest.\\", "Stand back up, squeezing glutes. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Ball Offset Squat
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at one shoulder, feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Squat down, keeping ball on same side throughout movement.\\", "Stand back up, squeezing glutes. Repeat on other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Overhead Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball overhead.\\", "Step back into lunge position.\\", "Return to starting position. Repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Overhead Squat
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball overhead.\\", "Squat down, keeping back straight.\\", "Stand back up. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at chest.\\", "Step back into lunge position.\\", "Return to starting position. Repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Reverse Lunge Twist
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at chest.\\", "Step back into lunge position, extend your arms, twist torso.\\", "Return to starting position. Repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Self Toss
instructions: ["Toss medicine ball up, catch with both hands.\\", "Repeat toss and catch for desired reps.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Squat Reach
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at chest.\\", "Squat down, reach ball to one side.\\", "Stand up and repeat reach on other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Wall Ball
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at chest, facing wall.\\", "Squat down, then throw ball at wall.\\", "Catch and repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Laying on the floor with your knees bent and feet firmly on the floor, rest the kettlebell on your pelvis.\\", "Pushing through the legs and keeping the core muscles engaged, raise your pelvis off the floor until your stomach, pelvis and thighs make a straight line.\\", "Slowly lower to the ground to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Leg Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Laying on the floor with one knee bent with the foot firmly on the floor and one leg extended, rest the kettlebell on your pelvis.\\", "Pushing through the bent leg and keeping the core muscles engaged, raise your pelvis and the extended leg off the floor until your stomach, pelvis and thighs make a straight line.\\", "Slowly lower to the ground to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sitting on the floor with your knees bent and feet planted firmly on the floor, lean your back against the bench.\\", "Resting the kettlebell on your pelvis, raise your pelvis until your stomach, pelvis and thighs are in line.\\", "Slowly lower until you are in the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sitting on the floor with one knee bent with the foot firmly on the floor and one leg extended, lean your back against the bench.\\", "Resting the kettlebell on your pelvis, raise your pelvis until your stomach, pelvis and thighs are in line.\\", "Slowly lower until you are in the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Step Up
instructions: ["Standing up straight, using a bench as a step, raise one foot onto the bench and hold the kettlebell in the same arm as the straight leg.\\", "Stand and bring both feet onto the bench. Slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Goblet Squat
instructions: ["Hold the weight tucked into your upper chest area, keeping your elbows in. Your feet should be slightly wider than your shoulders.\\", "Sink down into the squat, keeping your elbows inside the track of your knees.\\", "Push through your heels while keeping your chest up and return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Heels Up Goblet Squat
instructions: ["Hold the weight tucked into your upper chest area, keeping your elbows in. Your feet should be slightly wider than your shoulders and the heels slightly raised on a surface.\\", "Sink down into the squat, keeping your elbows inside the track of your knees.\\", "Push through your heels while keeping your chest up and return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand straight with your feet slightly apart and hold a kettlebell in one hand.\\", "Bring the same leg as the arm holding the kettlebell behind you, squat down until your back knee touches the ground, keeping your back straight.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Stand straight with your feet slightly apart and hold a kettlebell in one hand.\\", "Bring the same leg as the arm holding the kettlebell in front of you, squat down until your thigh is parallel to the ground, keeping your back straight.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Lateral Lunge (Single)
instructions: ["Stand straight with your feet shoulder width apart. Keep your back straight and hold the kettlebell in front of your pelvis.\\", "Take a large step to one side, holding the kettlebell low and lunge into the bent leg.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat\\"]

title: Kettlebell Clean And Press
instructions: ["Start with kettlebells between legs.\\", "Swing kettlebells up to shoulder.\\", "Press kettlebells overhead.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Snatch (Double)
instructions: ["Begin with a two kettlebells between your legs, hinge at hips, then swing it upwards explosively.\\", "As they rise, lock out arm overhead, wrist straight.\\", "Control the descent, then repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Figure Four Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Begin seated, kettlebell on hips.\\", "Lift hips, form figure four leg shape.\\", "Lower, repeat thrusts.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Forward Lunge (Double)
instructions: ["Hold kettlebell at your side.\\", "Step forward, lunge, and return.\\", "Repeat with opposite leg.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Hold kettlebells in front of you.\\", "Step sideways, lunge down and let the kettlebells land between your legs.\\", "Push off, return to start. Repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold kettlebells at your side.\\", "Step backward, lower body.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Clean And Press
instructions: ["Begin with the kettlebell between your legs.\\", "Hinge at your hips, and lift to shoulder, then press overhead.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Front Rack Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold kettlebell in front rack position.\\", "Step backward, lunge. Bring your back knee to the floor.\\", "Extend your knee back into the starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Snatch
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, kettlebell between legs.\\", "Squat, grip kettlebell, explode hips, and lift kettlebell overhead.\\", "Lower kettlebell safely to start position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Step Up Double
instructions: ["Standing up straight, using a bench as a step, raise one foot onto the bench and hold the kettlebell in the same arm as the straight leg.\\", "Stand and bring both feet onto the bench. Slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Step Up Balance
instructions: ["Begin by standing in front of a sturdy box or bench that is about knee-height, holding a kettlebell in one hand\\", "Place your right foot on the box and push through the heel to lift your body up and onto the box, keeping your left foot off the ground.\\", "Step back down with your right foot, lowering your left foot to the ground.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Kickstand Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, one foot slightly behind. Hold kettlebell in a goblet position.\\", "Lower into a squat, keeping weight on front heel.\\", "Return to standing, engaging glutes and core.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Swing Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width. Kettlebell at your side.\\", "Step forward with your right foot and bend both knees to lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Push off your right foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Step back with the same leg until the back knee taps the floor.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Alternating Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Hold a kettlebell at your chest, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step one leg diagonally back into a lunge.\\", "Alternate legs, keeping your chest up and core engaged.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Alternating Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Hold one kettlebell with one or both hands, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step out to one side, bending the knee.\\", "Push off, return to center, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Alternating Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold two kettlebells by your side.\\", "Take a big step backwards with your left leg, lowering your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground and your right knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\", "Push back up and switch legs, alternating each rep.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Alternating Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Stand tall, holding kettlebells by your sides, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step forward with one leg, lowering until both knees form 90\u00b0 angles.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start, and switch legs.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Assisted Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: ["Grab a stick of some sort or hold onto something stable (rack, bench).\\", "Grab a box that is knee height or slightly lower.\\", "Hold the stick in your right arm, kettlebell in the other and put your right leg on the box.\\", "Begin your squat by breaking at the knees. Get your knee close to the floor or all the way to the floor. Make sure to keep your chest tall.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Rack Deficit Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, kettlebells in front rack position, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Deficit Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, kettlebells in each hand, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Quad Stomp
instructions: ["Place your foot on a plate or a low box. Hold two kettlebells in each hand.\\", "Put all of your weight on your front foot and lean forward.\\", "Lower until your calves touch your hamstrings and then extend back up.\\"]

title: Glutes Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Lay flat and bring your left leg to 90 degrees.\\", "Hold your left leg with both hands and slowly rotate your hips to the right hand side.\\", "Hold at the peak of the stretch, then slowly return to starting position.\\", "Switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Glutes Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Sit on the ground and lay one leg flat and the other over the top.\\", "Hold your leg with the same side arm and slowly rotate your hips and back.\\", "Hold at the peak of the stretch, then slowly return to starting position.\\", "Switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Glutes Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["On your front, place one leg forward and then stretch out the same side arm across the mat/floor.\\", "Fully extend your leg and arm.\\", "Hold at the peak of the stretch, then slowly return to starting position.\\", "Switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Split Squat
instructions: ["You can use a straight or EZ bar on this exercise. Cable should be set all to the bottom.\\", "Grab the attachment and walk back a few steps. Take a split stance. One leg in front and one behind.\\", "Break at the knees and hips to initiate the split squat. Make sure your back knee touches the floor.\\", "Squat back up into a standing position.\\"]

title: Cable Standing Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. Cable should be set all the way to the bottom.\\", "Face sideways with the ankle attachment on your outside leg. Walk a few steps away.\\", "Abduct at the hips and raise your leg out to the side.\\", "Return to the starting position and stop just short of your foot touching back to the ground (to keep tension on the muscle).\\"]

title: Cable Quadruped Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. Cable should be set all the way to the bottom.\\", "Take a quadruped position with the cable going across your planted leg.\\", "Abduct at the hips and raise your leg out to the side.\\", "Return to the starting position and stop just short of the cables touching back down (to keep tension on the muscle).\\"]

title: Cable Standing Hip Adduction
instructions: ["Bring the cable all the way to the bottom of the stack. Use an ankle attachment.\\", "Keeping your feet together, move your legs out to the sides and then back to the midline of your body. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.\\"]

title: Cable Standing Glute Kickback
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment. The cable should be set to the bottom of the crossover machine.\\", "Break at the knee, push your ankle straight back, extending at the hip. Hold for a one count when you feel a contraction in your glutes.\\", "Then flex at the hips until you are back into your original position.\\"]

title: Cable Belt Split Squat
instructions: ["Put on a dip belt and attach the strap/ chain to the cable's carabiner.\\", "Take a few steps back and take a split stance.\\", "Lower into a split squat, letting the weight pull you forward. As you squat back to the starting position push yourself backwards against the resistance.\\"]

title: Cable Belt Squat
instructions: ["Put on a dip belt. Attach the strap/chain to the cable's carabiner.\\", "Take a few steps back. Begin to squat by flexing at the knees and hips.\\", "Let the weight pull you forward as you squat. Then push your toes through the front of your shoes as you squat back to the start position.\\"]

title: Band Spanish Squat
instructions: ["Anchor a band to a stable point.\\", "Place the loops of the band behind your knees.\\", "Perform a normal squat and extend your knees against the band at the top.\\"]

title: Band Glute Kickback
instructions: ["Get into a quadruped position. Loop the band around both of your wrists and one of your feet.\\", "Extend your knee and hip straight back until you feel like contraction in the glutes.\\", "Flex at the knee until back in the starting position.\\"]

title: Band Leg Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with your head by the anchor point of the band, which should be 6 to 12 inches above your head\\", "Place the band around your midfoot and extend at the knees and hip.\\"]

title: Band Squat
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width grip. Both feet should be on the band with the band loops in each of your hand.\\", "Push your butt back and also break at the knees.\\", "Try to hit parallel depth (bottom of your leg should be parallel with the ground). If you can't tell your squat depth, then try squatting in front of a mirror and watch your form.\\"]

title: Band Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Attach the band around your ankle. Stand with feet hip-width apart, feet facing forward, and hands on hips.\\", "Lift your right leg away from your body to the side, keeping your knee straight. This is your starting position.\\", "Maintaining proper form, move your right leg as far to the side as you can, keeping your left leg planted firmly on the ground. Hold for a second and then return your right leg to the starting position.\\"]

title: Band Hip Adduction
instructions: ["Attach a band to a stable anchor point, such as a door handle or post.\\", "Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your ankles.\\", "Keeping your feet together, move your legs out to the sides and then back to the midline of your body. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.\\"]

title: Banded Side Walks
instructions: ["Place a band either just below or above your knees.\\", "Get into a quarter squat position.\\", "Step side to side without letting there be any slack in the band to keep tension on the band.\\"]

title: Band Goblet Squat
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width grip. Both feet should be on the band with the band looped over both hands.\\", "Push your butt back and also break at the knees.\\", "Try to hit parallel depth (bottom of your leg should be parallel with the ground). If you can't tell your squat depth, then try squatting in front of a mirror and watch your form.\\"]

title: Plate Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight plate in front of your chest with both hands.\\", "Keep your back straight, lower your body as if you were sitting back into a chair.\\", "Go as low as you can while keeping your heels flat on the ground, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Clean And Press
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and the plate in front of the feet.\\", "Bend the knees and hips to pick up the plate, keeping the back straight and core engaged.\\", "Stand up, lock the hips and legs, and press the plate overhead with straight arms.\\", "Lower the plate back to the starting position, keeping control of it, and repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Plate Squat Reach
instructions: ["Stand holding a weight plate at chest height with both hands.\\", "Lower into a squat, extending the plate in front of you at chest height\\", "As you stand back up, pull the plate back into your chest.\\"]

title: Plate Clean
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and the plate in front of the feet.\\", "Bend the knees and hips to pick up the plate, keeping the back straight and core engaged.\\", "Stand up while pulling the plate towards the chest.\\", "Keep shoulder level while keeping the elbows high and in front of the plate.\\"]

title: Plate Squat Hold Reach
instructions: ["Hold the plate with both hands at chest height.\\", "Keeping your core tight and your chest up, squat down as low as you can go while keeping your feet flat on the ground.\\", "Hold the squat position and reach the plate forward, keeping your arms straight and your back straight.\\", "Return the plate to your chest while you hold the squat position and repeat reaching the plate in front of you\\"]

title: Plate Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and the plate in front of the torso.\\", "Step back and across the body with the right foot, bending both legs to lower into a lunge position.\\", "Push through the front foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Repeat on the other side by stepping back and across with the left foot.\\", "Continue alternating sides for desired reps.\\"]

title: Plate Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart and the plate held in front of the torso.\\", "Take a step to the side with one foot, bending the knee and lowering the hips into a lunge.\\", "Push through the front foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Repeat on the other side by stepping to the other side with the other foot.\\"]

title: Plate Forward Lunge
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart and the plate held in front of the torso.\\", "Take a step forward with one foot, bending the front knee to lower the hips into a lunge.\\", "Push through the front foot to return to the starting position.\\", "Repeat on the other side by stepping forward with the other foot.\\"]

title: Plate Reverse Lunge Twist
instructions: ["Step back with your right foot into a lunge position, both knees bent at 90 degrees.\\", "Twist your torso to the right, keeping the plate close to your chest.\\", "Push through your front foot to return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Plate Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold the plate at chest height close to your body\\", "Take a big step backwards with your left leg, lowering your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground and your right knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\", "Push through your right heel to return to standing, bringing your left leg back to starting position.\\", "Repeat the movement on the other side, stepping backwards with your right leg and lowering your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground and your left knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\"]

title: Plate Overhead Squat
instructions: ["Hold a weight plate at arm's length overhead, with your arms fully extended. The plate should be directly above your head and your elbows should be locked.\\", "Begin to bend your knees, lowering your body as far as you can while keeping the weight plate overhead. Make sure to keep your back straight and your chest lifted.\\", "Once your thighs are parallel to the ground or as low as you can go, pause for a moment.\\", "Push through your heels to return to a standing position, keeping the weight plate overhead the entire time.\\"]

title: Plate Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a plate with both feet.\\", "Step back with one foot to the floor and let your back knee get close to or tap the floor.\\", "Push through your front leg until both feet are back on the plate.\\"]

title: Plate Glute Bridge to Chest Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with a plate on your chest.\\", "Push your hips up toward the ceiling and maintain that extended position.\\", "With your hips up, press the plate toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Plate Glute Bridge to Pullover
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with a plate on your chest.\\", "Push your hips up toward the ceiling and maintain that extended position.\\", "Extend your elbows mostly, break at the shoulder joint while maintaining hip extension and the slight bend in your elbows.\\", "Let the plate tap the floor (or get close) and then pull the plate back into the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Overhead Walking Lunge
instructions: ["Stand tall with a plate overhead.\\", "Step with one foot forward bringing your back knee to the floor. Gently tap your knee then drive through your front leg.\\", "Go back to a standing position and then step forward with the opposing legs.\\"]

title: Plate Squat Hold
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, with a weight plate held in both hands at chest height.\\", "Lower your body by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back straight and your weight in your heels.\\", "Go down until your thighs are parallel to the floor, then pause for a moment.\\", "Hold the squat position for the desired amount of time, keeping the weight plate steady and your core engaged.\\"]

title: Plate Thruster
instructions: ["Start with the plate at chest height. Begin a squat.\\", "Make sure to hit parallel depth. On your way back up, use the momentum you generate with your legs to help push the plate into an overhead position.\\", "Let the plate return to chest height before initiating the next squat.\\"]

title: Plate Goblet Deficit Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on a platform, Holding a plate to your chest, feet hip-width apart.\\", "Step back, lowering knee toward floor, keeping chest upright and core engaged.\\", "Push through front foot, return to start.\\"]

title: TRX Curtsy Lunge
instructions: ["Stand facing away from the anchor point, holding onto the TRX handles with both hands.\\", "Step your left foot behind your right, crossing it behind your right leg, and lower yourself into a curtsy lunge.\\", "Push through your right foot to return to the starting position and repeat the movement with the other leg.\\"]

title: TRX Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your feet in the foot cradles of the TRX straps, with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.\\", "Place your arms by your sides with your palms facing down.\\", "Drive your hips up towards the ceiling, squeezing your glutes and hamstrings at the top of the movement.\\"]

title: TRX Jumping Squat
instructions: ["Stand facing the TRX straps and place your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Begin by lowering into a squat position by bending at the knees and hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.\\", "Explosively jump up off the ground, using your arms for momentum if desired.\\", "Land softly back in the squat position, making sure to absorb the impact with your legs.\\"]

title: TRX Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Grasp the TRX handles with both hands and extend your arms straight in front of you.\\", "Step laterally to one side, keeping your arms extended and your core engaged.\\", "Lower your body into a lunge position, keeping your front knee bent at a 90-degree angle and your back leg straight.\\", "Push off your front foot to return to the starting position, keeping your arms extended and your core engaged.\\"]

title: TRX Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold on to the TRX straps and step away until the strap is taut.\\", "Step backwards with one leg in to a lunge position and gently tap your knee to the floor.\\", "Lunge back to the starting position and repeat with the other leg.\\"]

title: TRX Split Squat
instructions: ["Hold the two TRX straps and step away until the straps are taut. Take a split stance.\\", "Bring your back knee to the floor and gently tap the floor.\\", "Use your arms and the TRX to help assist you getting back into the starting position.\\"]

title: TRX Squat
instructions: ["Hold the two TRX straps and lean away from the anchor point.\\", "Flex at the hips and knees in to a squat position.\\", "You can use your arms and the straps to assist you back into the starting position.\\"]

title: Double Pigeon Pose
instructions: ["Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.\\", "Place a block under your left knee, then bend your right knee and stack it on top of your left ankle.\\", "Flex both feet and gently press your knees towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your hips.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, then switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Half Lotus
instructions: ["Sit on a yoga mat with legs straight in front of you.\\", "Bend the right knee and place the right foot on top of the left thigh. Allow the right knee to fall towards the floor.\\", "Bring the left foot onto the right thigh. Keep the spine straight and rest hands on the knees.\\", "Hold for several breaths and then release.\\"]

title: Pigeon Pose
instructions: ["Extend your right leg behind you and place your right ankle on top of your left thigh, with your right knee pointing out to the side.\\", "Sitting up straight, use your hands to gently press down on your right knee while at the same time pulling your left buttock back.\\", "Hold for 5-10 deep breaths, then release and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Reclining Pigeon Pose
instructions: ["Lie down on your back with your knees bent and your feet on the ground.\\", "Cross your right ankle over your left knee, creating a figure four shape.\\", "Use your hands to gently pull your left knee towards your chest, feeling a stretch in your right hip.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, then switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Restful Cow Face Pose Legs
instructions: ["Start in a seated position with your legs extended in front of you.\\", "Cross your right leg over your left leg, placing your right foot on the floor beside your left hip.\\", "Cross your left leg over your right leg, placing your left foot on the floor beside your right hip.\\", "Relax your arms by your sides or place them on your abdomen and take deep breaths.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Burpee
instructions: ["Stand on Bosu with feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Drop into squat position and place hands on Bosu.\\", "Jump feet back into plank, perform a pushup, then jump back to squat.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Feet Elevated Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lie on back, place feet on Bosu, knees bent.\\", "Lift hips and squeeze glutes.\\", "Lower hips back down to complete one rep.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Half Burpee
instructions: ["Stand on Bosu with feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Drop into squat position and place hands on Bosu.\\", "Jump feet back to plank, then jump back to squat.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sit on Bosu, lean back, hands on the floor.\\", "Drive hips upward, squeezing glutes.\\", "Lower hips back down to complete one rep.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Lateral Lunge
instructions: ["Stand on Bosu, step sideways into a lunge.\\", "Bend knee, keeping the other leg straight.\\", "Push off the bent leg, return to starting position.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at chest.\\", "Step back into lunge position.\\", "Return to starting position. Repeat on other leg.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Single Leg Elevated Glute Bridge
instructions: ["Lie on back, place one foot on Bosu, knee bent.\\", "Lift hips, squeezing glutes, one leg extended.\\", "Lower hips back down and switch legs.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Split Squat
instructions: ["Take a split stance. Make sure to keep your chest tall.\\", "Bring your rear knee to the floor or close to it.\\", "Drive through your front heel and your rear foot back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Squat
instructions: ["Stand on Bosu, feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Squat down, keeping knees aligned with toes.\\", "Push through heels to stand back up.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Belt Squat
instructions: ["Set up the Vitruvian, including a the provided belt.\\", "Position yourself with feet shoulder-width apart on the Vitruvian\\", "Perform the squat by bending at the knees and hips, lowering your body until thighs are parallel to the ground.\\", "Return to the starting position by extending your knees and hips, pushing through your feet.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Deficit Lunge
instructions: ["Stand tall with both feet on the platform.\\", "Step backwards and bring your back knee to the floor.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Figure Four Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Wear the belt attachment.\\", "Cross one leg over the other, and then press your hips toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Front Squat
instructions: ["Use the bar attachment.\\", "Place the bar over your front delts and cross your arms.\\", "Push your hips back and aim to hit parallel depth.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Put your back on the bench.\\", "Place the bar or belt over your hips.\\", "Flex and extend your hips fully on each rep.\\"]

title: Cardio Assault Bike
instructions: ["Adjust seat and handlebar height for comfort and proper posture on the assault bike.\\", "Start pedaling with even, controlled motion, maintaining your desired resistance level.\\", "Monitor heart rate and intensity; increase or decrease resistance for an effective cardio workout.\\"]

title: Cardio Karaoke
instructions: ["Stand upright, feet together, facing forward, ready to move laterally.\\", "Move right foot behind left, then step left foot to the side.\\", "Alternate crossing and stepping, increase speed, maintain rhythm and balance.\\"]

title: Cardio Row Erg Rower Legs Only
instructions: ["Strap your feet in tightly.\\", "Keep your arms extended while flexing and extending at the hips and knees.\\"]

title: Cardio Skater
instructions: ["Stand, balance on right foot, left foot behind, slightly bent knees.\\", "Jump to left, landing on left foot, right foot behind, swinging arms.\\", "Continue leaping side-to-side, maintaining balance and speed, like a speed skater.\\"]

title: Cardio Step Out Jacks
instructions: ["Stand tall, feet together, arms by sides, ready to move.\\", "Step right foot out, simultaneously raise arms above head.\\", "Step right foot in, lower arms, repeat left, maintain rhythm.\\"]

title: Treadmill Side Shuffle
instructions: ["Face sideways on the treadmill.\\", "Take a quarter squat position with a wide stance.\\", "Shuffle sideways for a specified amount of time, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Stationary Bike
instructions: ["Hold the handles and maintain a neutral spine.\\", "Pedal at a moderate pace and try to minimise rocking back and forth.\\"]

title: Elliptical
instructions: ["Step onto the pedals, grip the handles, and start moving your feet in a natural stride.\\", "Adjust resistance and incline for desired intensity while maintaining a steady, controlled motion.\\", "Keep your posture upright, engage your core, and maintain a consistent pace for an effective workout.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Glute Kickback
instructions: ["Start on your hands and knees with one foot placed on the bottom of the bar.\\", "Keeping your core braced, your back flat, and your moving leg bent at a 90 degree angle, drive the heel of your working leg up the ceiling while squeezing your glute.\\", "Follow the movement path as you bring your knee back down to the ground beneath your hip, keeping your knee bent to maintain control of the bar.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Leg Press
instructions: ["Place your legs on the bar with your feet at shoulder width.\\", "Release the weight and extend your legs fully, without locking your knees.\\", "Lower the weight until your legs are at a 90\u00b0 angle (but DO NOT allow your butt and lower back to rise off of the floor. This will put your lower back in a rounded position, which is very dangerous.)\\", "Raise the weight back to starting position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Single Leg Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Start by lying on a bench with your foot on the ground and a barbell on your hips.\\", "Lift one leg off the ground and engage your glutes to raise your hips up towards the ceiling.\\", "From this starting position, slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Sit on the ground with a bench behind you. Have the bar over your legs just above your hips.\\", "Lean back against the bench so that your shoulders are resting upon it, stretch your arms out to either side using the bench as support.\\", "Raise the weight by driving through your feet and extending your hips upwards. Support the weight with your shoulders and feet.\\", "Slowly extend as far as you can, and then slowly return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Split Squat
instructions: ["Take a large step forward with one leg until your shoulders are under the smith machine\\", "lower your body until your back knee nearly touches the ground. Your front knee should be bent at a 90-degree angle, and your back leg should be straight.\\", "Push through the heel of your front foot to raise your body back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet about hip-width apart, with the bar on your shoulders. Your feet should be slightly pointed outward, and your shoulders should be down and relaxed.\\", "Step backward with one foot, lowering your body until your front thigh is parallel to the ground and your back knee is hovering just above the ground.\\", "Push off your back foot, returning to the starting position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Narrow Stance Squat
instructions: ["Place the bar on top of your traps. Take a narrow stance.\\", "Push your hips back and break at the knees. Push your elbows forward to keep yourself from getting pitched too far forward.\\", "Aim to get your hamstrings to parallel with the floor.\\", "Push your heels into the floor and squat back to a standing position.\\"]

title: Glute Hip Rotator Stretch 3 Seated
instructions: ["Cross the ankle of one leg over the knee of the other.\\", "Push your knee away from you and lean forward for a specified amount of time.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Single Leg Squat
instructions: ["Stand on a bosu ball and balance on one leg.\\", "Try to bend and extend the knee of the supporting leg (single leg squat) while keeping your balance.\\"]

title: Single Leg Eccentric Box Squat
instructions: ["Stand in front of a bench or box. Lift one leg in front you supporting yourself on the other leg.\\", "Try to sit on the box in a controlled manner. Use both legs to stand back up\\"]

title: Single Leg Concentric Squat
instructions: ["From the standing position lower your body into a squat.\\", "Shift your weight onto one leg (the other is still in contact with the ground for balance).\\", "Use the loaded leg to lift your body into standing position.\\"]

title: Skater Squat
instructions: ["From the standing position shift your weight onto the working leg and keep the other one suspended behind you\\", "Tilt at the hips and lean over as you are bending the loaded knee\\", "Bring your back knee close to the ground before standing back up.\\"]

title: Side Step On And Off Box
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet about hip-width apart. Your feet should be slightly pointed outward, and your shoulders should be down and relaxed.\\", "Place a step or box beside you, and step up onto it with one foot. Then bring the other foot to the box.\\"]

title: Band Glute Kickback Hold
instructions: ["Attach a band to a fixed point. Wrap the loose end of the band around your ankle.\\", "Face the attachment point. Shift you weight onto one leg (use balancing aids if needed).\\", "Extend your working leg and maintain the position.\\"]

title: Hip Extension Into Side Flexion
instructions: ["Start on the 4 point position (on all fours).\\", "Straighten and raise one leg till it is parallel to the ground.\\", "Make sure your spine remains in a neutral position.\\", "If you feel your lower back stiff or sore when performing this exercise, ask a trainer or therapist to guide you through.\\"]

title: Prone Single Leg Hip Extension Hold
instructions: ["Lie on your stomach.\\", "Secure your lower back by tilting your hips backwards.\\", "Raise one leg and hold the position for the specified duration.\\"]

title: Hip Extension External Rotation Pulses 4Pt Position
instructions: ["Start on the 4 point position (on all fours).\\", "Straighten and raise one leg till it is parallel to the ground and externally rotate the leg (knee aims out).\\", "Perform small upward movements while maintaining the externally rotated position of the knee.\\", "Make sure your spine remains in a neutral position.\\"]

title: Hip Extension External Rotation 4Pt Position
instructions: ["Start on the 4 point position (on all fours).\\", "Straighten and raise one leg till it is parallel to the ground.\\", "Maintain the position but externally rotate the leg (knee aims out)\\", "If you feel your lower back stiff or sore when performing this exercise, ask a trainer or therapist to guide you through.\\"]

title: Hip Extension 4Pt Position Hold
instructions: ["Start on the 4 point position (on all fours).\\", "Straighten and raise one leg till it is parallel to the ground.\\", "Make sure your spine remains in a neutral position.\\", "If you feel your lower back stiff or sore when performing this exercise, ask a trainer or therapist to guide you through.\\"]

title: Glute Piriformis Mobilisation 1 Floor Seated Lacrosse Ball
instructions: ["Sit on a massage ball distributing your weight between feet, palm and glute.\\", "Lean to the side and try to find a tight/painful spot while wiggling on the ball.\\", "Follow the pain as it shifts around your glute.\\"]

title: Glute Hip Rotator Stretch 2 Seated
instructions: ["Cross the ankle of one leg over the knee of the other.\\", "Pull your knee toward  you and hold for a specified amount of time.\\"]

title: Glute Hip Rotator Stretch 1 Seated
instructions: ["Cross the ankle of one leg over the knee of the other.\\", "Press the knee of the crossed leg outwards.\\"]

title: Glute Hip Rotator Stretch Supine
instructions: ["Lie on your back with bent knees and feet on the floor.\\", "Cross the ankle of your one leg over the knee of the other.\\", "Reach in between your legs, grabbing the thigh of the leg that is still on the ground.\\", "Pull that leg towards your chest.\\"]

title: Glute Stretch Knee Pull Dynamic Standing
instructions: ["Stand up straight with a good form.\\", "Alternate between pulling your knees towards you chest.\\", "Make sure you maintain an upright posture throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Glute Stretch Static Unilateral
instructions: ["Bend one knee and pull it towards your chest.\\", "Maintain the stretch for a few seconds before swapping legs.\\"]

title: Clock Taps
instructions: ["Try to tap your targets with the toes of your suspended leg\\", "The goal is to maintain balance while moving your leg towards the target and back\\"]

title: Clamshells 4 Side Lying Resisted
instructions: ["Lay on your side with knees bent and a loop band around them. 90\u00b0 angle at hips, knees and feet.\\", "Externally rotate the top knee without dropping your hip back\\", "Hold for a split second (or as indicated by therapist/trainer) and return to starting position without resting on the under knee\\"]

title: Clamshells 3 Internal External Rotations Side Lying
instructions: ["Lay on your side with knees bent. 90\u00b0 angle at hips, knees and feet.\\", "Lift your top leg a few centimeters off of the under leg (15-20cm)\\", "Externally rotate the top knee without dropping your hip back.\\", "Hold for a split second (or as indicated by therapist/trainer) and then internally rotate the knee\\"]

title: Clamshells 2 Side Lying
instructions: ["Lay on your side with knees bent. 90\u00b0 angle at hips, knees and feet.\\", "Lift your top leg slightly so no support is coming from the under leg.\\", "Externally rotate the top knee without dropping your hip back\\", "Hold for a split second (or as indicated by therapist/trainer) and return to starting position\\"]

title: Clamshells 1 Side Lying
instructions: ["Lay on your side with knees bent. 90\u00b0 angle at hips, knees and feet.\\", "Externally rotate the top knee without dropping your hip back\\", "Hold for a split second (or as indicated by therapist/trainer) and return to starting position without resting on the under knee\\"]

title: Jump On And Off Box
instructions: ["Start from the standing position. Lower your body into a semi-squatted position\\", "Push off the ground with two legs to perform the jump and land on the box. Jump off the box in the same manner\\", "Land on one leg, on the ground, making sure to absorb the impact by bending the knee as much as needed.\\", "Absorb the impact by bending the knees when landing. Try to maintain your balance\\"]

title: Jump Off Box Single Leg Landing
instructions: ["Start from the standing position on a box. Lower your body into a semi-squatted position\\", "Push off the box with two legs to perform the jump.\\", "Land on one leg, on the ground, making sure to absorb the impact by bending the knee as much as needed.\\"]

title: Jump Into Single Leg Landing
instructions: ["Start from the standing position. Lower your body into a semi-squatted position.\\", "Push off the ground with two legs to perform the jump.\\", "Land on one leg, making sure to absorb the impact by bending the knee as much as needed.\\"]

title: Infinity Loop Standing Hip Mobility
instructions: ["From the standing position raise one knee till the thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Bring the knee to your side without rotating the hips.\\", "The knee drives the movement and the ankle lags slightly behind.\\"]

title: Band Hip Thrust
instructions: ["Attach a band to an anchor point and face away from the anchor point.\\", "Loop the other end of the band around your hips.\\", "While keeping your knees extended, shift your hips back, then forward against the band.\\"]

title: Hip Openers
instructions: ["From the standing position perform a walkout (use to palms to \\\\", "Bring your leg to the side and place the foot by your palm.\\", "Rotate towards the ceiling and then towards the ground, pressing the hips towards the ground.\\"]

title: Abductor Leg Raise Side Lying Isometric
instructions: ["Stabilise yourself in the side lying position, using your upper arm and under leg\\", "Raise your upper leg till it is parallel to the ground and hold isometrically for the specified amount of time.\\", "Feel your bum (glute med) and the lateral line of your leg worked\\"]

title: Abductor Leg Raise Side Lying
instructions: ["Stabilise yourself in the side lying position, using your upper arm and under leg\\", "Raise your upper leg till it is parallel to the ground. This is your starting point.\\", "Raise your leg and lower back to parallel for the specified amount of reps and/or sets\\", "Feel your bum (glute med) and the lateral line of your leg worked\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Stand tall with a medicine ball held against one hip.\\", "Lift the leg on the opposite side laterally.\\", "Lower the leg and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Lateral Lunge Slam
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a medicine ball.\\", "Step laterally, performing a lunge, then slam the ball.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Press Jack
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at chest.\\", "Jump, extending arms overhead.\\", "Return to starting position. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Hand Sideplank Hip Abduction
instructions: ["Start in a side plank with hand on Bosu.\\", "Lift the top leg while keeping the body stable.\\", "Lower the leg back down.\\"]

title: Cardio Band Press Jacks
instructions: ["Stand with the band looped under both feet and the other end of the band in both hands in an overhead press position.\\", "Do a light hop and bring both feet outward while pressing the band overhead.\\"]

title: Cardio Band Reverse Fly Jacks
instructions: ["Grab the band with a double overhand grip. Bring both feet outward while performing a little hop.\\", "As you hop, pull the band apart.\\"]

title: Cardio Band Seal Jacks
instructions: ["Loop a band around your back. Start with both arms extended at your side.\\", "As you perform the jack. Bring both arms together and make a little clap.\\"]

title: Cardio Jumping Jacks
instructions: ["Stand with feet together, arms at your sides, ready to jump.\\", "Jump while spreading legs and raising arms overhead.\\", "Return to starting position with legs together and arms at your sides. Repeat.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Squat
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Maintain the natural arch in your back and put the bar on your back. Squeezing your shoulder blades and raise your chest.\\", "Grip the bar across your shoulders and support it on your upper back. Unwrack the smith machine by straightening your legs.\\", "Bend your knees as you lower the weight without altering the form of your back until your hips are below your knees.\\", "Raise the bar back to starting position, lift with your legs and exhale at the top.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Leg Curl
instructions: ["Lay flat on a bench with a dumbbell between your feet.\\", "Flex your knees and raise the dumbbell until the soles of your shoes are pointed at the ceiling.\\"]

title: Nordic Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Go to your knees and ask someone to hold your ankles.\\", "Put your hands in front of you\\", "With a slight bend in your knees slowly bring your body to the ground (slower is better)\\", "Push up and reset to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Reverse Lunge
instructions: ["Take a big step backwards with your left leg, lowering your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground and your right knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\", "Push through your right heel to return to standing, bringing your left leg back to starting position.\\", "Repeat the movement on the other side, stepping backwards with your right leg and lowering your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground and your left knee is bent at a 90-degree angle.\\"]

title: Single Leg Slider Hamstring Curl 2
instructions: ["Lie on your back with bent knees and heels on a slider.\\", "Perform a posterior pelvic tilt (flatten your lower back on the ground).\\", "Press the heels into the ground to raise your hips off it.\\", "Extend and bend the working leg.\\"]

title: Slider Hamstring Curl Single Leg
instructions: ["Lie on your back keeping both knees bent.\\", "Have a slider under the heel of the working leg.\\", "Extend and bend the working lag applying gentle downwards pressure.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Standing Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Stand up straight using a balancing aid.\\", "Shift your weight on one leg.\\", "Bend and extend the non-weight bearing leg.\\", "Knees should remain aligned.\\"]

title: Slider Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Lie on your back with slightly bent knees and heels on sliders.\\", "Pull your heels towards your glutes to lift your hips off the ground.\\", "Extend knees to starting position, but do not rest hips on ground.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Standing Hamstring Curl Isometric
instructions: ["Stand up straight using a balancing aid.\\", "Shift your weight on one leg.\\", "Bend the non-weight bearing leg and hold.\\", "Knees should remain aligned.\\"]

title: Slider Hamstring Curl Eccentric
instructions: ["Bend your knees so your feet are flat on the floor with heels under knees and toes raised.\\", "Place sliders under your heels. Perform a posterior pelvic tilt (flatten your lower back against the ground).\\", "Push through your heels into the ground, lifting your hips up to the point where there is a straight line from your chest to your knees.\\", "Extend your legs in a slow, controlled manner, to lower your bum to the ground.\\", "Casually bend knees before repeating.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Single Leg Balance Stable
instructions: ["Hold on to something stable and pull the leg on the opposing side straight up. Hold this position.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Lie on your back, heels on a stability ball, arms flat, and core engaged.\\", "Lift hips, curl the ball toward you using your hamstrings, keeping control and balance.\\", "Extend legs back to start while keeping hips lifted, then repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Machine Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Lay down on the machine, placing your legs beneath the padded lever. Position your legs so that the padded lever is below your calve muscles.\\", "Support yourself by grabbing the side handles of the machine, and slowly raise the weight with your legs, toes pointed straight.\\", "Pause at the apex of the motion, then slowly return to starting position.\\"]

title: Glute Ham Raise
instructions: ["Position yourself on a glute ham raise machine or find a suitable substitute like a stability ball or bench.\\", "Adjust the equipment to fit your body by setting the footplate at an appropriate height and making sure your feet are securely anchored.\\", "Begin the movement by slowly lowering your upper body towards the ground while keeping your torso and legs aligned.\\", "Once you reach the lowest point where your body is parallel to the ground or as far as you can comfortably go, pause briefly.\\", "Engage your glutes and hamstrings again as you push yourself back up to the starting position, using the strength of your posterior chain muscles.\\"]

title: Seated Leg Curl
instructions: ["Sit on the machine. Adjust the back pad to where the leg pad is just above your knees.\\", "Adjust the leg pad that goes on your lower leg until it's on your achilles.\\", "Use the two handles to push your self back in the chair. Curl your legs as far as possible, and then extend your knees. (Do not hyperextend)\\"]

title: Machine Seated Leg Curl
instructions: ["Sit back in the seat. Use the two handles to push yourself back into the chair.\\", "Flex your ankles and point your toes upward.\\", "Flex your knee bringing the pad backward, extend your knee without allowing the weight to touch back down.\\"]

title: Machine Standing Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Press yourself into the pads and put your calves against the lower pads.\\", "Flex your knee until you feel a contraction in your hamstring, then lower back to the start.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Kneeling Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Lay down on the machine, placing your working leg beneath the padded lever. Position your leg so that the padded lever is below your calve muscle.\\", "Support yourself by grabbing the side handles of the machine, and slowly raise the weight with your legs.\\", "Pause at the apex of the motion, then slowly return to starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Seated Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Adjust the back pad and ankle pad to suit your height.\\", "Disengage the knee pad and lower it as far as you can.\\", "Flex your knees against resistance, then extend until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.\\"]

title: Hamstrings Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs out in front of you.\\", "Reach forward to try and touch your toes. Reach as far forward as you can go.\\", "Hold the stretch for a few seconds then return to starting position.\\"]

title: Hamstrings Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with one leg outstretched and the other bent at the knee, foot resting on the opposite inner thigh.\\", "Reach forward to touch the toes of the outstretched leg.\\", "Hold the stretch for a few seconds then return to starting position.\\"]

title: Hamstrings Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Stand with one foot in front of the other.\\", "Bend your rear leg as much as you can, keeping the front leg straight.\\", "Hold the stretch for a few seconds then return to starting position.\\"]

title: Hamstrings Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Lie down with your legs reaching up the wall. your bum should be slightly off the floor.\\", "Bend one leg and leave the other outstretched.\\", "Push your thigh towards the wall.\\", "Hold the stretch for a few seconds then return to starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Use an ankle attachment with the cable set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Stand upright or try bending slightly forward.\\", "Flex at the knee and pull your ankle straight back.\\"]

title: Cable Seated Leg Curl
instructions: ["Bring a bench over to the cable stack, put the cable at head height (when seated). Use an ankle attachment.\\", "Flex at the knee and pull your ankle straight back.\\"]

title: Cable Single Leg Laying Leg Curl
instructions: ["Bring a bench over to the cable stack, put the cable all the way at the bottom. Use an ankle attachment.\\", "Flex at the knee and pull your ankle straight back.\\"]

title: Band Leg Curl
instructions: ["Loop the band around a sturdy anchor point such as a weightlifting rack or a door handle.\\", "Lie on your back with your heels placed inside the band. Make sure the band is centered under your heels and your feet are hip-width apart.\\", "Using your hamstrings, curl your heels towards your glutes while keeping your hips on the ground.\\"]

title: TRX Hamstring Curl
instructions: ["Start by facing the TRX straps and positioning yourself in a push-up position with your hands on the ground and your feet in the TRX foot cradles.\\", "Keeping your core engaged and body in a straight line, bend your knees and bring your heels towards your glutes.\\", "Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Half Monkey Pose
instructions: ["Start in a tabletop position with your hands and knees on the floor.\\", "Step your right foot forward, placing it between your hands.\\", "Straighten your right leg and flex your toes towards your face, keeping your hands on the floor for support.\\", "Hold for several breaths, then switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Seated Forward Bend
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.\\", "Inhale and lengthen your spine, then exhale and fold forward from your hips, keeping your spine long.\\", "Reach for your feet or ankles, keeping your elbows straight.\\", "Hold for several breaths, then release.\\"]

title: Pyramid Pose Blocks
instructions: ["Begin in Tadasana (Mountain Pose) with two blocks at the top of your mat.\\", "Step your left foot back about 3-4 feet and place your heel down, keeping your toes pointing forward.\\", "Place the blocks on either side of your right foot at a height that allows you to comfortably place your hands on them.\\", "Inhale and lengthen your spine, then exhale and fold forward from your hips, bringing your hands to the blocks. Hold for several breaths, then switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Pyramid Pose
instructions: ["Begin in Tadasana (Mountain Pose).\\", "Step your left foot back about 3-4 feet and place your heel down, keeping your toes pointing forward.\\", "Inhale and lengthen your spine, then exhale and fold forward from your hips, bringing your hands to the floor on either side of your right foot.\\", "Hold for several breaths, then switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Standing Forward Bend Blocks
instructions: ["Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place a block on the ground in front of you.\\", "Hinge forward at your hips and place your hands on the block.\\", "Allow your head to hang heavy and feel a stretch in the back of your legs.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then slowly roll up to a standing position.\\"]

title: Standing Forward Bend
instructions: ["Stand with your feet hip-width apart.\\", "Hinge forward at your hips, reaching your hands towards the ground.\\", "Allow your head to hang heavy and feel a stretch in the back of your legs.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then slowly roll up to a standing position.\\"]

title: Warrior Three
instructions: ["Start in mountain pose, standing with your feet hip-width apart and arms at your sides.\\", "Step your left foot back about 3-4 feet and raise it off the ground, while keeping your right foot facing forward.\\", "Inhale and reach your arms forward, parallel to the ground.\\", "Exhale and hinge forward at your hips, bringing your torso parallel to the ground and extending your left leg straight back. Keep your arms and right leg straight and hold the pose for a few breaths\\", "inhale and return to mountain pose. Repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Wide Legged Standing Forward Bend Holding Heels
instructions: ["Start standing at the top of your mat with your feet wide apart.\\", "Exhale and fold forward from your hips, bringing your hands up and over your head towards the ground.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then release the hands and come back up to standing.\\"]

title: Butt Kick
instructions: ["Stand tall, jog in place, bringing heels toward your glutes.\\", "Keep your core tight and swing arms naturally.\\", "Alternate legs quickly, maintaining a steady rhythm.\\"]

title: Hamstring Stretch Supine Glide
instructions: ["Place a theraband around your foot.\\", "Lie back onto the ground.\\", "Raise your leg to stretching point with the aid of the band, keeping a slightly bent knee.\\", "Extend and bend your knee to actively stretch your hamstring.\\"]

title: Hamstring Stretch Supine Dynamic Band
instructions: ["Place a theraband or stretch strap around your foot.\\", "Lie back onto the ground.\\", "Raise your leg to stretching point with the aid of the band (strap).\\", "Tug onto the strap on the end of range to dynamically stretch the hamstring.\\"]

title: Hamstring Stretch Supine Static
instructions: ["Place a theraband or stretch strap around your foot.\\", "Lie back onto the ground.\\", "Raise your leg to stretching point with the aid of the band (strap).\\", "Tug onto the strap on the end of range to dynamically stretch the hamstring.\\"]

title: Hamstring Stretch Static Standing Single Leg
instructions: ["From the standing position, bring one leg slightly forward.\\", "Raise your toes and lean over towards them.\\", "Maintain the position.\\"]

title: Hamstring Stretch Seated Single Leg Isometric
instructions: ["Sit against a wall.\\", "Bend one leg and tuck the foot by the straight leg's knee.\\", "Dynamically reach forward towards your toes and return to starting position.\\"]

title: Hamstring Stretch Dynamic Supine Alternating
instructions: ["Lie on your back with straight legs.\\", "Perform a posterior pelvic tilt and maintain the position.\\", "Kick one leg up to feel a stretch in the hamstring.\\"]

title: Hamstring Stretch Dynamic Standing Bilateral
instructions: ["Standing, split stance.\\", "Dynamically kick your back leg forward and up.\\", "Return to starting position.\\"]

title: Hamstring Mobilisation Seated Lacrosse Ball
instructions: ["Place a massage ball on a bench.\\", "Sit on the ball with your hamstring.\\", "Move around till you find a tight/sore spot.\\", "Extend and bend your knee to mobilise the hamstring.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Pullover
instructions: ["Grab a dumbbell and hold with both hands. Point your dumbbell at the ceiling.\\", "Flex at the shoulder joint while keeping your elbows mostly extended.\\", "Flex until you feel a stretch in your lats then bring the dumbbell back to the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Shoulder Extension
instructions: ["Start by hinging over with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in each hand.\\", "Bring the dumbbells to your sides, with your palms facing forward and your elbows slightly bent.\\", "Make sure to keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Machine Pulldown
