instructions: ["Grip the bar with the palms facing forward, your hands need to be spaced out at a distance wider than shoulder width.\\", "As you have both arms extended in front of you holding the bar, bring your torso back around 30 degrees while sticking your chest out.\\", "Pull the bar down to about chin level or a little lower in a smooth movement whilst squeezing the shoulder blades together.\\", "After a second of squeezing, slowly raise the bar back to the starting position when your arms are fully extended.\\"]

title: Machine Neutral Row
instructions: ["Sit on the machine, feet flat, and grab the handles with palms facing each other, keeping your back straight.\\", "Pull handles towards your lower abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Keep elbows close to your body.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position, fully extending your arms without locking elbows. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Stretcher
instructions: ["Place your foot on the leg pad for leverage and grab the attachment.\\", "Start with your arms extended and your head between your arms.\\", "Begin to pull. As you pull, lean backwards until the attachment touches your chest.\\"]

title: Machine Chest Supported T Bar Row
instructions: ["Lay on the chest pad and grab the handles. Lift the bar out of the holding hook.\\", "Pull the bar to your chest and then fully extend your elbows at the bottom of each rep.\\"]

title: Machine Pullover
instructions: ["Adjust the seating pad for your height.\\", "Place your elbows on the elbow pad. Pull the bar forward until it nearly touches your stomach.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Seal Row
instructions: ["Lay on the chest after adjusting the height off the bar holding hooks to match your arm length.\\", "Remove the bar from the hooks, then initiate the set.\\", "Pull the bar straight back, then lower to the start position. Fully extend your elbows at the bottom of each rep.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded T Bar Row
instructions: ["Hinge forward while keeping your back flat.\\", "Grab the handles and pull the weight toward your chest.\\", "Make sure to fully extend your elbows at the bottom of each rep. Also make sure to not use momentum.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Row
instructions: ["Sit on the machine, feet flat, and grab the handles.\\", "Pull handles towards your lower abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Keep elbows close to your body.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position, fully extending your arms without locking elbows. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Shoulder Extension
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart bending forward at the hips as far as comfortable. Place off-hand on the same side thigh for stability.\\", "Hold the kettlebell in one hand, straight armed and pointing towards the floor.\\", "Keeping your arm straight, swing the kettlebell behind you as far as comfortable.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Pullover
instructions: ["Rest your upper back on the bench and place soles of your feet firmly on the floor keeping torso and thighs suspended and parallel to the floor.\\", "Hold the kettlebell with both hands above your chest, keeping your arms straight.\\", "Keeping your arms straight, move the kettlebell in the direction of your head until your arms are parallel to the floor.\\", "Return to starting to position and repeat.\\"]

title: Lats Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Find a wall to lean against, lay your tricep against the wall with your hand behind your back.\\", "Slowly lean into the wall.\\", "Return to starting position, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Lats Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Stand up right and raise your hand to a full stretch above your head.\\", "Slowly lean across your body and trace the opposite hand down your leg.\\", "Hold at the bottom of the stretch, return to starting position and then switch sides.\\"]

title: Lats Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Place both hands on the wall in front of you.\\", "Slowly lower your body until you feel the stretch.\\", "Hold at the bottom of the stretch, return to starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Lat Prayer
instructions: ["You can use any attachment. Cable should be set all the way to the top of the machine.\\", "Grab your attachment and walk a few steps back. Push your butt back to where you are leaning forward. Your ears should be between your arms.\\", "Initiate the movement with your shoulders and not your elbows. As you flex at the shoulder joint push your hips forward until your hips meet the attachment.\\"]

title: Cable Bent Over Bar Pullover
instructions: ["You can use any attachment. Cable should be set all the way to the top of the machine.\\", "Grab your attachment and walk a few steps back. Push your butt back to where you are leaning forward somewhat.\\", "Initiate the movement with your shoulders and not your elbows. Imagine trying to pull the attachment through your thighs at the bottom.\\"]

title: Cable Straight Arm Pull In
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment set all the way to the top of the cable crossover machine.\\", "Walk a few steps away from the cable machine. Face your body sideways.\\", "Face your palm forward. Then pull your elbow in toward your rib cage.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Lat Prayer
instructions: ["Use a rope attachment. Cable should be set all the way to the top of the machine.\\", "Grab your attachment and walk a few steps back. Push your butt back to where you are leaning forward. Your ears should be between your arms.\\", "Initiate the movement with your shoulders and not your elbows. As you flex at the shoulder joint push your hips forward until your hips meet the attachment.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Pullover
instructions: ["Use a rope attachment. Cable should be set all the way to the top of the machine.\\", "Grab your attachment and walk a few steps back. Push your butt back to where you are leaning forward somewhat.\\", "Initiate the movement with your shoulders and not your elbows. Imagine trying to pull the attachment through your thighs at the bottom.\\"]

title: Cable Kayak Row
instructions: ["Use a bar attachment. Cable should be set all the way to the top of the machine.\\", "Grab your attachment and walk a few steps back. Push your butt back to where you are leaning forward somewhat.\\", "Initiate the movement with your shoulders and not your elbows. Bring one arm to your side.\\", "You can either alternate sides or do one side at a time.\\"]

title: Band Pullover
instructions: ["Place the band just above our level. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Push your hips back slightly. Extend and flex at the shoulder joint.\\"]

title: Plate Alternating Deadstop Row
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart. Hold each plate to the side of you.\\", "Bend forward at the hips bringing the plates to the floor while you slightly bend your knees, keeping your back straight.\\", "One at a time, lift the plate up. Return the plate to the floor and do the other side.\\"]

title: Child Pose Arms Extended
instructions: ["Begin in a tabletop position with your hands and knees on the ground.\\", "Sit back onto your heels and extend your arms out in front of you.\\", "Rest your forehead on the ground.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then release.\\"]

title: Child Pose Arms Extended Left Right
instructions: ["Begin in a tabletop position with your hands and knees on the ground.\\", "Sit back onto your heels and extend your arms out in front of you to one side.\\", "Rest your forehead on the ground.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Child Pose Arms On Side
instructions: ["Begin in a tabletop position with your hands and knees on the ground.\\", "Sit back onto your heels and place your arms at your sides with your palms facing up.\\", "Rest your forehead on the ground.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then release.\\"]

title: extended-side-angle-pose
instructions: ["Begin in a lunge position with your right foot forward and your left foot back.\\", "Place your right hand on a block or the ground on the outside of your right foot.\\", "Reach your left arm overhead and then round your spine, bringing your left hand to your right ear.\\", "Look down towards your right foot as you reach your left arm towards the front of the room, feeling a stretch in your side body. Hold for a few breaths and then switch sides.\\"]

title: Extended side Angle Pose With Block
instructions: ["Begin in a lunge position with your right foot forward and your left foot back.\\", "Place a block on the outside of your right foot and place your right hand on top of it.\\", "Look down towards your right foot as you reach your left arm towards the front of the room, feeling a stretch in your side body. Hold for a few breaths and then switch sides.\\"]

title: Gate Pose Rounding Spine Looking Up
instructions: ["Begin in a kneeling position with your knees hip-width apart.\\", "Extend your right leg out to the side, placing your foot flat on the ground.\\", "Reach your right arm overhead and then round your spine, bringing your right hand to your left ear.\\", "Look down towards your left foot as you reach your left arm towards your right foot, feeling a stretch in your side body. Hold for a few breaths and then switch sides.\\"]

title: Two Arms Cow Face Pose
instructions: ["Begin in a comfortable seated position on your mat, with your legs crossed and your spine straight.\\", "Extend your right arm up toward the ceiling and bend it at the elbow, bringing your right hand behind your head.\\", "Reach your left arm behind your back and bend it at the elbow, bringing your left hand up between your shoulder blades.\\", "Clasp your hands behind your back, trying to touch your fingertips together. If you can't quite reach, you can use a strap or towel to bridge the gap between your hands.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Pullover
instructions: ["Lie on ground with head and shoulders supported.\\", "Hold a bosu and lower it back over the head.\\", "Bring the bosu back over the chest to complete one rep.\\"]

title: Lat And Shoulder External Rotation Stretch 2 Kneeling Dowel
instructions: ["Kneel in front of a bench, placing your elbows on with palms facing up while holding the dowel at shoulder width.\\", "Sit your hips back onto your heels, pressing the head in between the arms.\\", "You should feel a stretch in your lats, triceps and deep in the shoulder joint.\\", "You can add movement (bend-extended arms) to mobilise the shoulder joint.\\"]

title: Lat And Shoulder External Rotation Stretch 3 Kneeling Dowel
instructions: ["Kneel in front of a bench, placing your elbows on with palms facing up while holding the dowel at shoulder width.\\", "Sit your hips back onto your heels, pressing the head in between the arms.\\", "You should feel a stretch in your lats, triceps and deep in the shoulder joint.\\", "You can add movement (bend-extended arms) to mobilise the shoulder joint.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Pullover Eccentrics
instructions: ["Lie on a bench holding a dumbbell over your shoulder, straight arm.\\", "Slowly lower your arm towards the ground (overhead position).\\", "Pause in the stretched position.\\", "Bend your elbow to return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Lat Mobilisation Floor Foam Roller
instructions: ["Sit on the floor next to a foam roller.\\", "Lean in such a way that the foam roller is under your lat.\\", "The arm of that side should ideally be raised.\\", "Roll your lat up and down the foam roller to mobilise it.\\"]

title: Lat And Shoulder External Rotation Stretch 1 Kneeling Dowel
instructions: ["Kneel in front of a bench, placing your elbows on with palms facing up while holding the dowel at shoulder width.\\", "Sit your hips back onto your heels, pressing the head in between the arms.\\", "You should feel a stretch in your lats, triceps and deep in the shoulder joint.\\", "You can add movement (bend-extended arms) to mobilise the shoulder joint.\\"]

title: Barbell Overhead Press
instructions: ["Take a roughly shoulder width grip. There should be a straight line from your elbow to fist (vertical forearms).\\", "Pull your chin back and press the weight toward the ceiling by extending at the elbow joint and flexing at the shoulder joint.\\", "Press until your elbows are extended and push your head forward slightly.\\", "Return to the start position with control. Pulling your chin back to allow the bar to pass your face safely.\\"]

title: Barbell Upright Row
instructions: ["Take a double overhand roughly shoulder width grip.\\", "Pull your elbows straight up the ceiling. Aim to get the bar to chin level or slightly higher.\\"]

title: Barbell Z Press
instructions: ["Begin by sitting on the ground with your legs extended and a barbell in your hands, with your palms facing forward and your elbows bent.\\", "Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, lift the barbell up from your chest and press it straight up above your head.\\", "Lower the barbell back down to your chest.\\"]

title: Landmine Alternating Single Arm Press
instructions: ["Stand facing the landmine leaning forward slightly with the end of the barbell held in one hand at your shoulder with your elbow positioned beneath your wrist.\\", "While keeping your elbow pointed forward, drive the bar directly overhead, switching hands at the top of the movement. Lower the bar back down to the other side of your body, mirroring the starting position.\\", "Repeat for desired number of reps, switching hands at the top of each rep.\\"]

title: Landmine Half Kneeling Single Arm Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start facing the landmine on one knee with your other foot in front of you while holding the barbell in one hand at your shoulder on the same side as the knee that is on the ground.\\", "Drive the bar upwards while keeping your elbow pointed forward until your arm holding the bar is fully extending, then control the bar as your lower it back to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for desired number of reps, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Kneeling Alternating Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start in a kneeling position facing the barbell with one hand holding the end of the barbell at your shoulder with your elbow tucked beneath your wrist.\\", "Keeping your elbow pointing forward, drive the barbell up overhead until your arm is fully extended and switch the bar to your other hand at the top of the movement.\\", "Control the descent of the bar to your other shoulder and repeat movement for desired reps, switching hands at the top of each rep.\\"]

title: Landmine Kneeling Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start kneeling in front of the landmine, facing towards it, with your knees hip-width apart and your back straight while holding the end of the bar in both hands in front of your chest.\\", "Push the landmine up overhead by fully extending your arms until the weight is directly over your head. Pause briefly at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the landmine back down to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand perpendicularly to the barbell, holding the end of the bar at your outer hip with your inner hand and your palm facing your body.\\", "While keeping your core braced and your arm straight, lift the barbell diagonally up and towards the direction of the landmine attachment, then return the bar to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Overhead Press
instructions: ["Stand facing the landmine, holding the end of the bar in both hands with your palms facing each other.\\", "Extend your arms upward, pressing the end of the bar up overhead. Pause at the top of the movement, then lower the bar with control back to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Seated Alternating Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start sitting on the ground facing the landmine attachment with your legs open for stability while holding the end of the bar in a neutral grip with your hand resting at your shoulder and your elbow beneath your wrist.\\", "Leaning forward slightly, press the bar up into the air until your arm is fully extended. At the top of the movement, switch which hand is holding the end of the bar and lower the bar back down to the opposite shoulder. Perform again to return the bar to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Seated Overhead Press
instructions: ["Sit on the ground facing the landmine with your legs spread. Hold the end of the bar in both hands in front of your chest with your palms facing each other.\\", "While keeping your torso tall and core brace, drive the end of the bar upward until your arms are fully extended. Lean forward slightly for full range of motion in the shoulder joints. Lower the bar back down to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Seated Single Arm Overhead Press
instructions: ["Sit on the ground facing the landmine with your legs spread. Hold the end of the bar in one hand in front of that shoulder with your palm facing across your body.\\", "While keeping your torso tall and your core braced, drive the bar upwards until your arm is fully extended, leaning forward slightly for full range of motion in the shoulder joint. Lower the bar back down to the starting position with control.\\", "Repeat for desired number of reps on one side, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Single Arm Overhead Press
instructions: ["Stand in front of the landmine with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent. Grasp the landmine barbell with one hand, palm facing in, and bring it to shoulder height with your elbow tucked beneath your hand.\\", "Press the barbell overhead by extending your arm fully, pushing the weight upward. Keep your core engaged, your back straight, and your shoulder down throughout the movement. Pause briefly at the top of the movement with your arm fully extended overhead. Slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position at shoulder height with control.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps on one side before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Single Arm Push Press
instructions: ["Stand in front of the landmine with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent. Grasp the landmine barbell with one hand, palm facing in, and bring it to shoulder height with your elbow tucked beneath your hand.\\", "Dip your body slightly then drive up through the ground to generate momentum as your extend your arm fully upwards. Pause briefly at the top of the rep, then lower the weight back down to the starting position with control.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps on one side before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Single Arm Staggered Overhead Press
instructions: ["Stand facing the bar in a split stance with one leg forward and bent and the other back and straight. Hold the bar in the hand on the side of the leg that is back with the end of the bar at your shoulder with your elbow tucked beneath your hand.\\", "Drive the bar upwards until your arm is fully extended. Pause briefly before lowering the end of the bar back down to the starting position with control.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Split Jerk
instructions: ["Hold the bar over one shoulder. Stand with a shoulder width stance.\\", "Dip at the hips and knees, generate some momentum and press the bar.\\", "As you press, split your stance. Bring the leg of the working arm back and the other forward.\\"]

title: Barbell Behind The Neck Seated Overhead Press
instructions: ["Take a roughly shoulder width grip. There should be a straight line from your elbow to fist (vertical forearms).\\", "Push your head foward and press the weight toward the ceiling by extending at the elbow joint and flexing at the shoulder joint.\\", "Press until your elbows are extended and push your head forward slightly.\\"]

title: Barbell Seated Full Front Raise
instructions: ["Sit on an incline bench with an overhand grip on the barbell. Raise your arms until your fists are pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Return to the start under control. This exercise is prone to using momentum when you begin to fatigue.\\"]

title: Barbell Bradford Press
instructions: ["Hold a barbell at shoulder height with a pronated grip.\\", "Press the barbell over your head.\\", "Lower it behind your head, then return to the front. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Barbell Full Front Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall with an overhand grip on the barbell. Raise your arms until your fists are pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Return to the start under control. This exercise is prone to using momentum when you begin to fatigue.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand up straight with dumbbells at either side, palms facing your hips.\\", "Raise your arms on either side with a slight bend in your elbow until they are parallel with the floor. Pause at the top of the motion.\\", "Slowly return your arms down to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["With dumbbells in either hand, bend your knees with your feet slightly bowed out. Arch your back above your knees, and start with the weights touching in front of your chest.\\", "With bent elbows, raise your arms up to shoulder level, pausing at the at the end of the motion.\\", "Slowly lower your arms back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Overhead Press
instructions: ["Sit on a bench with back support. Raise the dumbbells to shoulder height with your palms forward.\\", "Raise the dumbbells upwards and pause at the contracted position.\\", "Lower the weights back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Front Raise
instructions: ["Grab two dumbbells while standing upright with the dumbbells at your side.\\", "Raise the two dumbbells with your elbows being fully extended until the dumbbells are eye level.\\", "Lower the weights in a controlled manner to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["With dumbbells in either hand, bend your knees with your feet slightly bowed out. Arch your back above your knees, and start with the weights touching in front of your chest.\\", "With bent elbows, raise your arms up to shoulder level, pausing at the at the end of the motion.\\", "Slowly lower your arms back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Bayesian Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Lay on an incline bench and let your arms freely.\\", "Lateral raise your arms straight out to the side until your arms are about parallel with the ground.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Neutral Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on the decline bench, grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing each other. Keep your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Once the dumbbells reach your chest, pause for a moment and then press them back up to the starting position.\\", "This variation is much easier on the shoulder joints.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Laying Reverse Fly
instructions: ["With dumbbells in either hand, lay on an incline bench that's at about 15-30 degrees.\\", "With bent elbows, raise your arms up to shoulder level, pausing at the at the end of the motion.\\", "Slowly lower your arms back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Laying Reverse Fly Internally Rotated
instructions: ["With dumbbells in either hand and an overhand grip, lay on an incline bench that is roughly 15 - 30 degrees high.\\", "With bent elbows, raise your arms up to shoulder level, pausing at the at the end of the motion.\\", "Slowly lower your arms back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Neutral Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on a flat bench, grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing each other. Keep your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Once the dumbbells reach your chest, pause for a moment and then press them back up to the starting position.\\", "This variation is much easier on the shoulder joints.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Neutral Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on an incline bench, grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing each other. Keep your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Once the dumbbells reach your chest, pause for a moment and then press them back up to the starting position.\\", "This variation is much easier on the shoulder joints.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Neutral Seated Overhead Press
instructions: ["Sit on an upright bench , grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing each other. Keep your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells to your shoulder joint, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Once the dumbbells reach your chest, pause for a moment and then press them back up to the starting position.\\", "This variation is much easier on the shoulder joints.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Arnold Press
instructions: ["Begin seated on an upright bench with your palms facing you.\\", "Begin pressing toward the ceiling. As you press, rotate your palms.\\", "As you extend your elbows fully your palms should be facing forward.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Alternating Arnold Press
instructions: ["Start in a standing position\\"]

title: Dumbbell Alternating Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start with two dumbbells just above your shoulders.\\", "Press one dumbbell to the ceiling while keeping the other in place.\\", "Let the first dumbbell return to its starting position before pressing the other dumbbell.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Arnold Press
instructions: ["Stand with both palms facing you.\\", "Begin to press the dumbbells to the ceiling while rotating your palms.\\", "When you reach elbow extension, your palms should be facing forward.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Neutral Alternating Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start with two dumbbells near your shoulders with a neutral grip.\\", "Press one of the dumbbells toward the ceiling while keeping the other in position.\\", "Let the first dumbbell return to its starting position before pressing the other.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Neutral Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start with both dumbbells near your shoulders in a neutral grip.\\", "Press the dumbbells toward the ceiling.\\", "Make sure you don't arch your back as you fatigue.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in each hand.\\", "Bring the dumbbells to your shoulders, with your palms facing forward and your elbows bent.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arms upwards so that the dumbbells are overhead.\\", "Make sure to keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Push Press
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in each hand.\\", "From this starting position, dip your knees slightly and then quickly extend them as you press the dumbbells upwards.\\", "Make sure to keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the movement.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position, and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Arnold Press
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in one hand.\\", "Bring the dumbbell to your shoulder, with your palm facing you and your elbow bent.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arm upwards so that the dumbbell is directly above your head.\\", "As you extend your arm, rotate your palm to face away from your body.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Neutral Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in one hand.\\", "Bring the dumbbell to your shoulder, with your palm facing your body and your elbow bent.\\", "From this starting position, press the dumbbell upwards so that it is directly above your shoulder.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in one hand.\\", "Bring the dumbbell to your shoulder, with your palm facing forward and your elbow bent.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arm upwards so that the dumbbell is overhead.\\", "Make sure to keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Laying Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Lay on your side on a bench or box. Place one hand on the floor and the other hand is holding the dumbbell.\\", "While keeping your elbow mostly extended, raise the dumbbell to the side.\\", "The end of the range of motion is when the dumbbell is pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Make sure you don't flex and extend your elbow.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Upright Row
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand with an overhand grip.\\", "Keep your back straight and chest lifted, engage your core to maintain balance.\\", "Begin the movement by lifting the dumbbell straight up towards your chin, keeping your elbow close to your body and the weight in line with your shoulder.\\", "Continue to lift the weight until it reaches the chin or neck level, keeping the elbow high and close to the body.\\", "Lower the weight back down to the starting position with control.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Upright Row
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding 2 dumbbells in each hand.\\", "Keep your back straight and chest lifted, engage your core to maintain balance.\\", "Begin the movement by lifting the dumbbells straight up towards your chin, keeping your elbow close to your body and the weight in line with your shoulder.\\", "Continue to lift the weight until it reaches the chin or neck level, keeping the elbow high and close to the body.\\"]

title: Internally Rotated Seated Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["Sit with your chest in your lap, dumbbells in hands, arms bent, internally rotate shoulders.\\", "Raise dumbbells out to sides, squeeze rear delts.\\", "Lower weights, repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Seated Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Sit upright on bench or box.\\", "Hold dumbbells at sides\\", "Lift arms to shoulder height.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Bent Arm Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall with a 90 degree bend at your elbows.\\", "Lateral raise your arms straight out to the side until your arms are about parallel with the ground.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Shoulder External Rotation
instructions: ["Sit on a bench with one foot on the bench.\\", "Place the elbow on the inside of your elbow and use it for leverage.\\", "Point your fist toward the wall andthen toward the ceiling. Rotating a total of 90 degrees.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Standing Bayesian Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall on lean slightly forward.\\", "Lateral raise your arms straight out to the side until your arms are about parallel with the ground.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Internally Rotated Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["Sit with hinged over position, dumbbells in hands, arms slightly bent, internally rotate shoulders.\\", "Raise dumbbells out to sides, squeeze rear delts.\\", "Lower weights, repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Half Kneeling Single Arm Overhead Press
instructions: ["Take a half kneeling position while holding one dumbbell.\\", "Drive the dumbbell upwards.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Half Kneeling Overhead Press
instructions: ["Take a half kneeling position while holding two dumbbells.\\", "Drive the dumbbells upwards.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Head On Bench Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["With dumbbells in either hand, bend your knees with your feet slightly bowed out. Arch your back above your knees, place your head on the top of an incline bench, and start with the weights touching in front of your chest.\\", "With bent elbows, raise your arms up to shoulder level, pausing at the at the end of the motion.\\", "Slowly lower your arms back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Incline Front Raise
instructions: ["Grab two dumbbells while sitting on an incline bench upright with the dumbbells at your side.\\", "Raise the two dumbbells with your elbows being fully extended until the dumbbells are eye level.\\", "Lower the weights in a controlled manner to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Single Arm Arnold Press
instructions: ["Start by sitting on an incline bench and holding a dumbbell in one hand.\\", "Bring the dumbbell to your shoulder, with your palm facing you and your elbow bent.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arm upwards so that the dumbbell is directly above your head.\\", "As you extend your arm, rotate your palm to face away from your body.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Y Press
instructions: ["Sit on an upright bench , grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing each other. Keep your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Press the dumbbells outward into a y shape.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Alternating Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["With dumbbells in either hand, bend your knees with your feet slightly bowed out. Arch your back above your knees, and start with the weights touching in front of your chest.\\", "With bent elbows, raise your arms up to shoulder level, pausing at the at the end of the motion.\\", "Slowly lower your arms back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Y Press
instructions: ["Stand tall, grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing each other. Keep your elbows bent and close to your body.\\", "Press the dumbbells outward into a y shape.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Full Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand up straight with dumbbells at either side, palms facing your hips.\\", "Raise your arms on either side with a slight bend in your elbow until they are over head. Pause at the top of the motion.\\", "Slowly return your arms down to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Full Front Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall with an overhand grip on the dumbbell. Raise your arms until your fists are pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Return to the start under control. This exercise is prone to using momentum when you begin to fatigue.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Laying Incline Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Lay on your side on an incline bench. Brace yourself by holding onto the bench.\\", "While keeping your elbow mostly extended, raise the dumbbell to the side.\\", "The end of the range of motion is when the dumbbell is pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Make sure you don't flex and extend your elbow.\\"]

title: Backward Arm Circle
instructions: ["Hold your arms out to your sides.\\", "Rotate your arms backwards in small circles.\\"]

title: Forward Arm Circle
instructions: ["Hold your arms out to your sides.\\", "Rotate your arms forward in small circles.\\"]

title: Ring Standing Pushup
instructions: ["Start by setting up the rings to a secure anchor point and adjust the straps so that they hang about waist height when you stand under them.\\", "Stand facing the rings grab the handles with both hands, and step forward so that your body is in a plank position with your hands directly beneath your shoulders.\\", "Lower your body down by bending your elbows until your chest nearly touches the handles. Keep your core tight and your body in a straight line.\\", "Push your body back up to the starting position, straightening your arms as you do so. Make sure to engage your chest, triceps, and core throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Front Raise
instructions: ["Stand up straight with feet shoulder width apart, holding the kettlebell in front of your pelvis.\\", "Keeping arms straight, raise the kettlebell slightly higher than head level.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart holding the kettlebell with both hands in front of your thighs.\\", "Bend forward at the hips bringing the kettlebell to the floor while you slightly bend your knees, keeping your back straight.\\", "Bring one arm behind you and rest this arm on your back. With the other arm, hold the kettlebell at arms length close to the floor.\\", "Swing the kettlebell out and up towards the side of your body and then return to centre. Repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Long Lever Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder width apart holding a kettlebell with one hand at your side.\\", "Keeping your arm straight, swing the kettlebell up and out, away from your body to around head height, holding on to the kettlebell firmly so it does not change position in your hand.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder width apart holding a kettlebell with one hand at your side.\\", "Keeping your arm straight, swing the kettlebell up and out, away from your body to around head height.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Upright Row
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart holding the kettlebell with both hands in front of your thighs.\\", "Bend forward at the hips bringing the kettlebell to the floor while you slightly bend your knees, keeping your back straight.\\", "Lift the kettlebell upwards towards your chest and lower - repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Push Press
instructions: ["Start with kettlebell in rack position.\\", "Dip at knees and hips.\\", "Explosively push kettlebell overhead, fully extending arms.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Seated Overhead Press
instructions: ["There should be a straight line from your elbow to fist (vertical forearms).\\", "Sit tall and try not to arch your spine as you're pressing.\\", "Press until your elbows are extended and push your head forward slightly.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Bottoms Up Single Arm Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding one kettlebell with the bottom of the kettlebell facing up.\\", "Bring the kettlebell to your shoulders, with your palms facing forward and your elbows bent.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arms upwards so that the kettlebell are overhead.\\", "Make sure to keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Bottoms Up Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a kettlebell in each hand with the bottom of the kettlebell facing up.\\", "Bring the kettlebells to your shoulders, with your palms facing forward and your elbows bent.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arms upwards so that the kettlebells are overhead.\\", "Make sure to keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Kneeling Bottoms Up Overhead Press
instructions: ["Start by taking a kneeling position and holding a kettlebell in each hand with the bottom of the kettlebell facing up.\\", "Bring the kettlebells to your shoulders, with your palms facing forward and your elbows bent.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arms upwards so that the kettlebells are overhead.\\", "Make sure to keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Shoulders Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Stand with you feet shoulder width apart. Place one arm across the front of your chest at shoulder height, press the forearm of your other arm above the elbow, hooking the stretching arm with your hand.\\", "Press the arm until it is straight and rotate your upper torso to engage the stretch even deeper.\\", "Repeat with your other arm.\\"]

title: Shoulders Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Place the top of your hand into the small of your back, your arm at a 90 degree angle.\\", "Hold your elbow with the other arm, and slowly pull the arm forward until you feel your shoulder engaged in the stretch. Pause at the apex of the stretch and return to the starting position.\\", "Return to starting position, and repeat with your other arm.\\"]

title: Shoulders Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Start with your arms at either side. Begin by pushing your shoulders forward and in towards your chest.\\", "Continue the circular motion with your shoulders, pinching up towards your ears, and then extending your chest outwards while you finish the motion.\\", "Repeat as necessary.\\"]

title: Shoulders Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Reach one arm behind your body, with your elbow pointing upward behind your head.\\", "Assist the stretch with your other hand on your elbow to engage your shoulder.\\", "Pause for a few seconds, then repeat the stretch with your other arm.\\"]

title: Alternating Pole Rotation
instructions: ["Start with the pole in front of you with an overhand wider than shoulder width grip.\\", "Rotate one arm overhead and behind while keeping the other arm in front of you.\\", "Then rotate the other arm.\\", "Bring the original arm back to the starting position, then the other arm. Repeat.\\"]

title: Pole Rotation
instructions: ["Start with the pole in front of you with an overhand wider than shoulder width grip.\\", "Rotate both arms overhead and behind you while leaving your elbows mostly extended.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Face Pulls
instructions: ["Facing the pulley, pull the weight towards you while keeping your arms parallel to the ground.\\", "Pull your hands back to both sides of your head and hold the position.\\", "Slowly return weight to starting position. Repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Overhead Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment with the cable set to the bottom of the machine. Stand upright making sure to maintain a flat back. Your starting position will have your palms facing forward.\\", "Use both your elbows and shoulders to press the weight directly overhead.\\"]

title: Cable Low Single Arm Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment with the cable set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "You should vertically abduct at the shoulder raising your arm straight out to the side.\\", "Raise until your arm is parallel with the ground and then back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable High Single Arm Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment or no attachment at all. The cable should be set to the top.\\", "Walk a few steps away with the cable coming from the opposing side of the working arm.\\", "From there, your shoulders should horizontally abduct and adduct, while your elbows stay in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Cable Upright Row
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment with the cable set to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Pull your elbows straight up toward the ceiling until the attachment is just below your chin then extend until your elbows are fully extended.\\"]

title: Cable Low Bilateral Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment with the cable set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "You should vertically abduct at the shoulder raising your arms straight out to the side.\\", "Raise until your arms are parallel with the ground and then back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Bar Front Raise
instructions: ["Face away from the cables.\\", "With your elbows extended raise your fists straight up to the ceiling until they are at eye level.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Single Arm Low Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Use a rope attachment with the cable set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "You should vertically abduct at the shoulder raising your arms straight out to the side.\\", "Raise until your arms are parallel with the ground and then back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Mid Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Place the cable at the same height as your fist when your arms are at your side and stand with the cable crossing your body.\\", "While keeping your elbow mostly extended, lift your arm until it's parallel with the floor.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Front Raise
instructions: ["Face away from the cables. Use a rope attachment.\\", "With your elbows extended raise your fists straight up to the ceiling until they are at eye level.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Upright Row
instructions: ["Use a rope attachment with the cable set to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Pull your elbows straight up toward the ceiling until the attachment is just below your chin then extend until your elbows are fully extended.\\"]

title: Cable High Reverse Fly
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment or no attachment at all. The cable should be set to the top.\\", "Walk a few steps away with the cable coming from the opposing side of the working arm.\\", "From there, your shoulders should horizontally abduct and adduct, while your elbows stay in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Internally Rotated High Reverse Fly
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment or no attachment at all. The cable should be set to the top.\\", "Walk a few steps away with the cable coming from the opposing side of the working arms. Internally rotate the shoulders.\\", "From there, your shoulder should horizontally abduct and adduct, while your elbows stay in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Cable High Internally Rotated Reverse Fly
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment or no attachment at all. The cable should be set to the top.\\", "Walk a few steps away with the cable coming from the opposing side of the working arms. Internally rotate the shoulders.\\", "From there, your shoulders should horizontally abduct and adduct, while your elbows stay in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Band Face Pull
instructions: ["Anchor the band at eye level. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Use an overhand grip with both hands. Pull the band to the bridge of your nose flaring your elbows out.\\"]

title: Band Front Raise
instructions: ["Stand on the band with one or 2 feet depending on how heavy you want the band to be.\\", "With your elbows extended raise your fists straight up to the ceiling until they are at eye level.\\"]

title: Band Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Grab the band at shoulder width. Raise your arms straight out to the side.\\", "The band should scrape against your shirt.\\"]

title: Band Single Arm Overhead Press
instructions: ["Loop the band under one of your feet. The other end of the bed should be in your hand between your thumb and pointer finger.\\", "Press the band straight up towards the ceiling. Until your elbow is fully extended.\\"]

title: Band Low Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Anchor a band to a low point and stand with the band crossing your body.\\", "While keeping your elbow mostly extended, lift your arm until it's parallel with the floor.\\"]

title: Band Mid Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Anchor a band to a point that is the same height as your fist when your arms are at your side and stand with the band crossing your body.\\", "While keeping your elbow mostly extended, lift your arm until it's parallel with the floor.\\"]

title: Band Overhead Press
instructions: ["Stand between the two anchored bands, grasp them with an overhand grip, and position the bands at shoulder level.\\", "Brace your core and push the bands overhead, fully extending your arms.\\", "Lower the bands back to shoulder level, keeping your core engaged and arms straight. Repeat for desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Band Upright Row
instructions: ["Stand with one or both feet on one end of a band. Take a double overhand roughly shoulder width grip.\\", "Pull your elbows straight up the ceiling. Aim to get the band to chin level or slightly higher.\\"]

title: Plate Car Driver
instructions: ["Inhale and brace your abdominals\\", "Raise the arms vertically while keeping the elbows slightly bent\\", "Once the arms are parallel with the floor, rotate the plate clockwise and counterclockwise.\\", "Lower the plate back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Front Raise
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and the plate in front of the torso, palms facing the thighs.\\", "Keeping the elbows slightly bent, lift the plate up to the front of the body.\\", "Raise the plate up until the arms are fully extended, maintaining control of the plate.\\", "Lower the plate back to the starting position and repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Plate Halo
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and the plate held in front of your face with both hands, palms facing each other.\\", "Rotate the plate around the head, keeping the arms extended and moving the plate in a circular motion.\\", "Complete one full circle, then reverse the direction to complete another circle.\\"]

title: Plate Overhead Press To Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Brace your core and press the weight plate overhead until your arms are fully extended. Keep your shoulders down and back.\\", "While your arms are fully extended, lower the weight behind your head to perform the extension\\", "After completing the extension, lower the weight to your chest, and perform the overhead press. Repeat\\"]

title: Plate Full Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall holding two plates at your side.\\", "Lateral raise the plates to your side and continue until the plates are pointed at the ceiling.\\", "Let your shoulder joint naturally rotate. At the bottom you should have a neutral or overhand grip. By the time the plates are overhead, your palms should be facing forward.\\"]

title: Plate Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and grip two plates in each hand at your sides.\\", "Keeping your arms straight, raise the plates out to your sides until they are in line with your shoulders.\\", "Lower the plates back to your sides with control. Repeat for desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Plate Reach
instructions: ["Start in a standing position with a plate against your chest.\\", "Press the plate away from your body until your elbows are extended.\\"]

title: TRX I Raise
instructions: ["Stand facing the TRX straps and hold onto the handles with an overhand grip, keeping your arms straight and hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.\\", "Keeping your core engaged, slowly raise your arms forward until they are overhead.\\", "Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.\\"]

title: TRX Pushup
instructions: ["Start by setting up the TRX straps to a secure anchor point and adjust the straps so that they hang about waist height when you stand under them.\\", "Stand facing the TRX straps, grab the handles with both hands, and step forward so that your body is in a plank position with your hands directly beneath your shoulders.\\", "Lower your body down by bending your elbows until your chest nearly touches the handles. Keep your core tight and your body in a straight line.\\", "Push your body back up to the starting position, straightening your arms as you do so. Make sure to engage your chest, triceps, and core throughout the movement.\\"]

title: TRX Y Raise
instructions: ["Hold the TRX straps and lean away from the anchor point until the straps are taut.\\", "Keep both elbows mostly extended and raise both arms out and upwards.\\", "You should make a Y shape with your arms during the back portion of the exercise.\\"]

title: Eagle Arm Pose
instructions: ["Begin seated or standing with your arms at your sides.\\", "Inhale and reach your arms out to the sides at shoulder height.\\", "Cross your right arm over your left arm, bringing your palms to touch if possible.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then release the arms and repeat with the left arm over the right.\\"]

title: Headstand
instructions: ["Begin on your hands and knees with your wrists under your shoulders and your knees under your hips.\\", "Place your forearms on the floor and interlace your fingers.\\", "Place the crown of your head on the floor and tuck your toes under.\\", "Walk your feet towards your head and lift your hips up.\\", "Straighten your legs and find your balance. Hold for several breaths and then release.\\"]

title: Wide Legged Forward Fall
instructions: ["Start standing at the top of your mat with your feet wide apart.\\", "Interlace your fingers behind your back and inhale to expand your chest.\\", "Exhale and fold forward from your hips, bringing your hands up and over your head towards the ground.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then release the hands and come back up to standing.\\"]

title: Puppy Pose
instructions: ["Begin in a tabletop position with your hands and knees on the ground.\\", "Walk your hands forward as you lower your chest towards the ground.\\", "Keep your hips over your knees and extend your arms out in front of you.\\", "Hold for a few breaths and then release.\\"]

title: Reverse Prayer
instructions: ["Start seated or standing with your arms at your sides.\\", "Bring your hands behind your back and interlace your fingers with your palms facing up.\\", "Inhale and draw your shoulder blades together, lifting your chest.\\", "Exhale and gently press your hands down towards the floor as you continue to lift your chest.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Pike Pushup
instructions: ["Place feet on Bosu, hips high, hands on the floor.\\", "Lower the head towards the ground, then push back up.\\", "Keep legs straight and hips elevated throughout.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Arnold Press
instructions: ["Stand tall with your palms facing yourself.\\", "As you press, rotate your arms.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall with a neutral grip.\\", "Raise your arms to the side and keep your elbows mostly extended.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Overhead Press
instructions: ["Hold the handle attachments with your fists to the sky and elbows toward the floor.\\", "Press the handles to the ceiling.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["Grab the two handles and hinge forward.\\", "Keep your elbows mostly extended and raise your arms straight out to the side.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Seated Overhead Press
instructions: ["Sit on a bench with back support. Raise the bar to shoulder height with your palms forward.\\", "Raise the bar upwards and pause at the contracted position.\\", "Lower the weight back to starting position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Upright Row
instructions: ["Take a double overhand roughly shoulder width grip.\\", "Pull your elbows straight up the ceiling. Aim to get the bar to chin level or slightly higher.\\", "lower the bar and repeat.\\"]

title: I's Prone
instructions: ["Lie on your front with your arms extended and above your head.\\", "Point the thumbs up.\\", "Try to raise your arms off the ground keeping them straight.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Upright Row Single
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder width apart holding the kettlebell with both hands in front of your thighs.\\", "Bend forward at the hips bringing the kettlebell to the floor while you slightly bend your knees, keeping your back straight.\\", "Lift the kettlebell upwards towards your chest and lower - repeat.\\"]

title: Barbell Front Raise
instructions: ["Stand tall with an overhand grip on the barbell. Raise your arms until your fists are around eye level.\\", "Return to the start under control. This exercise is prone to using momentum when you begin to fatigue.\\"]

title: Barbell High Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Position the bench between 45 and 60 degrees.\\", "Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With straight arms unrack the bar.\\", "Lower the bar to your mid chest\\", "Raise the bar (slowly and controlled) until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Incline Chest Flys
instructions: ["Lay flat on the bench and place your feet on the ground.\\", "Begin the exercise with the dumbbells held together above your chest, elbows slightly bent.\\", "Simultaneously lower the weights to either side.\\", "Pause when the weights are parallel to the bench, then raise your arms to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the incline bench with your feet on the ground. Raise the dumbbells until you have straight arms.\\", "Lower the dumbbells to your mid chest\\", "Raise the dumbbells until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Dumbbell High Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Position the bench between 45 and 60 degrees.\\", "Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground.\\", "Lower the bar to your mid chest\\", "Raise the dumbbells (slowly and controlled) until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Kettlebell High Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Position the bench between 45 and 60 degrees.\\", "Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground.\\", "Lower the kettlebells to your mid chest\\", "Raise the kettlebells (slowly and controlled) until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Position the bench between 30 and 45 degrees.\\", "Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground.\\", "Lower the kettlebells to your mid chest\\", "Raise the kettlebells (slowly and controlled) until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Cable Chest Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. The cables should be set to shoulder height.\\", "Bring both of the handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "Walk a few steps forward. Then press the weight forward.\\", "From there, you should flex and extend at both the shoulders and elbows simultaneously.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Bench Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. The cable should be set to shoulder height.\\", "Bring the handle to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "From there, you should flex and extend at both the shoulder and elbow simultaneously.\\"]

title: Cable Decline Single Arm Bench Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. The cable should be set above shoulder height.\\", "Bring one handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "From there, you should flex and extend at both the shoulders and elbows simultaneously.\\"]

title: Cable Bench Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. The cables should be set to shoulder height.\\", "Bring both of the handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "From there, you should flex and extend at both the shoulders and elbows simultaneously.\\"]

title: Cable Decline Bench Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. The cables should be set above height.\\", "Bring both of the handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "From there, you should flex and extend at both the shoulders and elbows simultaneously.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Front Raise
instructions: ["Hold the bosu vertically.\\", "Raise the bosu toward the ceiling while keeping your elbows mostly extended.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With straight arms unrack the bar.\\", "Lower the bar to your mid chest\\", "Raise the bar until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Position the bench between 30 and 45 degrees.\\", "Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With straight arms unrack the bar.\\", "Lower the bar to your mid chest\\", "Raise the bar (slowly and controlled) until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Machine Reverse Fly
instructions: ["Sit on machine and press your chest into the pad.\\", "Grab the handles with an overhand grip. Keep your elbows mostly extended.\\", "Bring your arms backwards and squeeze your scapula together.\\"]

title: Machine Overhand Row
instructions: ["Sit on the machine, feet flat, and grab the handles with palms facing down, keeping your back straight.\\", "Pull handles towards your lower abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Keep elbows close to your body.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position, fully extending your arms without locking elbows. Repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Machine Rear Deltoid Row
instructions: ["Place your chest against the pad and grab the handles with an overhand grip.\\", "Pull your elbows straight back and keep your elbows flared throughout the rep.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Kneeling Face Pull
instructions: ["Start with the cables at the top. Use a rope attachment. Fall to a half kneeling position.\\", "Pull the metal piece in the middle of the rope to the bridge of your nose.\\"]

title: Barbell Close Grip Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With a narrow grip on the bar, straighten your arms\\", "Lower the bar to your lower-mid chest\\", "Slowly raise the bar until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Barbell Floor Press
instructions: ["Un-rack the bar and break at the elbows and shoulders.\\", "Bring your elbows to the floor, rest for a second to remove all the momentum from the rep, then press to a lockout.\\"]

title: Barbell Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Take a shoulder width grip. Break at the elbows. Try to keep your elbows tucked in. Don't let them flare out.\\", "Stop the bar a few inches from your forehead and extend your elbows back up.\\"]

title: Barbell Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Be careful getting the bar into place overhead. Push your elbows forward while keeping your elbows tucked in.\\", "Look for what feels like a stretch in your triceps. Extend your elbows until your fists are pointed at the ceiling.\\"]

title: Barbell Spoto Press
instructions: ["Start on the bench with your shoulder blades pulled back.\\", "As you initiate the first rep, tuck your elbows slightly until the bar is a few inches off your chest.\\", "Pause just off your chest for 1-3 seconds. Then press explosively.\\"]

title: Landmine Lying Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Start lying on your back perpendicularly to the barbell, holding the bar directly over your shoulder with the hand that's closer to the bar with your palm facing down towards your feet.\\", "While keeping your shoulder steady, bend your elbow and lower the end of the bar back towards your the ground next to your head. Keep your hinging elbow pointed down towards your feet.\\", "Drive through your palm to extend your elbow and return the bar to the starting position, then repeat for the desired number of reps before switching sides.\\"]

title: Landmine Single Arm Chest Press
instructions: ["Starting lying on your back perpendicularly to the barbell while holding the end of the bar in your hand that is further away from the landmine attachment. Your elbow should be rest on the ground at a 45 to 60 degree angle from your torso, with your wrist stacked over your elbow.\\", "Drive the end of the bar upwards, squeezing your chest at the top of the movement. Lower the bar back down until your elbow gently touches the ground.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps on one side before switching sides.\\"]

title: Barbell Tricep Guillotine Press
instructions: ["Unrack the barbell. Break at the elbows and begin lowering the barbell.\\", "Lower the barbell to your neck before extending your elbows back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Sit on the bench and hold a dumbbell with both hands. Raise the dumbbell overhead at arms length, holding the weight up with the palms of your hands.\\", "Keep your elbows in while you lower the weight behind your head, your upper arms stationary.\\", "Raise the weight back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Lay flat on the floor or a bench with your fists extended to the ceiling and a neutral grip.\\", "Break at the elbows until your fists are by your temples. Then extend your elbows and flex your triceps at the top.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Alternating Single Arm Press
instructions: ["Start in a bench press position with two dumbbells.\\", "Break at one of your elbows first while keeping the other elbow extended.\\", "Your working arm should reach your side before pressing back to the ceiling.\\", "Then alternate to the other arm.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: ["Start by lying flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand.\\", "Hold the dumbbells at chest level with your palms facing forward.\\", "Engage your core and press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Alternating Single Arm Press
instructions: ["Lay on a decline bench with both arms extended in front of you.\\", "Break at one of your arms first bringing that arm to your side while keeping the other arm extended.\\", "Press the dumbbell back to the ceiling. Fully extend that arm before initiating on the other side.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay on a decline bench with both arms extended in front of you.\\", "Break at the elbows and bring your upper arms to your side.\\", "Once your upper arms have reached your side, press the dumbbells back to the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Guillotine Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on the decline bench, grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells to your chest, keeping your elbows flared out. As you lower the dumbbells, exhale deeply.\\", "Once your elbows reach your chest, pause for a moment and then press them back up to the starting position\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Single Arm Bench Press
instructions: ["Start by laying on a decline bench with two dumbbells.\\", "Position the dumbbell above your chest with your elbow bent and shoulder level.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbell towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and your core engaged while the other dumbbell remains pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Once the dumbbell reaches your side, pause for a moment and then press the weight back up to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of repetitions before switching to your other arm.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Start by lying on a decline bench with a dumbbell in each hand.\\", "Hold the dumbbells above your chest with your arms extended and your palms facing each other. This is the starting position.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells towards your forehead by bending your elbows. Keep your upper arms stationary and only move your forearms.\\", "Once the dumbbells are close to your forehead, reverse the motion by extending your elbows and returning to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Squeeze Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on a decline bench with two dumbbells pressed to one another.\\", "Break at the elbows and keep your elbows tucked as you bring the dumbbells to your chest.\\", "Continue to press the dumbbells into one another throughout the rep.\\", "Once the dumbbells reach your chest, press back toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Guillotine Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on the flat bench, grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells to your chest, keeping your elbows flared out. As you lower the dumbbells, exhale deeply.\\", "Once your elbows reach your chest, pause for a moment and then press them back up to the starting position\\"]

title: Dumbbell Guillotine Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on the incline bench, grasp a pair of dumbbells and hold them at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbells to your chest, keeping your elbows flared out. As you lower the dumbbells, exhale deeply.\\", "Once your elbows reach your chest, pause for a moment and then press them back up to the starting position\\"]

title: Dumbbell Rolling Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Lay flat on a bench with two dumbbells pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Break at the elbows until your forearms touch your biceps, then flex at the shoulder joint bringing your upper arms to the sides of your head.\\", "Bring your elbows back up until they are pointed at the ceiling, then extend your elbows.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Squeeze Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on a bench with two dumbbells pressed to one another.\\", "Break at the elbows and keep your elbows tucked as you bring the dumbbells to your chest.\\", "Continue to press the dumbbells into one another throughout the rep.\\", "Once the dumbbells reach your chest, press back toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Press
instructions: ["Start by laying on a bench with two dumbbells.\\", "Position the dumbbell above your chest with your elbow bent and shoulder level.\\", "Slowly lower the dumbbell towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and your core engaged while the other dumbbell remains pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Once the dumbbell reaches your side, pause for a moment and then press the weight back up to the starting position.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of repetitions before switching to your other arm.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell overhead.\\", "Flex at the elbows until the dumbbell is behind your head.\\", "Then extend your elbows until the dumbbell is back in the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Tricep Kickback
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell in one hand.\\", "Bend at the waist and place your opposite hand on your knee for support.\\", "From this starting position, extend your arm backwards so that the dumbbell is behind your body.\\", "Make sure to keep your elbow close to your body and your core engaged throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Elevated Pushup
instructions: ["Start by placing two dumbbells on the floor, about shoulder-width apart.\\", "Position yourself in a plank position with your hands on top of the dumbbells, keeping your arms straight.\\", "Keep your feet together, with your toes resting on the floor.\\", "Engage your core and lower your body towards the floor by bending your arms, until your chest nearly touches the dumbbells.\\", "Push your body back up to the starting position, straightening your arms and engaging your chest, triceps and shoulders.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Single Arm Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Stand tall with a single dumbbell extended overhead.\\", "Flex at the elbow letting the dumbbell travel behind your body.\\", "Try not to let your elbow flare outward.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Tate Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on a bench with two dumbbells extended toward the ceiling.\\", "Maintain an overhand grip. Flex at the elbows.\\", "The dumbbells will land on your upper chest/clavicle.\\", "Extend your elbows bringing the dumbbells back into their starting position.\\", "*Named after Dave Tate*\\"]

title: Dumbbell Incline Skullover
instructions: ["Lay flat on an incline bench with two dumbbells pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Break at the elbows until your forearms touch your biceps, then flex at the shoulder joint bringing your upper arms to the sides of your head.\\", "Bring your elbows back up until they are pointed at the ceiling, then extend your elbows.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Floor Press
instructions: ["Bring your elbows to the floor, rest for a second to remove all the momentum from the rep, then press to a lockout.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Weighted Dip
instructions: ["Use a dip belt to attach a dumbbell to yourself. Grip bars with arms straight, shoulders above hands. Keep legs straight or bent.\\", "Lower slowly until elbows are at 90 degrees.\\", "Push back up to start position, extending arms fully.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Tricep Guillotine Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on a bench.\\", "Push your elbows forward until your biceps touch your forearms. Then extend your elbows until back at the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Bench Braced Single Arm Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Lay sideways on an incline bench and press the elbow of the working arm into the bench.\\", "Use your free arm to pull your upper body into the bench.\\", "Break at the elbow until your elbow is fully flexed, then extend your elbow until the dumbbell is pointed at the ceiling.\\"]

title: Box Dips
instructions: ["Hold your body with arms locked above the equipment\\", "Lower your body slowly while leaning forward, flare out your elbows\\", "Raise your body above the bars until your arms are locked.\\"]

title: Bench Dips
instructions: ["Grip the edge of the bench with your hands, Keep your feet together and legs straight.\\", "Lower your body straight down.\\", "Slowly press back up to the starting point.\\", "TIP: Make this harder by raising your feet off the floor and adding weight.\\"]

title: Incline Push Up
instructions: ["Stand facing bench or sturdy elevated platform.\\", "Place hands on edge of bench or platform, slightly wider than shoulder width.\\", "Slowly lower your body until your chest almost touches the bench.\\", "Push body up until arms are extended.\\"]

title: Decline Push Up
instructions: ["Use a bench to elevate your feet.\\", "Put your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.\\", "Slowly lower your body until your chest almost touches the ground\\", "Raise your body until you almost lock your elbows.\\"]

title: Diamond Push Ups
instructions: ["Position your index fingers and thumbs so they are touching, forming a diamond shape\\", "Use a standard push up position\\", "Lower your chest towards your hands, keep your elbows close to your body\\", "Stop just before your chest touches the floor, then push back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Clapping Push Up
instructions: ["Start in a push-up position.\\", "Lower your chest, explode up, clap hands.\\", "Land softly, repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Diamond Knee Push Ups
instructions: ["Begin in a push-up position with your hands forming a diamond shape under your chest.\\", "Lower your body, keeping elbows close.\\", "Push back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Elevated Push Up
instructions: ["Start by placing two plates or low boxes on the floor, about shoulder-width apart.\\", "Position yourself in a plank position with your hands on top of the boxes/plates, keeping your arms straight.\\", "Keep your feet together, with your toes resting on the floor.\\", "Engage your core and lower your body towards the floor by bending your arms, until your chest nearly touches the dumbbells.\\", "Push your body back up to the starting position, straightening your arms and engaging your chest, triceps and shoulders.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Explosive Push Up
instructions: ["Start in a push-up position.\\", "Lower your chest, explode up.\\", "Land softly, repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Incline Knee Push Up
instructions: ["Start by placing two boxes (or one) on the floor, about shoulder-width apart.\\", "Position yourself in a plank position with your hands on top of the box, keeping your arms straight.\\", "Put your knees on the floor.\\", "Engage your core and lower your body towards the floor by bending your arms, until your chest nearly touches the box.\\", "Push your body back up to the starting position, straightening your arms and engaging your chest, triceps and shoulders.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Knee Push Ups
instructions: ["Begin in a push-up position on your knees. Break at the elbow and shoulder joint.\\", "Lower your body, keeping elbows close.\\", "Push back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Knee Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Begin in kneeling position. Hands shoulder width apart. Break at the elbows while letting your elbows fall to the floor.\\", "Extend your elbows until you are back in the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Begin in a plank position. Hands shoulder width apart. Break at the elbows while letting your elbows fall to the floor.\\", "Extend your elbows until you are back in the starting position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Box Assisted Dips
instructions: ["Grip the edge of the boxes with your hands, Keep your feet together and legs straight.\\", "Lower your body straight down.\\", "Slowly press back up to the starting point.\\", "TIP: Make this harder by raising your feet off the floor and adding weight.\\"]

title: Parallel Bar Dips
instructions: ["Grip bars with arms straight, shoulders above hands. Keep legs straight or bent.\\", "Lower slowly until elbows are at 90 degrees.\\", "Push back up to start position, extending arms fully.\\"]

title: Ring Standing Archer Pushup
instructions: ["Position rings shoulder-width apart, grasp handles, extend legs behind.\\", "Lower chest to rings, bend one elbow, while extending your other arm out to the side. Push yourself back to the start.\\", "Then switch arms and repeat.\\"]

title: Ring Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Attach the ring straps to a high point. Stand on your tip toes.\\", "Your arms should be extended in front of you.\\", "Break at the elbows until your forearms touch your biceps. Then extend your elbows back to the start.\\"]

title: Machine Cable V Bar Push Downs
instructions: ["Grip the pulley bar with palms facing down at shoulder width.\\", "Stand straight with a small forward incline. Keep your upper arms close to your body, and slowly bring the pulley bar down until your arms are fully extended.\\", "Pause when you are at the contracted position of the motion, then slowly raise the pulley bar back to the starting point.\\"]

title: Neutral Chest Press
instructions: ["Sit on the machine and grab the handles with a neutral grip.\\", "Adjust the machine to get the longest range of motion possible.\\", "Press until your elbows are not extended but not hyperextended.\\"]

title: Machine Assisted Parallel Bar Dips
instructions: ["Grip bars with arms straight, shoulders above hands. Place knees on pad.\\", "Lower slowly until elbows are at 90 degrees.\\", "Push back up to start position, extending arms fully.\\"]

title: Machine Chest Press
instructions: ["Sit on the machine and grab the handles with an overhand grip.\\", "Adjust the machine to get the longest range of motion possible.\\", "Press until your elbows are not extended but not hyperextended.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Incline Chest Press
instructions: ["Adjust the seat pad to match your height.\\", "Press the weight forward until your elbows are nearly extended. Return to the starting position with out letting the weight rest at the bottom until finishing your set.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Decline Chest Press
instructions: ["Adjust the seat pad to match your height.\\", "Press the weight forward until your elbows are nearly extended. Return to the starting position with out letting the weight rest at the bottom until finishing your set.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Low Incline Bench Press
