instructions: ["Adjust the seat pad to match your height.\\", "Press the weight forward until your elbows are nearly extended. Return to the starting position with out letting the weight rest at the bottom until finishing your set.\\"]

title: Machine Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Adjust the pad to suit your height.\\", "Grab the v bar (or other attachment) and extend your elbows until they are almost fully extended.\\", "Flex your elbows and look to feel a stretch at the bottom of each rep.\\"]

title: Machine Tricep Pushdown
instructions: ["Sit on the machine and place the back of your upper arm on the bench.\\", "Extend your elbows until you feel a contraction in your triceps.\\", "Bring the weight back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Dips
instructions: ["Sit on the machine and grab the handles.\\", "Press the handles down until your elbows are nearly extended.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Chest Press Partner Toss
instructions: ["Stand tall, partner tosses medicine ball to chest.\\", "Catch ball and press it back to partner. Repeat.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Pushup
instructions: ["Place hands on medicine ball, in push-up position.\\", "Perform push-up, maintaining proper form.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Walkover Pushup
instructions: ["Place one hand on medicine ball, other on ground.\\", "Perform push-up, walking hands to switch positions.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Skull Crusher
instructions: ["Lie on your back with knees in the air and soles of your feet flat on the floor.\\", "Hold the kettlebell in both hands directly above your chest.\\", "Keeping your upper arms in place, bend your elbows to slowly bring the kettlebell in front of your forehead.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Chest Press (Single)
instructions: ["Laying on the floor with your knees bent and feet firmly on the floor, hold the kettlebell at your chest with both hands.\\", "Fully extend your arms, raising the kettlebell until your elbows are locked.\\", "Lower the kettlebell to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Press
instructions: ["Laying on the floor with your knees bent and feet firmly on the floor, leave one arm resting to the side of the body.\\", "Using the other arm, hold the kettlebell at arms length directly upwards of your shoulder.\\", "Lower your arm until your upper arm to elbow is resting on the floor.\\", "Return to starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Walkover Pushup
instructions: ["Starting in a press up position with feet wide and one hand resting on the kettlebell, complete a full press up, lowering your chest towards the ground while keeping your body straight and returning to the starting position.\\", "Swap hands on the kettlebell, placing the hand originally on the kettlebell underneath your shoulder, complete another press up.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Standing Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Stand with legs shoulder width apart.\\", "Hold the kettlebell in both hands behind your head.\\", "Straighten arms bringing kettlebell above your head.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Decline Skull Crusher
instructions: ["Lie on the floor with your upper back and soles of feet on the floor, knees bent, and pelvis and lower back suspended in the air.\\", "Hold the kettlebell in both hands directly above your chest.\\", "Keeping your upper arms in place, bend your elbows to bring the kettlebell to the floor above your head.\\", "Return the kettlebell to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Tate Press
instructions: ["Lie flat on your back. Keeping your arm straight, hold the kettlebell above your chest with your palm facing away from your body.\\", "Bend your arm, touching the kettlebell to the top of the shoulder opposite to the arm being worked.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on a bench, hold kettlebells above chest.\\", "Lower them to chest, then push up.\\", "Repeat for desired reps, maintaining form.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Guillotine Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on bench, hold kettlebell with both hands over chest.\\", "Lower kettlebells, elbows flared.\\", "Press kettlebells upward, fully extending arms. Repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Floor Press
instructions: ["Start flat on your back with the kettlebells extended over you.\\", "Bring your elbows to the floor, rest for a second to remove all the momentum from the rep, then press to a lockout.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Floor Press
instructions: ["Start flat on your back with a kettlebell extended over you.\\", "Bring your elbow to the floor, rest for a second to remove all the momentum from the rep, then press to a lockout.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Be careful getting the KB into place overhead. Push your elbows forward while keeping your elbows tucked in.\\", "Look for what feels like a stretch in your triceps. Extend your elbows until your fists are pointed at the ceiling.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Incline Guillotine Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on bench, hold kettlebell with both hands over chest.\\", "Lower kettlebells, elbows flared.\\", "Press kettlebells upward, fully extending arms. Repeat.\\"]

title: Triceps Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Bend your left arm so your hand is at your shoulder, and hold your elbow with the opposite hand.\\", "Gently push on your elbow so it is raised by your head.\\", "Hold the stretch for a few seconds then repeat with the other arm.\\"]

title: Triceps Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Hold a band so it is in line with your spine. Hold the top with your right hand and the bottom with your left.\\", "Keeping the top still, pull down on the band.\\", "Hold the stretch for a few seconds then repeat with the other arm.\\"]

title: Triceps Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Raise your left arm above your head, and bend at the elbow so your hand is resting at the top of your back.\\", "Use the opposite hand to gently apply pressure to the elbow.\\", "Hold the stretch for a few seconds then repeat with the other arm.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Pushdown
instructions: ["The cable should be set all the way at the top of the machine.\\", "Make sure to keep your upper arm glued at your side. Extend your elbows until you feel your triceps contract.\\"]

title: Cable Cross Pushdown
instructions: ["Either use two handles or no attachment at all. Both sides of the cable crossover should be set to the top.\\", "Stand in the center of the machine holding each Cable in the opposing hand. Your upper arm should be at a 45 degree angle with your torso.\\", "Extend your elbows until you feel a contraction and then return to the starting position\\"]

title: Cable Rope Skullcrusher
instructions: ["You can use a straight bar, rope, easy bar, or two handles. The cable should be set all the way to the top of the machine.\\", "Face away from the machine with your elbows up and the attachment just behind your head.\\", "Extend at the elbows until you feel a contraction in your triceps and then flex at the elbow back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Rope Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["You can use any attachment. The cable should be all the way to the bottom of the machine. Face away from the machine.\\", "Point your elbows straight up toward the ceiling.\\", "From there, extend your elbows until your fists are pointed straight toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Cable Tricep Kickback
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. The cable should be set to hip height.\\", "Hinge forward. Make sure to keep your upper arm glued at your side. Extend your elbows until you feel your triceps contract.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. The cable should be set fairly low.\\", "Bring the handle across your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "From there, you should flex and extend at both the shoulder and elbow simultaneously.\\"]

title: Cable Bar Reverse Grip Pushdown
instructions: ["Use the bar attachment. The cable should be set all the way at the top of the machine. Grab the bar with n overhand grip.\\", "Make sure to keep your upper arm glued at your side. Extend your elbows until you feel your triceps contract.\\"]

title: Cable Bar Pushdown
instructions: ["Use the bar attachment. The cable should be set all the way at the top of the machine.\\", "Make sure to keep your upper arm glued at your side. Extend your elbows until you feel your triceps contract.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Stand facing away from the cable, which is at the top of the cable stack.\\", "Keep your elbow pointed forward, and extend and flex your elbow.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Rope Pushdown
instructions: ["Use the rope attachment. The cable should be set all the way at the top of the machine.\\", "Make sure to keep your upper arm glued at your side. Extend your elbows until you feel your triceps contract.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Cross Pushdown
instructions: ["Either use a handle or no attachment at all. The cable crossover should be set to the top.\\", "Stand in the center of the machine holding the cable in the opposing hand. Your upper arm should be at a 45 degree angle with your torso.\\", "Extend your elbow until you feel a contraction and then return to the starting position\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. The cable should be set to your mid-back. Face away from the machine.\\", "Point your elbows straight up toward the ceiling.\\", "From there, extend your elbows until your fists are pointed straight toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Cable Overhead Tricep Press
instructions: ["You can use any attachment. The cable should be even with your mid-back. Face away from the machine.\\", "Point your elbows straight forward. Press the weight straight toward the ceiling.\\", "As you return to the start, push your elbows forward. Try to touch your biceps to your forearms at the bottom of each rep.\\"]

title: Band Single Arm Chest Press
instructions: ["Attach the band to an anchor point that is about shoulder height. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Extend your shoulder joint and elbow across your body until your arm is fully extended.\\"]

title: Band Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Stand with one or both feet on band. Go up and over your head with the band to the starting position.\\", "Flex and extend your elbows.\\"]

title: Band Pushdown
instructions: ["Place the band just above eye level. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Push your hips back slightly. Extend and flex at the elbows.\\"]

title: Band Pushup
instructions: ["Loop the band around your mid-back. The ends of the bands should be around your hands between your thumb and pointer finger.\\", "This exercise can be done from the knees or the toes depending on experience level.\\", "Begin by breaking at the elbows until your upper arm is by your side. Then extend at the elbows back into the top position.\\"]

title: Band Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Anchor a band to a stable point.\\", "Face away and begin with your elbows bent and fists by your temples.\\", "Extend your elbows until your triceps contract.\\"]

title: Band Chest Press
instructions: ["Stand in the middle of the two bands with feet shoulder-width apart. Step forward with one foot to create tension in the bands.\\", "Hold one band in each hand, palms facing forward.\\r\\ \\r\\ Start the exercise with your arms extended in front of you, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.\\", "Lower your arms to the sides of your chest, maintaining control of the band.\\", "Push your arms back up to the starting position, keeping your core engaged and maintaining control of the band.\\"]

title: Band Rapunzel Pushdown
instructions: ["Anchor the band to a high point and face away. Hold the band with both hands, placing your hands shoulder-width apart and keeping your elbows close to your body.\\", "Slowly extend your arms downward, keeping your elbows close to your body. Push the band down as far as you can, feeling the contraction in your triceps.\\"]

title: Band Single Arm Pushdown
instructions: ["Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with your right hand, with your arm at your side.\\", "Flex and extend your elbow.\\"]

title: Single Arm Rapunzel Pushdown
instructions: ["Stand with a band anchored to a high point. Face away from the band. Hold the loop in one hand.\\", "Keep your elbow tucked in to your side. Extend your elbow. When you extend, don't let your upper arm raise. The band should land over your shoulder.\\"]

title: Band Single Arm Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Stand facing away from a band which is anchored to a high point.\\", "Keep your elbow pointed forward, and extend and flex your elbow.\\"]

title: Band Standing Chest Press
instructions: ["Loop the band around your back. The two end loops in each of your hands.\\", "Extend your shoulder joint and elbow across your body until your arm is fully extended.\\"]

title: Band Tricep Kickback
instructions: ["Anchor the band to a stable point.\\", "Hinge forward. Extend and flex at the elbow.\\"]

title: Plate Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: ["Stand or sit with a weight plate in your hands, arms extended straight above your head\\", "Lower the weight plate behind your head by bending at the elbows.\\", "Keep your elbows close to your head and shoulders relaxed.\\", "Push the weight plate back up to starting position, extending your arms fully.\\"]

title: Plate Deficit Pushup
instructions: ["Start in a pushup position with both hands on a plate. This will extend your range of motion.\\", "Break at the elbows and shoulders until your upper arm travels behind the body slightly.\\", "Then press back into the original position.\\"]

title: Weighted Diamond Push Ups
instructions: ["Place a plate on your back. Position your index fingers and thumbs so they are touching, forming a diamond shape.\\", "Use a standard push up position\\", "Lower your chest towards your hands, keep your elbows close to your body\\", "Stop just before your chest touches the floor, then push back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Weighted Knee Push Ups
instructions: ["Begin in a push-up position on your knees. Break at the elbow and shoulder joint.\\", "Lower your body, keeping elbows close.\\", "Push back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Weighted Dip
instructions: ["Use a dip belt to attach a plate to yourself. Grip bars with arms straight, shoulders above hands. Keep legs straight or bent.\\", "Lower slowly until elbows are at 90 degrees.\\", "Push back up to start position, extending arms fully.\\"]

title: TRX Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Hold the two TRX straps and lean forward. The straps should be over each shoulder.\\", "Keep your elbows tucked in and then flex and extend at the elbows.\\"]

title: Child Pose Elbows On Block
instructions: ["Place two blocks on the floor, shoulder-width apart.\\", "Kneel in front of the blocks, and lower your torso down so that your elbows are resting on the blocks, and your forehead is resting on the floor.\\", "Relax your arms, shoulders, and neck, and breathe deeply.\\", "Hold for a few breaths, then release.\\"]

title: One Arm Cow Face Pose
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.\\", "Bend your left knee and place your left foot on the floor, close to your right hip.\\", "Cross your right leg over your left leg, stacking your knees on top of each other.\\", "Bring your left arm up overhead, and bend your elbow so that your left hand reaches towards your upper back. Reach your right hand behind your back and try to clasp your left hand. Hold\\"]

title: Pyramid Prayer
instructions: ["Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place your hands on a table, chair, or any elevated surface in front of you.\\", "Walk your feet back until your torso is parallel to the ground, and your elbows are resting on the surface.\\", "Relax your head and neck, and breathe deeply.\\", "Hold for a few breaths, then release.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Offset Pushup
instructions: ["Place one hand on Bosu, other on the floor.\\", "Lower chest to the ground, keeping the body straight.\\", "Push back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Pushup
instructions: ["Place hands on Bosu, shoulder-width apart.\\", "Lower chest to the ground, keeping the body straight.\\", "Push back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Push Up
instructions: ["Use the belt attachment. Take a pushup position.\\", "Have your elbows at a 45 degree angle. Break at the elbows until your upper arm gets to your side.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Take a shoulder width grip. Break at the elbows. Try to keep your elbows tucked in. Don't let them flare out.\\", "Stop the bar a few inches from your forehead and extend your elbows back up.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Guillotine Bench Press
instructions: ["Lie on the flat bench, grasp the bar at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.\\", "Slowly lower the bar to your chest, keeping your elbows flared out.\\", "Once you feel a stretch in your chest press the weight back up.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Close Grip Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With a narrow grip on the bar, straighten your arms\\", "Lower the bar to your lower-mid chest\\", "Slowly raise the bar until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Bodyweight Skullcrusher
instructions: ["Hold the smith bar and lean forward.\\", "Keep your elbows tucked in and then flex and extend at the elbows.\\"]

title: Elbow Extensor Mobilisation Kneeling Lacrosse Ball
instructions: ["Kneel in front of a bench and place a massage ball on it.\\", "Place your tricep (back of the arm) on the ball with the elbow bent. Try to find a tight, painful spot.\\", "Once you have found it, apply gentle pressure on the ball.\\", "Once you get comfortable with the pain extend and bend your arm.\\"]

title: Elbow Extensor Isometric Seated Overhead Dumbbell
instructions: ["Sit on a box or bench without any back support.\\", "Raise the weight over your head and extend your elbow.\\", "From there, bend the elbow 1/4 of the way.\\", "Hold isometrically for the prescribed amount of time.\\"]

title: Barbell Shrug
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet about hip-width apart, with a barbell in front of you.\\", "Bend down and grab the barbell with an overhand grip, your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Keep your back straight and your shoulders down as you grip the bar.\\", "Stand up straight, lifting the barbell off the ground and pulling it toward your hips. Keep your elbows close to your body and your shoulders down as you do this.\\", "Once the barbell is at your hips, raise your shoulders as high as you can, holding the position for a moment.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Seated Shrug
instructions: ["Sit on a bench with dumbbells in both hands, palms facing your body, back straight.\\", "Elevate your shoulders and hold the contracted position at the apex of the motion.\\", "Slowly lower your shoulders back to starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Shrug
instructions: ["Stand tall with two dumbbells. Pull your shoulder blades up. Give a one second squeeze at the top.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Laying 30 Degree Shrug
instructions: ["Lay sideways on a bench letting your arm hang freely.\\", "Pull your shoulder blade and joint toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Elevated Pike Shoulder Shrug
instructions: ["Use a bench or an object like a chair to elevate your feet.\\", "Slowly lower your body (scapula) while keeping your elbows locked (this is key)\\", "Slowly raise your body back to the start position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Pike Shrug
instructions: ["Start in a plank position and raise your hips toward the ceiling.\\", "Slowly lower your body (scapula) while keeping your elbows locked (this is key)\\", "Slowly raise your body back to the start position.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Standing Shrugs
instructions: ["Place the bar on a lower rung so that when gripped your arms are fully extended and your back is straight.\\", "Grip at shoulder width, raise the bar with your shoulders and pause at the contracted position.\\", "Slowly lower the bar back to starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Seated Shrug
instructions: ["Have a seat on the machine, and grab each handle.\\", "Pull your shoulder blades straight up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Machine Standing Shrug
instructions: ["Grab both handles and stand upright. Make sure you keep a flat back while lifting to the starting position.\\", "Pull your shoulder blades straight up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Shrug (Single)
instructions: ["Standing up straight with feet shoulder width apart.\\", "Holding the kettlebell in both hands in front of your pelvis, engage your shoulder blades, as if you are trying to touch them together.\\", "Release the shrug and repeat\\"]

title: Kettlebell Shrug
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, hold one kettlebell in each hand at your sides.\\", "Lift your shoulders upward while keeping arms straight.\\", "Lower shoulders back down, repeat for desired reps.\\"]

title: Traps Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Stand upright with your feet shoulder width apart.\\", "Nod your head forward, bringing your chin to your chest.\\", "You will feel the stretch across your neck.\\"]

title: Traps Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Stand upright with your feet shoulder width apart.\\", "Keeping your chest facing forward, turn your head 90 degrees to the left. Then return to centre point.\\", "Repeat, turning your head in the other direction.\\"]

title: Traps Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Stand upright with your feet shoulder width apart.\\", "Place your left hand on your head and gently pull your head down towards your left shoulder. Then return to centre point.\\", "Repeat, using your right hand pulling towards your right shoulder.\\"]

title: Cable 30 Degree Shrug
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment on both sides of crossover. With cable attachment set all the way to the bottom.\\", "Grab both handles and make sure you are centered in the machine. Let your arms hang freely.\\", "Pull your shoulder blades up and in towards your ears. Let your shoulder blades depress back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm 30 Degree Shrug
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. With the cable attachment set all the way to the bottom.\\", "Grab one handle and make sure you are centered in the machine. Let your arm hang freely.\\", "Pull your shoulder blade up and in towards your ears. Let your shoulder blade depress back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Band Shrug
instructions: ["Place the band under your feet. Stand upright.\\", "Elevate your shoulder blades and then depress back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Plate Overhead Shrug
instructions: ["Stand tall with a weight plate overhead.\\", "Elevated and depress your scapula.\\", "Avoid leaning forward or backwards to keep pressure off of your lumbar spine.\\"]

title: Criss Cross Bow Tie Pose
instructions: ["Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your arms at your sides.\\", "Cross your right arm over your left arm, bringing your palms together in front of your chest.\\", "Lower your arms down so that your palms face down towards the ground, and your right elbow is resting on top of your left elbow.\\", "Hold for a few breaths, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Eagle Arms Chin Into Chest
instructions: ["Sit cross-legged on the floor and bring your arms out to the sides at shoulder height.\\", "Cross your right arm over your left, bending both elbows so that your forearms are parallel to the floor.\\", "Lift your elbows towards the ceiling and bring your hands together, then drop your chin towards your chest.\\", "Hold for a few breaths, then release your arms and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Easy Pose Neck Stretch
instructions: ["Begin by sitting cross-legged on the floor.\\", "Slowly drop your chin towards your chest, feeling a stretch in the back of your neck.\\", "Inhale and lift your head up, then exhale and drop your right ear towards your right shoulder.\\", "Hold for a few breaths, then switch sides and repeat the stretch.\\"]

title: Half Neck Rolls
instructions: ["Sit cross-legged on the floor and interlace your fingers behind your head.\\", "Drop your chin to your chest and roll your head to the right, bringing your right ear towards your right shoulder.\\", "Slowly roll your head back to center, then over to the left so that your left ear is close to your left shoulder.\\", "Repeat the movement from side to side, keeping your shoulders relaxed and breathing deeply.\\"]

title: Thread The Needle Hip Over Knees
instructions: ["Start on your hands and knees in a tabletop position.\\", "Slide your right knee up between your hands and place your right foot close to your left wrist.\\", "Take your left leg back and lower it down to the ground, keeping your toes tucked.\\", "Twist your torso to the right and reach your right arm underneath your left arm, threading the needle. Hold for a few breaths, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Pike Shrug
instructions: ["Place toes on Bosu, hands on the floor.\\", "Pike hips up, shrug shoulders, engage core.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Shrug
instructions: ["Stand tall and hold the two handle attachments.\\", "Pull your shoulder blades straight up toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Seated Upper Trap And Suprispinatus Stretch
instructions: ["Sit on the back of your palm.\\", "Straighten the back and pull the shoulders back.\\", "Lean your head to the opposite side.\\"]

title: Thoracic Flexion And Extensions
instructions: ["Bring yourself on all 4's. Push the ground away from you, rounding back and shoulders as much as possible.\\", "To enhance the spine flexion suck the belly button in and tuck the tailbone (coccyx) under. Hold this position for a brief moment\\", "Now do the exact opposite, try to bend the spine backwards. Go back and forth on these positions\\"]

title: Shoulder Flexion Thoracic Extensions
instructions: ["Place a tube roller or half tube on the ground parallel to your body.\\", "Lie on the tube making sure your whole back and neck are supported.\\", "Knees bent and on the ground, lower back flat on the tube and chin tucked in.\\", "Bring your arms by you hips and pull shoulders back.\\", "This is your starting position. Raise arms and drop them back towards the ground over your head\\"]

title: Thoracic Extensions Foam Roller
instructions: ["Place a foam roller on the floor perpendicular to your body.\\", "Sit and lie back onto it aiming for your mid back to be in contact with the roller.\\", "Gently tilt your hips backward, squeeze glutes and engage core to protect the lower back.\\", "Support head on palms, elbows rotated in. Slightly lift hips off the ground.\\"]

title: Scapular Elevation
instructions: ["From the standing or seated position straighten your back.\\", "Pull the shoulders back but keep them relaxed.\\", "Move shoulders towards from your ears and return to the starting, relaxed position.\\"]

title: Scapular Depression
instructions: ["From the standing or seated position straighten your back.\\", "Pull the shoulders back but keep them relaxed.\\", "Move shoulders away from your ears and return to the starting, relaxed position.\\"]

title: Barbell Landmine Sissy Squat
instructions: ["Hold the bar in a goblet position.\\", "Stand tall, push your knees forward until your calves touch your hamstrings.\\", "Make sure to keep your hips extended.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Leg Extension
instructions: ["Place a dumbbell between your feet. Lean back slightly and hold on to the bench.\\", "Extend your knees until you feel your quads contract hard.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Reverse Step Up
instructions: ["Start with a box or bench behind you and one of your feet on the box/bench.\\", "The balls of your feet should be planted on the box/bench.\\", "Drive through the ball of your foot extending your knees until you're upright and standing on the box.\\"]

title: Wall Sit
instructions: ["Press your back against a wall, feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Lower into a squat position, thighs parallel to the floor, knees above ankles.\\", "Hold the position, maintaining tension in your core and legs.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Sissy Squat
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart, stability ball behind your back against a wall.\\", "Lean back onto the ball, bend knees forward, lowering slowly while keeping hips extended.\\", "Push through toes, straighten legs, and return to standing while maintaining balance and control.\\"]

title: Machine Leg Extension
instructions: ["Sit on the machine with your back against the cushion and adjust the machine you are using so that your knees are at a 90 degree angle at the starting position.\\", "Raise the weight by extending your knees outward, then lower your leg to the starting position. Both movements should be done in a slow, controlled motion.\\"]

title: Machine Sissy Squat
instructions: ["Place the sissy squat pad just behind the knees and the front pad all the way up against your ankles.\\", "Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Sit straight back into a squat. Then push your calves into the back of the pad and extend your knees back to the original position.\\"]

title: Machine Goblet Sissy Squat
instructions: ["Place the sissy squat pad just behind the knees and the front pad all the way up against your ankles.\\", "Hold a dumbbell in a goblet position.\\", "Sit straight back into a squat. Then push your calves into the back of the pad and extend your knees back to the original position.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Leg Extension
instructions: ["Sit on the machine with your back against the cushion and adjust the machine you are using so that your knees are at a 90 degree angle at the starting position.\\", "Raise the weight by extending your knees outward, then lower your leg to the starting position. Both movements should be done in a slow, controlled motion.\\"]

title: Quads Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Lay flat on your belly. Extend one arm out in front of you, placing your palm on the floor. With your other arm, grab the top of your foot.\\", "Keeping your upper leg flat on the floor, pull your foot towards your buttocks to engage the stretch.\\", "Pause for a few seconds, and then repeat the stretch with your other leg.\\"]

title: Quads Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Lay flat on your belly, with both hands reach back and grab the tops of your feet.\\", "Keeping your upper legs flat on the ground, pull both of your feet towards your buttocks.\\", "Pause at the apex of the stretch, then return to starting position.\\"]

title: Quads Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Place one foot flat on the ground in front of you at a 90 degree angle. With your other leg, balance upon your knee, placing the tip of your foot against the wall behind you for balance.\\", "Place your hands on your knee in front of you, and lean forward so that your knee extends over your foot.\\", "Pause at the apex of the stretch, and slowly return to starting position. Repeat with your other leg.\\"]

title: Quads Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Stand perpendicular to a wall, using one arm against the wall for balance. With your other arm, grab the top of your foot.\\", "Pull your leg upwards and back to engage your quads, pausing at the apex of the stretch for a few seconds.\\", "Return to starting position and repeat with your other leg.\\"]

title: Cable Standing Leg Extension
instructions: ["Stand upright facing away from the cable crossover with the cable set to the height of your hips. Use an ankle/wrist attachment.\\", "Extend at the knee against the cable.\\"]

title: Cable Seated Leg Extension
instructions: ["Use an ankle/wrist attachment. Pull the cable under the bench and attach it at your ankle.\\", "Extend at the knee against the cable.\\"]

title: Band Leg Extension
instructions: ["Anchor a band to something stable and set up a bench.\\", "Run through the band underneath the bench and loop around your feet.\\", "Flex and extend your knees.\\"]

title: Weighted Wall Sit
instructions: ["Press your back against a wall, feet shoulder-width apart, holding weights at your sides.\\", "Lower into a squat position, thighs parallel to the floor, knees above ankles.\\", "Hold the position, maintaining tension in your core and legs.\\"]

title: Chair Pose
instructions: ["Stand straight with your feet hip-width apart and arms at your sides.\\", "Inhale and raise your arms straight up over your head.\\", "Exhale and bend your knees, lowering your hips as if you were sitting in a chair.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, then inhale and stand up straight.\\"]

title: Crescent Moon Pose
instructions: ["Begin in Runner's Lunge pose with your right foot forward.\\", "Slowly lift your torso up and bring your arms overhead, palms facing each other.\\", "Make sure your right knee is directly above your ankle, and your left leg is straight behind you.\\", "Hold for a few breaths before repeating on the other side.\\"]

title: Crescent Moon Pose Quad Stretch
instructions: ["Begin in Crescent Moon Pose with your right foot forward and a block nearby.\\", "Place the block at the highest height under your left hand.\\", "Reach your left arm behind you and take hold of your left foot or ankle.\\", "Gently pull your foot towards your buttocks while pressing your left hand into the block to deepen the stretch in your left quad. Hold for a few breaths before releasing and repeating on the other side.\\"]

title: Crescent Moon Pose Quad Stretch With Block
instructions: ["Begin in Crescent Moon Pose with your right foot forward and a block nearby.\\", "Place the block at the highest height under your left hand.\\", "Reach your left arm behind you and take hold of your left foot or ankle.\\", "Gently pull your foot towards your buttocks while pressing your left hand into the block to deepen the stretch in your left quad. Hold for a few breaths before releasing and repeating on the other side.\\"]

title: Lord Of The Dance
instructions: ["Begin by standing tall with your feet hip-width apart.\\", "Shift your weight onto your left foot and bring your right heel towards your glute.\\", "Reach your right arm back and grab onto the inside of your right foot or ankle.\\", "Inhale and lift your right foot away from your glute while extending your left arm forward. Hold for 5-10 breaths before switching sides.\\"]

title: Monkey Pose
instructions: ["Begin in a low lunge with your right foot forward and your left knee on the ground.\\", "Slowly slide your left knee back while extending your right leg forward, keeping both legs straight.\\", "Lower your body down to the ground, using your hands for support if needed.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, then switch sides and repeat.\\"]

title: Runners Lunge
instructions: ["Begin in Downward Facing Dog pose (Adho Mukha Svanasana).\\", "Step your right foot forward between your hands.\\", "Place your left knee on the ground behind you and slide it back until you feel a stretch in your left hip flexor.\\", "Keep your hands on the ground or lift them to the sky and hold for a few breaths before repeating on the other side.\\"]

title: Treadmill Backwards Walk
instructions: ["Face the opposite direction on the treadmill.\\", "Hold on to the arms to find your balance.\\", "Walk backwards pushing your toes through the front of your shoes.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Sissy Squat
instructions: ["Stand facing away from the machine, positioning your feet slightly wider than shoulder-width apart to provide a stable base, and then reach behind you to firmly grip the bar with both hands, maintaining an overhand grip.\\", "Initiate the movement by leaning backward, allowing your upper body to incline while simultaneously bending your knees. As you descend, maintain control\\", "drive through your quadriceps while pushing your hips forward, gradually straightening your knees. Maintain a slow, controlled pace\\"]

title: Kneeling Quad Stretch
instructions: ["Lean back onto your palms.\\", "To increase stretch intensity lift bum off heels.\\"]

title: Towel Knee Extension
instructions: ["Sit on the floor and use your palms to lean back into.\\", "Place a rolled towel under your knee so it is slightly bent.\\", "Try to squeeze the towel between the back of your knee and the ground by extending the leg.\\"]

title: Seated Quad Stretch
instructions: ["Sit against the wall with one leg slightly bent.\\", "Wrap a stretch strap or towel around your ankle and pull the heel towards the hips.\\"]

title: Band Floor Quad Stretch
instructions: ["Lie on your front. Bend one leg, reach back and grab the foot with one arm\\", "Pull the heel towards the glute to stretch your quad.\\", "You can use a band or stretch strap to do the same thing.\\"]

title: Foam Roller Quad Mobilisation
instructions: ["Lie on your front placing a foam roller under your thigh.\\", "Roll up and down till you find a tight/sore spot.\\", "Hold this position and start bending and extending your knee to mobilise the quad.\\"]

title: Seated Hip Flexion Hold
instructions: ["Sit on a bench without back support.\\", "Keep an upright back and your shoulders back.\\", "Raise one leg and maintain the position for the specified duration.\\"]

title: Femoral Nerve Mobilisation
instructions: ["While standing, bend your knee and grab your foot.\\", "Bring your knee forward while tucking your chin (head forward).\\", "Pull the leg back while tilting your head backwards (look up).\\"]

title: Knee Extension Seated Partial
instructions: ["Sit on a box or bench, but make sure that your upper leg is supported.\\", "Extend your leg fully but bend 1/3 of the way back down.\\", "Perform as many partial reps as indicated on your training program.\\"]

title: Towel Knee Extension Hold
instructions: ["Sit on the floor and use your palms to lean back into.\\", "Place a rolled towel under your knee so it is slightly bent.\\", "Try to squeeze the towel between the back of your knee and the ground by extending the leg.\\"]

title: Band Knee Extension
instructions: ["Attach a band to a fixed point and wrap the loose end around your knee.\\", "Start in the standing position, facing the anchoring point and with the band already under tension.\\", "Allow the working knee to bend (the band will pull the knee), while shifting your weight onto the supporting leg.\\", "Shift your weight back onto the bentleg and fully extend the knee (pull the kneecap up)\\"]

title: Hip Flexor Stretch Kneeling Lunge 3
instructions: ["Bring yourself to kneeling lunge position. Keep a 90\u00b0 angle at knees.\\", "Back foot should be elevated (the higher the elevation the more the hip flexor/upper quad will stretch).\\", "Slide the front knee forward while gently leaning back.\\", "Squeeze the glute on the side of the leg that's to the front to avoid lower back complaints.\\"]

title: Hip Flexor Stretch Kneeling Lunge 2
instructions: ["Bring yourself to kneeling lunge position. Keep a 90\u00b0 angle at knees.\\", "Slide the front knee forward while gently leaning back. Raise your arm diagonally backwards\\", "Squeeze the glute on the side of the leg that's to the front to avoid lower back complaints.\\"]

title: Hip Flexor Stretch Kneeling Lunge 1
instructions: ["Bring yourself to kneeling lunge position. Keep a 90\u00b0 angle at knees.\\", "Slide the front knee forward while gently leaning back.\\", "Squeeze the glute on the side of the leg that's to the front to avoid lower back complaints.\\"]

title: Standing Mini-Band Hip Flexion
instructions: ["Wrap a loop band around your feet.\\", "Drive a knee upwards till your thigh is parallel to the ground.\\", "Pause for a moment and then return to the starting position.\\", "Try to maintain balance and a good posture when raising the knee.\\"]

title: Machine Hip Adduction
instructions: ["Sit in the machine with your legs apart, pads against your outer thighs. Adjust the seat and pad position comfortably.\\", "Slowly squeeze your legs together, focusing on using your inner thigh muscles. Pause when the pads are close together.\\", "Slowly return to the starting position, maintaining control. Avoid letting the weights slam. Repeat for desired reps and sets.\\"]

title: Machine Hip And Glute Adduction
instructions: ["Stand on the platform and set the pad just over the hip of the working leg.\\", "Place the working leg over the pad.\\", "Press your leg inward. Aim to get the longest range of motion possible.\\"]

title: Adductor Stretch Seated Bilateral Static
instructions: ["Sit against a wall and bring your feet together, letting the knees spread\\", "Once you reach the end of your range, allow gravity to do the work\\", "If you feel that gravity isn't enough, you can apply gentle downward pressure on your knees with your palms\\", "Try to maintain a straight back while performing the exercise\\"]

title: Adductor Stretch Seated Bilateral Dynamic
instructions: ["Sit against a wall and bring your feet together, letting the knees spread\\", "Once you reach the end of your range, bounce the knees to feel a gentle stretch deep in your groin\\", "Try to maintain a straight back while performing the exercise\\"]

title: Adductor Stretch Dynamic Unilateral 4 Point Position
instructions: ["From the 4 point position (all fours), extend one leg to the side, placing the foot on the ground.\\", "Start rocking your hips back and forth.\\", "You should feel your adductors and hip joint being stretched.\\", "Try to maintain a neutral spine\\"]

title: Adductor Stretch Dynamic Standing Alternate
instructions: ["From the standing position, use a chair/bench/box for support\\", "Transfer your weight towards one leg by bending the knee, while keeping the opposite leg straight and the foot on the ground\\", "Feel a stretch on the inside of the thigh (adductor) of the straight leg\\"]

title: Adductor Raise Side Lying Short Lever
instructions: ["From the side lying position, bend your upper leg and place it on a bench\\", "Raise your hips off the ground by pressing your leg into the bench\\"]

title: Adductor Raise Side Lying Long Lever
instructions: ["From the side lying position, place your upper leg on a bench\\", "Raise your hips off the ground by pressing your leg into the bench\\"]

title: Adductor Leg Raise Side Lying Isometric
instructions: ["Stabilise yourself in the side lying position, using your upper arm and leg\\", "Raise your under leg and hold isometrically for the specified amount of time\\"]

title: Adductor Leg Raise Side Lying
instructions: ["Stabilise yourself in the side lying position, using your upper arm and leg\\", "Raise and lower your under leg for the specified amount of reps/or sets\\"]

title: Floor Incline Leg Raise
instructions: ["Sit on the floor and lean back into your palms or on your elbows.\\", "Raise a straight leg a few centimeters off the ground and hold the position for the specified duration.\\"]

title: Standing Knee Raise Hold
instructions: ["Stand up straight and with a good posture.\\", "Shift your weight onto the supporting leg while driving the other knee.\\", "Your thigh should be parallel to the ground.\\"]

title: Band Straight Leg Hip Flexions
instructions: ["Attach a band to a fixed point.\\", "Wrap the loose end of the band around your ankle.\\", "Face away from the attachment point.\\", "Raise your working leg against the resistance.\\"]

title: Barbell Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Position the bench between 30 and 45 degrees.\\", "Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With straight arms unrack the bar.\\", "Lower the bar to your mid chest\\", "Raise the bar (slowly and controlled) until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Barbell Reverse Grip Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With straight arms unrack the bar with a reverse grip.\\", "Lower the bar to your lower chest\\", "Raise the bar until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Chest Fly
instructions: ["Lay on a bench with two dumbbells extended in front of you.\\", "You should have a slight bend in your elbows and maintain that bend. Your shoulder joint should do all the movement.\\", "Bring the dumbbells out to your side. Stop the dumbbells before going behind your body.\\", "Bring the dumbbells back together at the top.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Decline Chest Fly
instructions: ["Lay flat on a decline bench press with the dumbbells pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Maintain a slight bend in your elbows. Bring the dumbbells out to the side, stopping the dumbbells before they pass your torso.\\", "Bring the dumbbells together to finish the rep.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Incline Chest Fly
instructions: ["Lay on an incline bench with two dumbbells extended in front of you.\\", "You should have a slight bend in your elbows and maintain that bend. Your shoulder joint should do all the movement.\\", "Bring the dumbbells out to your side. Stop the dumbbells before going behind your body.\\", "Bring the dumbbells back together at the top.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Internally Rotated Chest Fly
instructions: ["Lay on a bench with two dumbbells extended in front of you in an overhand grip.\\", "You should have a slight bend in your elbows and maintain that bend. Your shoulder joint should do all the movement.\\", "Bring the dumbbells out to your side. Stop the dumbbells before going behind your body.\\", "Bring the dumbbells back together at the top.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Internally Rotated Incline Chest Fly
instructions: ["Lay on an incline bench with two dumbbells extended in front of you.\\", "You should have a slight bend in your elbows and maintain that bend. Your shoulder joint should do all the movement. You should have an overhand grip.\\", "Bring the dumbbells out to your side. Stop the dumbbells before going behind your body.\\", "Bring the dumbbells back together at the top.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Reverse Grip Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay flat on the bench with your feet on the ground. With straight arms unrack the bar with a reverse grip.\\", "Lower the dumbbells to your lower chest.\\", "Raise the bar until you've locked your elbows.\\"]

title: Push Up
instructions: ["Place your hands firmly on the ground, directly under shoulders.\\", "Flatten your back so your entire body is straight and slowly lower your body\\", "Draw shoulder blades back and down, keeping elbows tucked close to your body\\", "Exhale as you push back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Ring Standing Chest Fly
instructions: ["Start by adjusting the rings straps to chest height. Stand facing the rings with your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Grasp the rings' handles with both hands, keeping your arms extended and your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Lean forward, keeping your arms extended and your core engaged. Your body should form a slight diagonal line from your ankles to your head.\\", "Slowly bring your arms towards each other, in front of your chest, while keeping your core engaged and your body in a stable position.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Hands Up Push Ups
instructions: ["Place your hands firmly on the ground, directly under shoulders.\\", "Flatten your back so your entire body is straight and slowly lower your body\\", "Draw shoulder blades back and down, keeping elbows tucked close to your body. Bring chest all the way to the floor and raise hands off the ground.\\", "Exhale as you push back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Leg Raised Push Up
instructions: ["Place your hands firmly on the ground, directly under shoulders.\\", "Flatten your back so your entire body is straight, raise one leg off the ground,  and slowly lower your body\\", "Draw shoulder blades back and down, keeping elbows tucked close to your body\\", "Exhale as you push back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Push Up
instructions: ["Place your hands firmly on the ground, directly under shoulders. Place your feet on the stability ball.\\", "Flatten your back so your entire body is straight and slowly lower your body\\", "Draw shoulder blades back and down, keeping elbows tucked close to your body\\", "Exhale as you push back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Machine Pec Fly
instructions: ["Adjust seat height so handles align with chest. Sit and grip handles with elbows slightly bent.\\", "Slowly bring handles together in front, keeping tension. Focus on squeezing chest muscles.\\", "Return handles to starting position with controlled motion. Keep chest up throughout. Repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Machine Bent Arm Pec Fly
instructions: ["Adjust seat height so handles align with chest. Put your elbows on the pads.\\", "Slowly bring pads together in front, keeping tension. Focus on squeezing chest muscles.\\", "Return pads to starting position with controlled motion. Keep chest up throughout. Repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Chest Press Slam
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball at chest, feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Extend arms forward, slamming ball to the ground.\\", "Catch the ball on the rebound and repeat for reps.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Chest Press Toss
instructions: ["Stand in front of a wall holding a medicine ball.\\", "Press the ball forward, extending arms and tossing it.\\", "Catch the ball and return to the starting position.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Single Arm Chest Fly
instructions: ["Lie on the floor with your knees bent and feet firmly on the floor, with your arms to the side of your body.\\", "Holding a kettlebell in one hand, keeping your arm fully extended with a slight bend in the elbow and your forearms facing upwards, lift the kettlebell above your chest.\\", "Lower the kettlebell to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Pec Fly
instructions: ["Lie flat on a bench, holding a kettlebell in each hand above your chest.\\", "Slowly lower the kettlebells outwards, then lift them back up to the starting position.\\"]

title: Chest Stretch Variation Four
instructions: ["Raise your arms to shoulder height, fully extended in front of you.\\", "Slowly bring your arms behind your back still at shoulder height.\\", "Pause for a few seconds and then return to starting position.\\"]

title: Chest Stretch Variation Three
instructions: ["Place your arms behind your back and clasp your hands together.\\", "Slowly extend your elbows until they are locked then lift them away from you.\\", "Pause in this position for a few seconds and then return them to starting position.\\"]

title: Chest Stretch Variation Two
instructions: ["Lay on your side with one hand just in front of you.\\", "With a slight bend in your arm, rotate your arm around your body as slowly as possible.\\", "Return to the starting position and then repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Chest Stretch Variation One
instructions: ["Using a raised wall, place your arm at a 90 degree angle against it.\\", "With a staggered stance, lean into the wall extending your chest.\\", "Pause for a few seconds and then return to starting position and repeat on opposite side.\\"]

title: Cable Pec Fly
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment set all the way to the bottom of the machine.\\", "Bring both of the handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "Walk a few steps forward. Then press the weight forward. From there, your shoulders should horizontally abduct and adduct while your elbows stay in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Incline Chest Fly
instructions: ["Place the cable anchor at a lower level than your shoulders.\\", "Sit on the bench, leave your elbows mostly extended.\\", "Bring your arm across your chest and flex your pec.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Bench Chest Fly
instructions: ["Bring a bench over to the cables, set the cable just below shoulder height.\\", "Bring the handle to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "Press the weight forward. From there, your shoulder should horizontally abduct and adduct while your elbow stays in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Cable Single Arm Decline Bench Chest Fly
instructions: ["Bring a bench over to the cables, set the cable above shoulder height.\\", "Bring the handle to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "Press the weight forward. From there, your shoulders should horizontally abduct and adduct while your elbow stays in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Cable Incline Chest Fly
instructions: ["Place the cable anchor at a lower level than your shoulders.\\", "Sit on the bench, leave your elbows mostly extended.\\", "Bring your fists together and flex your pecs.\\"]

title: Cable Incline Bench Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment. Bring a bench over to the cables. The cables should be set fairly low.\\", "Bring both of the handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "From there, you should flex and extend at both the shoulders and elbows simultaneously.\\"]

title: Cable Bench Chest Fly
instructions: ["Bring a bench over to the cables, set the cables just below shoulder height.\\", "Bring both of the handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "Press the weight forward. From there, your shoulders should horizontally abduct and adduct while your elbows stay in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Cable Decline Bench Chest Fly
instructions: ["Bring a bench over to the cables, set the cables above shoulder height.\\", "Bring both of the handles to your chest and make sure you are in the center of the cable crossover.\\", "Press the weight forward. From there, your shoulders should horizontally abduct and adduct while your elbows stay in a fixed position.\\"]

title: Band Single Arm Pec Fly
instructions: ["Attach the band to an anchor point that is about shoulder height. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Extend your shoulder joint and bring your arm across your body until you feel a contraction in your pecs.\\"]

title: Band Chest Fly
instructions: ["Secure two resistance bands to a sturdy anchor point (e.g. a door anchor, a post, etc.) at chest height.\\", "Stand facing away from the anchor point with feet shoulder-width apart and hold each end of the band in each hand.\\", "Start with arms fully extended and parallel to the floor.\\", "Keeping arms straight, slowly bring your arms together in front of your chest.\\"]

title: Band Internally Rotated Chest Fly
instructions: ["Start with both feet hip-width apart and step on the middle of the band with both feet. Hold the handles of the band in each hand and position the band above your chest, with your palms facing down.\\", "Keeping your elbows slightly bent, slowly raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel with the floor. Make sure to internally rotate your shoulder joints by bringing your shoulder blades together and rotating your forearms inward towards your torso.\\", "Hold the position for a few seconds and then slowly lower your arms back to the starting position, keeping the internal rotation of your shoulder joints throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Weighted Push Ups
instructions: ["Place your hands firmly on the ground, directly under shoulders. Place a plate on your back.\\", "Flatten your back so your entire body is straight and slowly lower your body\\", "Draw shoulder blades back and down, keeping elbows tucked close to your body\\", "Exhale as you push back to the starting position.\\"]

title: TRX Pec Fly
instructions: ["Start by adjusting the TRX straps to chest height. Stand facing the TRX with your feet shoulder-width apart.\\", "Grasp the TRX handles with both hands, keeping your arms extended and your shoulders away from your ears.\\", "Lean forward, keeping your arms extended and your core engaged. Your body should form a slight diagonal line from your ankles to your head.\\", "Slowly bring your arms towards each other, in front of your chest, while keeping your core engaged and your body in a stable position.\\"]

title: Bow Pose
instructions: ["Lie on your stomach with your arms at your sides.\\", "Bend your knees and bring your heels towards your buttocks.\\", "Reach back with your hands and grab your ankles.\\", "Inhale and lift your chest off the ground, pulling your legs up and back with your hands.\\", "Keep your gaze forward and hold the pose for a few breaths before releasing back to the ground.\\"]

title: Mountain
instructions: ["Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart and your arms at your sides.\\", "Press your feet into the ground and engage your leg muscles.\\", "Lift your chest and roll your shoulders back and down.\\", "Take a deep breath in, and as you exhale, release any tension in your body and relax your muscles.\\"]

title: Supported Matsyasana Pose
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs stretched out in front of you.\\", "Place a yoga block behind you, horizontally, at the base of your spine.\\", "Slowly recline over the block, supporting yourself with your forearms, until your back is resting on the block.\\", "Relax your arms at your sides, palms facing up, and breathe deeply.\\"]

title: Tree Pose
instructions: ["Start in mountain pose, standing with your feet hip-width apart and arms at your sides.\\", "Shift your weight onto your left foot and bend your right knee, bringing the sole of your right foot to the inside of your left thigh.\\", "Bring your hands together in front of your heart, or raise them overhead.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, then release and repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Warrior One
instructions: ["Start in mountain pose, standing with your feet hip-width apart and arms at your sides.\\", "Step your left foot back about 3-4 feet and turn it slightly inward, while keeping your right foot facing forward.\\", "Inhale and raise your arms overhead, then exhale and bend your right knee, bringing it directly over your ankle.\\", "Hold the pose for a few breaths, then inhale and return to mountain pose. Repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Warrior Two
instructions: ["Start in mountain pose, standing with your feet hip-width apart and arms at your sides.\\", "Step your left foot back about 3-4 feet and turn it slightly inward, while keeping your right foot facing forward.\\", "Inhale and raise your arms to shoulder height, parallel to the ground, with your palms facing down.\\", "Exhale and bend your right knee, bringing it directly over your ankle while keeping your left leg straight.\\", "Look over your right hand and hold the pose for a few breaths, then inhale and return to mountain pose. Repeat on the other side.\\"]

title: Yogi Arm Clock
instructions: ["Stand facing a wall with your arms extended and your palms pressing into the wall at shoulder height.\\", "Slowly begin to walk your feet away from the wall, keeping your arms straight and your hands pressing into the wall.\\", "Walk until your arms are fully extended and your body is at a 45-degree angle to the ground.\\", "Repeat From High to Low Angles starting above the shoulder, and ending below the chest.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Bench Press
instructions: ["Lay on the flat bench.\\", "Tuck your elbows slightly, press the handles toward the ceiling.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Pec Fly
instructions: ["Lay flat on the bench.\\", "Keep your elbows mostly extended and lower your arms toward the floor.\\"]

title: Cardio Assault Bike Arms Only
instructions: ["Adjust seat and handlebar height for comfort and proper posture on the assault bike.\\", "Start pedaling with even, controlled motion, maintaining your desired resistance level. Then keep the motion going with only your arms.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Pushup
instructions: ["Place hands on the bar, in push-up position.\\", "Lower yourself to the bar, maintaining proper form.\\"]

title: Serratus Activation Cross Punch
instructions: ["Lie on your back with your knees bent and the feet flat on the floor.\\", "Hold a dumbbell over your shoulder with a straight arm.\\", "Form the sign of the cross adding a protraction (punch) on every end of the cross, including the middle position.\\"]

title: Bosu Serratus Activation Plank
instructions: ["Support your weight with your forearms on the bosu and toes on the floor (plank).\\", "Allow your upper back to sink in between the shoulder blades.\\", "Push your elbows into the ground and slightly forward, and move the shoulder blades away from the spine.\\"]

title: Serratus Activation Plank
instructions: ["Support your weight on your forearms and toes (plank).\\", "Allow your upper back to sink in between the shoulder blades.\\", "Push your elbows into the ground and slightly forward, and move the shoulder blades away from the spine.\\"]

title: Landmine Kneeling Twist
instructions: ["Kneel down facing the landmine with your knees hip-width apart and your back straight. Grasp the landmine barbell with both hands, interlacing your fingers and holding it above and slightly in front of your body.\\", "Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, twist your torso to one side, rotating your arms and the landmine along with it. Pause briefly at the end of the twist, feeling the contraction in your oblique muscles.\\", "Slowly rotate back to the starting position, then twist to the opposite side, repeating the same motion.\\", "Repeat both sides of the rotation for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Oblique Twist
instructions: ["Stand facing the landmine, with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent. Grasp the landmine barbell with both hands, interlacing your fingers and holding it at chest height. Position your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the floor, with your elbows slightly bent.\\", "While keeping your core engaged, rotate your torso and the landmine to one side. Twist through your waist, using your oblique muscles to generate the movement. Pivot on the ball of your opposite foot as you rotate away from it.\\", "Rotate back to the starting position, then perform the same movement in the opposite direction.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Russian Twist
instructions: ["Start sitting on the ground facing the landmine attachment, holding the end of the bar in both hands slightly in front of and above your chest while holding your feet off the ground and knees bent.\\", "Bending your elbows as little as possible and keeping your core tight and feet elevated, lower the end of the bar with control to the ground on one side of your body, then contract your obliques to return the bar to the center. Repeat on the other side.\\", "Repeat for the desired number of reps.\\"]

title: Landmine Stationary Twist
instructions: ["Hold the end of the bar. Start with a shoulder width stance.\\", "Bring both arms to one side and keep your elbows mostly extended.\\", "Rotate back and forth and try to resist twisting too much.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width stance. Begin with the dumbbell near one of your quads.\\", "Rotate at your upper spine to engage the obliques.\\", "You can pivot your back foot to keep from generating too much torque at the knee.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Start in a kneeling position with your shoulder blades pulled back.\\", "The dumbbell should begin by one of your hips.\\", "Rotate at the spine and bring the dumbbell from your hip, 180 degrees around your body. The dumbbell should land at eye level.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Overhead Side Bend
instructions: ["Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding a dumbbell overhead.\\", "From this starting position, bend to the side as far as you can while keeping your feet planted and your core engaged.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Side Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start by lying on your side with your feet stacked on top of each other and a dumbbell on your hip.\\", "Place your bottom elbow on the ground beneath your shoulder and engage your core to raise your hips off the ground.\\", "Your hips will do all the moving. Think, \\\\"]

title: Dumbbell Hand Side Plank
instructions: ["Start by lying on your side with your feet stacked on top of each other and a dumbbell on your hip.\\", "Place your bottom hand on the ground beneath your shoulder and engage your core to raise your hips off the ground.\\", "From this starting position, hold the side plank position for the desired amount of time, making sure to keep your body straight and your hips level.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Long Lever Russian Twist
instructions: ["Start by sitting on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground. Hold a dumbbell in both hands with your arms extended straight in front of you.\\", "Twist your torso to the right, bringing the dumbbell towards the ground, then return to the center. Repeat on the left side, twisting to the left and bringing the dumbbell towards the ground.\\", "Continue this twisting motion, alternating sides, for the desired number of repetitions. Keep your core engaged and avoid swinging your arms to generate momentum.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Side Bend
instructions: ["Stand with feet hip-width apart and place your right hand on the right hip.\\", "Hold a dumbbell with the left hand. Bend at the hips to the side.\\", "Make sure you don't start to lean forward to try and force a longer range of motion.\\"]

title: Side Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start with your elbow and hip on the ground. Either neutral fist or flat hand on the ground.\\", "Begin in a side plank position, and then drop your hips to the floor.\\", "Pull your hips back to the ceiling to finish the rep.\\"]

title: Side Plank Reach Through
instructions: ["Begin in an elbow side plank position.\\", "Reach for the ceiling with your off hand.\\", "Rotate at the mid and upper spine and reach through the open space between the floor and your torso.\\", "Reach backwards, and then rotate back into the starting position.\\"]

title: Elbow Side Plank
instructions: ["Press your elbow into the floor.\\", "Pick your hips up off the ground and maintain this position for the allotted amount of time.\\", "Make sure you don't let your chest fall forward or backward.\\"]

title: Hand Side Plank
instructions: ["Press your hand into the ground and pick up your hip off the ground.\\", "Open your chest and maintain this position for the allotted amount of time.\\"]

title: Hand Side Plank Reach Through
instructions: ["Start in a side plank position.\\", "Reach your top arm under your body.\\", "Return to the plank position.\\"]

title: Windshield Wiper
instructions: ["Lie on back, arms out, legs together.\\", "Lift legs to 90 degrees.\\", "Rotate legs side to side, keeping shoulders grounded.\\"]

title: Oblique Crunch
instructions: ["Lie on your side, knees bent, hands behind head.\\", "Bring your elbow towards your knees and flex your obliques.\\"]

title: Oblique Jackknife
instructions: ["Lie on your side, legs straight, hand behind head.\\", "Lift both legs and upper body simultaneously.\\", "Squeeze obliques, then lower back down. Repeat on both sides.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Thoracic Spine Rotation
instructions: ["Start on all fours then bring your chest to the ground. Place one hand on the ground in front of you. The other hand behind your head/ear.\\", "On the side of the hand that is behind your head, rotate until your elbow is pointed at the ceiling and then hold this position.\\"]

title: Stability Ball Side Crunch
instructions: ["Lie sideways on a stability ball, feet anchored, hands behind head, core engaged.\\", "Crunch sideways by contracting obliques, bringing your upper body toward your hip.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Half Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Kneel with one knee down, holding a medicine ball.\\", "Rotate torso and until the medicine ball is pointed the opposite direction.\\", "Repeat the movement on the other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Kneel, holding a medicine ball.\\", "Rotate torso and slam the ball diagonally down and across.\\", "Repeat the movement on the other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Partner Side Toss
instructions: ["Stand facing partner, side by side.\\", "Toss medicine ball to partner's side.\\", "Catch and repeat toss on other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Rainbow Slam
instructions: ["Lift medicine ball overhead.\\", "Slam ball down to one side.\\", "Catch and repeat slam to the other side.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Russian Twist
instructions: ["Sit with knees bent, feet off ground.\\", "Twist torso side to side, touching medicine ball to ground.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball with both hands and arms extended.\\", "Swing ball diagonally across body, engaging core.\\"]

title: Medicine Ball Wood Chopper Toss
instructions: ["Stand sideways next to a wall.\\", "Swing medicine ball across your body and toss off the wall.\\", "Catch and repeat toss on the other side.\\"]

title: Kettlebell Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Stand with feet slightly wider than shoulder width apart and hold the kettle bell with both hands against your hip.\\", "Keeping your arms straight, swing the kettlebell upwards and across your body towards your shoulder, raising the kettlebell to head height rotating your hips as you do so.\\", "Return to the starting position and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Set the cable at about nipple level. Use a handle attachment.\\", "Face sideways, then rotate your torso with your arms extended against the resistance.\\", "After completing your given number of reps, face the opposite direction and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Pallof Press
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment, set the cable at nipple level, walk a few steps away, and face sideways.\\", "Start with both hands on the handle and your fists against your chest.\\", "Press the handle forward until your elbows are fully extended, then pull the handle back to your chest.\\"]

title: Cable Half Kneeling Low To High Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Set the cable at a low position. Take a half kneeling position. Use a handle attachment.\\", "Face sideways, then rotate your torso with your arms extended against the resistance.\\", "After completing your given number of reps, face the opposite direction and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Half Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Set the cable at nipple level. Take a half kneeling position. Use a handle attachment.\\", "Face sideways, then rotate your torso with your arms extended against the resistance.\\", "After completing your given number of reps, face the opposite direction and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Half Kneeling High To Low Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Set the cable just over your head. Take a half kneeling position. Use a handle attachment.\\", "Face sideways, then rotate your torso with your arms extended against the resistance.\\", "After completing your given number of reps, face the opposite direction and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Pallof Press Rotation
instructions: ["Use a handle attachment, set the cable at nipple level, walk a few steps away, and face sideways.\\", "Start with both hands on the handle and your fists against your chest.\\", "Press the handle forward until your elbows are fully extended, then rotate away from the cable stack.\\", "Then pull the handle back to your chest.\\"]

title: Cable Oblique Pushdown
instructions: ["Set the cable just over your head. Use a handle attachment.\\", "Face sideways, push the handle down until your elbow is extended. Flex your obliques until you feel a contraction.\\", "After completing your given number of reps, face the opposite direction and repeat.\\"]

title: Cable Side Bend
instructions: ["Set the cable at the bottom of the stack. Use a handle attachment.\\", "Face sideways, grab the handle, lean away from the cable.\\", "After completing your given number of reps, face the opposite direction and repeat.\\"]

title: Band Pallof Press
instructions: ["Place the band at an anchor point that is shoulder height. Take a few steps away until the band is taut.\\", "Start with your fingers interlocked around the band and your fists connected to your chest.\\", "Extend at the elbows pressing the band away from your body until your elbows are fully extended.\\"]

title: Plate Standing Twist
instructions: ["Stand with a plate extended away from your body. Elbows mostly extended.\\", "Rotate at the upper spine while keeping your lumbar spine in a neutral position.\\", "Do not let the plate go behind your body.\\"]

title: Plate Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Stand with a shoulder width stance. Begin with the plate near one of your quads.\\", "Rotate at your upper spine to engage the obliques.\\", "You can pivot your back foot to keep from generating too much torque at the knee.\\"]

title: TRX Forearm Side Plank
instructions: ["Lie on your side with your legs straight and your feet resting in the TRX foot cradles.\\", "Prop yourself up on your forearm and engage your core to maintain a straight line from your head to your feet.\\"]

title: TRX Oblique Crunch
instructions: ["Place your feet in the TRX stirrups and get in to a hand plank position.\\", "Pull both knees to your right elbow.\\", "Extend your legs back to the starting position, then pull both knees to the left elbow.\\"]

title: Gate Pose Variation Arm Extended on Side
instructions: ["Start on your knees and extend your right leg out to the side.\\", "Raise your right arm above your head and reach towards the left side of the room.\\", "Gently bend your body to the left side and rest your left hand on your left thigh.\\", "Look up towards your right hand and hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides.\\"]

title: Revolved Head To Knee
instructions: ["Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.\\", "Bend your right knee and bring your heel towards your perineum.\\", "Place your left hand on the outside of your right knee and twist your body to the right.\\", "Reach your right hand towards your left foot and look up towards the ceiling. Hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides.\\"]

title: Seated Side Bend Pose
instructions: ["Sit comfortably on the floor with your legs crossed.\\", "Inhale and raise your right arm above your head.\\", "As you exhale, bend your body to the left side and rest your left hand on the ground.\\", "Look up towards the ceiling and hold the pose for a few breaths. Then switch sides and repeat the pose on the other side.\\"]

title: Supine Twist Lying
instructions: ["Lie down on your back with your arms stretched out to your sides.\\", "Bend your right knee and bring it towards your chest.\\", "Slowly twist your body to the left side, bringing your right knee across your body towards the ground on the left side.\\", "Look towards your right hand and hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides.\\"]

title: Wild Thing Pose
instructions: ["Start in a downward facing dog position.\\", "Shift your weight onto your left hand and foot, and lift your right leg towards the ceiling.\\", "Slowly bend your right knee and shift your weight onto your right hand as you open up your chest towards the ceiling.\\", "Look towards your right hand and hold the pose for a few breaths before switching sides.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Forearm Sideplank
instructions: ["Lie on one side, forearm on Bosu, elbow under shoulder.\\", "Lift hips to create a side plank.\\", "Hold the side plank position, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Hand Sideplank
instructions: ["Place hand on Bosu, arm straight, facing sideways.\\", "Stack feet and lift hips to side plank.\\", "Hold the side plank position, then switch sides.\\"]

title: Bosu Ball Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Hold medicine ball with both hands and arms extended.\\", "Swing ball diagonally across body, engaging core.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Kneeling Wood Chopper
instructions: ["Hold the attachment with both hands and take a kneeling position.\\", "Rotate across your body.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Side Bend
instructions: ["Hold one of the handle attachments.\\", "Stand upright, lean to the opposing side of the cable.\\"]

title: Vitruvian Windmill
instructions: ["Hold the attachment in one hand and raise your arm over head.\\", "Turn one foot outward and one foot forward.\\", "Lean to the side while reaching for your foot.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Oblique Crunch
instructions: ["Lay on your side with your knees bent.\\", "Hold the bar extended over you.\\", "Lift yourself up by flexing your obliques.\\"]

title: Smith Machine Side Plank Up Down
instructions: ["Start by lying on your side with your feet stacked on top of each other and the bar on your hip.\\", "Place your bottom elbow on the ground beneath your shoulder and engage your core to raise your hips off the ground.\\", "Your hips will do all the moving. Think, \\\\"]

title: Smith Machine Side Bend
instructions: ["Stand beside the bar.\\", "Keep your hips and shoulders facing forward, bend to one side slowly\\", "Return to the upright position.\\", "Switch hands and repeat.\\"]

title: Prayer Stretch Side Bend
instructions: ["Sit on your heels and reach out your arms on the floor while pressing the chest towards the ground.\\", "Bend your spine towards one side and reach over with your arms.\\", "Do the same on the opposite side.\\"]

title: Seated Lateral Line Stretch
instructions: ["Start from a seated position with an upright posture.\\", "Cross your right leg over the left and raise your right arm over your head.\\", "Lean towards your left and reach with your right arm as far to the left as possible.\\", "Repeat on the opposite side by crossing the left leg over the right.\\", "You can do the same exercise against a wall or by holding onto a pull-up bar.\\"]

title: Lat And Lateral Line Stretch
instructions: ["Start from the standing position with an upright posture.\\", "Cross your right leg over the left and raise your right arm over your head.\\", "Lean towards your left and reach with your right arm as far to the left as possible.\\", "Repeat on the opposite side by crossing the left leg over the right.\\", "You can do the same exercise against a wall or by holding onto a pull-up bar.\\"]

title: Eversions
instructions: ["Sit on a step or low box, preferably with a back support. Extend both legs and wrap the band around the balls of the working foot\\", "Pass the band around the other foot as shown in the video. Hold the end of the band with the opposite arm of the working foot\\", "The ankle should be at 90\u00b0 and turned inwards (inversion) before you start the movement. Turn the ankle out, without moving the rest of the leg.\\"]

title: Single Leg Bosu Ball Balance 2
instructions: ["Place the supporting leg on the middle of a bosu ball.\\", "Keep the knee of the suspended leg slightly bent.\\", "Try to maintain your balance on the bosu ball while bouncing a tennis ball off the wall.\\"]

title: Single Leg Balance 2
