instructions: ["Stand upright with a braced core.\\", "Choose the supporting leg and shift your weight on that, while lifting the other slightly off the ground.\\", "Try to maintain your balance while bouncing a tennis ball off the wall or ground.\\"]

title: Alphabet
instructions: ["Sit on a box or bench\\", "Keep one foot off the ground by pulling onto your knee, or by crossing one leg over the opposite knee.\\", "Try to form the letters of the Alphabet with your foot.\\"]

title: Barbell Split Jerk
instructions: ["Start with the barbell on your shoulders in a front rack position, feet hip-width apart. Slightly bend your knees and dip straight down.\\", "Explosively extend your legs and push the barbell upward, generating momentum with your legs.\\", "As the bar rises, quickly split your legs (one forward, one back) and drop under the bar, locking your arms overhead.\\", "Bring your front foot back, then your back foot forward to a stable standing position with the bar locked overhead.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Internal Rotation
instructions: ["Lay flat on the ground with your elbow on the floor and dumbbell pointed toward the ceiling.\\", "Lower the dumbbell until your knuckles get close to the ground. Then back to the starting position.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Cuban Press
instructions: ["Perform an upright row until elbows are bent at 90 degrees and arms parallel to the ground.\\", "Rotate your shoulders, raising the dumbbells overhead. Then press overhead.\\"]

title: Dumbbell Six Way Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Perform a front raise, then bring dumbbells out to your side, then raise the dumbbells over head.\\"]

title: Machine Overhand Overhead Press
instructions: ["Adjust the seat to match your height.\\", "Press your back into the back pad.\\", "Press upwards until your elbows are nearly extended. But not fully extended.\\", "Lower until the plates nearly touch back down.\\"]

title: Machine Neutral Overhead Press
instructions: ["Adjust the seat to match your height.\\", "Press your back into the back pad.\\", "Press upwards until your elbows are nearly extended. But not fully extended.\\", "Lower until the plates nearly touch back down.\\"]

title: Machine Plate Loaded Front Military Press
Machine Standing Lateral Raise
instructions: ["Grab the two handles and raise the arms straight out to your sides.\\"]

title: Cable Internal Rotation
instructions: ["Stand tall, hold the cable handle with a neutral grip, your elbow should be at a 90 degree angle.\\", "Rotate your shoulder by bringing your forearm across your body.\\"]

title: Band Shoulder Y Raise
instructions: ["Hold one end of a band with your arm to the side and behind your body.\\", "Hold the other end in front of your body (overhand grip).\\", "Move your arm away from your body and upward while externally rotating your shoulder.\\", "Finish with your arm over your head and thumb up\\"]

title: Wall Angels
instructions: ["Stand against a wall with your back flat, arms at 90\u00b0 by your sides.\\", "Slowly raise arms overhead, keeping elbows and wrists in contact with the wall.\\", "Lower arms back down to starting position, maintaining constant wall contact throughout.\\"]

title: Dumbbell External Rotation
instructions: ["Hold a dumbbell in one hand,  elbow bent at 90 degrees while resting on your inner thigh/ knee.\\", "Rotate your arm outward, keeping your elbow stable.\\"]

title: Ring Rear Delt Fly
instructions: ["Stand facing rings and grab the handles.\\", "Step forward so that your body is in a plank position, with your arms straight and your body in a straight line from your head to your heels.\\", "Keeping your arms straight, slowly lift your arms out to the side, keeping them at the same height as your shoulders. Your body should form a \\\\"]

title: Cable External Rotation
instructions: ["Hold the cable handle in one hand,  elbow bent at 90 degrees going across your torso.\\", "Rotate your arm outward, keeping your elbow stable.\\"]

title: Ys
instructions: ["Lie on your front with your arms in the \\\\", "Raise your arms without bending the elbows.\\"]

title: Seated Radial Nerve Slider
instructions: ["From the seated position bring your arm out to the side with the palm facing back.\\", "Flex your wrist at the same time you are leaning your head towards your outstretched arm.\\", "Bend your head away from the the outstretched arm while simultaneously extending the wrist.\\"]

title: Standing Neck Side Flexions
instructions: ["Pull your shoulders back and away from the ears and straighten the back.\\", "Lean your head to the side (bring your ear to your shoulder) without shrugging your shoulder or leaning the spine to the side.\\"]

title: Standing Neck Rotations
instructions: ["Pull your shoulders back and away from the ears and straighten the back.\\", "Rotate your head from side to side without rounding your shoulders.\\"]

title: Standing Neck Flexions
instructions: ["Pull your shoulders back and away from the ears and straighten the back.\\", "Tuck your chin in and drop your head forwards without rounding the back.\\"]

title: Standing Neck Extensions
instructions: ["Pull your shoulders back and away from the ears and straighten the back.\\", "Lean your head back trying to keep the front of the neck straight.\\", "Point your chin to the ceiling.\\"]

title: Standing Neck Mobility Circumductions
instructions: ["Pull your shoulders back and away from the ears and straighten the back\\", "Circumduct the head both clockwise and anti-clockwise making sure you  are working on the end range throughout the movement.\\"]

title: Bodyweight Butterfly Stretch
instructions: ["Sit on your butt with your knees bent and feet touching each other.\\", "Grab your feet and lean forward until you feel a stretch in your groin.\\"]
